title: Wizz Air - Book Flights
description:
SIMPLY SEARCH AND BOOK 
What could be better than low-cost flight deals? Select from 200+ destinations, choose your ideal travel date and get set for cheap flights the easy way with the WIZZ Air flight deal and travel app.

ORGANISE YOUR ENTIRE HOLIDAY  
- Get flight deals via push notifications 
- Scan your documents for a faster booking and check-in process 
- Check in with your confirmation details and say goodbye to printing*  
- Check out your flight schedule and track your plane in real-time 
- Share flight searches with friends and family or send travel companions their boarding pass  
- Save your ticket to your Apple Wallet plus all your important travel documents to the app 
- Use the in-app boarding card ‚Äì either online or offline! 
Fly to the most popular destinations across Europe, from Bucharest, Budapest, Krakow, Tirana and Vienna, to Lisbon, Rome, Naples, Milan, Malaga, Madrid and Athens.  Check out our low cost flights to the Middle East and places like Abu Dhabi, Alexandria, Amman, Muscat and Tel Aviv. 

FARE FINDER: 
Search for the lowest available fare for your journey and book your ticket at the best price.

HOTELS 
Reserve your hotel with Booking.com and get 5% of your booking value back as a WIZZ credit. 

WIZZ DISCOUNT CLUB 
Sign up to a WIZZ Discount Club membership and get discounted flight fares. 

AIRPORT TRANSFER:
Book a ride to and from the airport with our airport transfer service.

USE THE APP TO BUY AIRPORT EXTRAS LIKE‚Ä¶ 
- Fast Track boarding and Lounge access  
- Car rental with Rentalcars.com where you can receive a 5% of your booking back as WIZZ credit value 
- Bus transfers at cheap prices from the airport to the centre of your destination city  

WIZZ MAGAZINE 
Stay entertained on board by downloading the WIZZ in-flight magazine before you board.

ADD SERVICES 
Want to add more luggage or change your reserved seat? No worries, you can add many travel-related services through the app. 

Follow WIZZ on social media for all of the latest news, offers and competitions  

Facebook @wizzair 
Instagram @wizzair 
Twitter @wizzair 

Available in almost 20 languages 
Arabic, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Dutch, English, French, German, Hungarian, Italian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Norwegian, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish, Ukrainian 

*Only at airports with permitted access.
releaseNotes:
Need something new in your life? Search for the lowest available fare for your journey and book your ticket at the best price with the new FARE FINDER function. 

Great news for those who always forget where their boarding pass is. Now you can store it digitally, in your secure and private Apple Wallet. There is no more ‚ÄúI have no idea where I last saw it‚Äù, because it‚Äôs always at hand. Amazing, isn‚Äôt it?
And we are always busy bees when it comes to developments and fixing some bugs.

title: Placehunter: Top places to see
description:
The best places to visit in one place! Each place has been carefully selected, personally visited and photographed by our team. Placehunter is the only mobile app you'll need when traveling.

Less searching, more discovering!

Finding the right place to visit is often very time-consuming. With Placehunter, you're clear right away and can enjoy your free time exploring the world instead of searching.

‚Ä¢ A clean dashboard with the best places to visit - choose between the recently added spots, recommended places just for you or top-rated places. You can even pick a random spot nearby.
‚Ä¢ Detailed information - everything you need to know about a place - from photos, difficulty to parking
‚Ä¢ List of places with sophisticated filtering - a clear list of the best places in the Czech Republic, Austria, Slovakia and Italy with sophisticated filtering.
‚Ä¢ Map - for discovering the places that are around you.
‚Ä¢ Itineraries for the best weekends or summer holidays
‚Ä¢ Interactive travel profile with summaries of your trips.
‚Ä¢ Magical accommodations by Amazing Places
‚Ä¢ The best restaurants, bistros and cafes from Lukas Hejlik and his Gastromapa.
‚Ä¢ Favorites & offline version and much more!

Placehunter subscription
‚Ä¢ With Placehunter subscription, you have unlimited access to all the cool places and itineraries in the app.
‚Ä¢ Placehunter subscriptions are charged monthly or annually at the rate corresponding to the plan you choose.
‚Ä¢ Upon confirmation of purchase, payment will be charged to your iTunes account.
‚Ä¢ Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
‚Ä¢ Subscriptions will be renewed within 24 hours before the end of the period.
‚Ä¢ Subscriptions can be managed by the user, and auto-renew can be turned off after purchase in the user's account settings.

Terms of Use -> https://placehunter.app/terms-and-conditions/
Privacy Policy -> https://placehunter.app/privacy-policy/

Feel free to contact us: info@placehunter.com

Your feedback is important to us! :)
releaseNotes: Welcome to the new version of Placehunter. We've fixed some bugs that slipped into the app and resolved app crashes and other minor improvements.

title: Weather & Radar - Storm alerts
description:
Key Features of Weather & Radar‚Äôs free app:

- Hourly and daily weather forecast
- 14-day weather outlook
- Worldwide live weather map
- RainfallRadar
- TemperatureRadar & WindRadar
- Pollen Count
- Severe weather warnings & Warning Maps
- Coastal and tidal information
- Weather Widget
- Snow & ski information

Weather App
Be up-to-date at all times with Weather & Radar‚Äôs free app! Always know whether the sun will be out, a thunderstorm is approaching, if it‚Äôll rain, hail or snow. The weather app will accurately display current weather conditions for your exact position and any further location worldwide.

Weather Forecast
Everything about the weather at a glance! The latest specifics on temperature, rain, probability of precipitation, snow, wind, sunshine hours, sunrise and sunset times. Detailed displays of air pressure, humidity levels and UV-Index. Plan further ahead with the 14-day weather outlook feature.

WeatherRadar
More than just your standard weather map! See the latest enhanced radar map, which includes areas of cloud cover, sunshine, rainfall, snowfall, hail, thunderstorms, and lightning strikes. This feature allows you to see meteorological conditions for various locations at once. Trace the movement of cloud formations and active storms, to see, if they will hit or bypass your location. Switch to RainfallRadar and see rainfall only against a more subtle backdrop.

WindRadar & TemperatureRadar
Gone with the wind or not? Our latest feature, the WindRadar lets you track the wind, including wind direction and peak gusts. One click away you can find the TemperatureRadar, which allows you to see the temperature on a beautifully coloured map, up to 3 days ahead!

Pollen Count
Current information on pollen count: Weather & Radar provides free, reliable and local information on pollen count in your area with details of 14 types of pollen to tackle all forms of hay fever plus pollen forecasts for the next six days.

Severe Weather Warnings & Warning Maps
Activate severe weather warnings and receive push notifications when extreme weather conditions such as storms, thunderstorms, lightning, heavy winds or snow are underway. The Warning Map lets you see where warnings have been issued - Europe-wide!

World Weather
Scheduling a trip or have a family member in another country? Save any location and see current conditions for any number of global locations at once. World weather at your fingertips!

Weather Widget
The widget displays weather information for your current location in a compact format on the home screen of your device.

Coastal & Tidal Information
Live near the sea? You can rely on Weather & Radar's free app to see water temperatures, wave heights, high and low tide times for coastal areas.

Snow Info / Winter Sports
Planning a last-minute ski trip? Weather & Radar will tell you where the snow is! Access all ski and other winter sport info for major Ski locations in Europe.

Use the weather app free of advertising with the in-app purchase and profit from the option to personalise your main page!

Weather & Radar Ad-free is a subscription service that will be renewed on either a monthly or a yearly basis. Payment for the subscription will be charged to the user‚Äôs Apple Account at confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. The user‚Äôs Apple account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Apple will identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of the Weather & Radar Ad-free, free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription thereof.

Terms and Conditions: http://www.weatherandradar.com/ios/terms-of-use/

Should you have any queries or comments, kindly contact us at info@weatherandradar.co.uk
releaseNotes:
To make sure you know exactly when the sun will shine, we are working 24/7 on improving the app. With every update we make it faster and even more reliable.

If you have questions or suggestions, feel free to send us an email on info@weatherandradar.co.uk.

title: Liftago: Travel safely
description:
TAXI AND COURIER IN ONE APP
‚Äì Lightning-fast ordering: Order a driver in a few clicks and within minutes you or your shipment will be on the way.
‚Äì Perfect overview: You can see your driver‚Äôs location at all times and know exactly when they will arrive. Our drivers don't cancel rides and always arrive on time.
‚Äì Professional drivers and quality cars: You will only ride with verified drivers, who you select based on offered price, arrival time, car or ratings.
‚Äì Favorite service: Our customers have made Liftago the top-rated iOS transport app in the world.
‚Äì Payment options: Pay the driver in cash or by card via the app.

100% SAFE TAXI
‚Äì All drivers speak Czech (some speak English as well), and are licensed and insured up to 35 million CZK per passenger.
‚Äì We have strict standards (40% of drivers fail the selection process).
‚Äì We conduct hundreds of mystery rides per month.
‚Äì We respond to every customer suggestion and complaint
‚Äì You can share your route with your loved ones during the ride.
‚Äì Your contact details are anonymised.
‚Äì If you rate your experience with 3 or fewer stars, we will no longer connect you with that driver.

FAST COURIER ON DEMAND
‚Äì Send shipments or get something delivered to you in just a few clicks.
‚Äì You can order an express courier or book one for a specific time slot.
‚Äì It's handy for picking up orders from a store or a parcel box or delivering flowers..

LIFTAGO FOR BUSINESS
Liftago is a solution with high service standards that businesses can rely on. Pay for rides with one monthly invoice and have a detailed overview of your entire team's expenses. Simply order a ride via mobile or web app. Try Liftago for Business and gain even more benefits. Interested? Email us at sales@liftago.com.

Did you forget something in the taxi? You can contact the driver directly via the app for 24 hours after the trip. Alternatively, email us at service@liftago.com and we'll be happy to help.
releaseNotes: We've added more improvements to the app to make your journeys even more convenient. So update your app and enjoy the new features for taxi and courier up to your destination!

title: Hostelworld: Hostel Travel App
description:
The world‚Äôs leading travel app & trip planner for backpackers on a budget who want to stay in the best hostels, have fun experiences and mix with like-minded travellers. With new friend-making features, it‚Äôs even easier to go from solo to social before your plane hits the runway.  ‚Ä® ‚Ä® 

Make new travel besties with super social features 
+ Instantly connect and chat with your fellow hostel travellers as soon as you book 
+ Share experiences that are right up your street by joining local chat groups based on your interests 
+ View travellers‚Äô profiles from around the world and see where people have adventured to 
+ See exactly who will be at your hostel when you are 
+ Build your own traveller profile & expand your travel network 
+ Share memes or discuss travel dreams: join our online community and find top tips for your next adventure 
 
Find affordable accommodation in unmissable locations 
+ Search from over 16,500 hostels in 180 countries  
+ From cheap hostels in Europe to eco hostels in Southeast Asia 
+ Book private rooms or shared dorm rooms (mixed or all-female options available) 
+ Filter by location, price, room type, facilities and more on our booking app  
+ The best hostels for any budget. Making travel possible for everyone. ‚Ä® 

Tried, tested and trusted travel app 
+ Helping backpackers and solo travellers ‚ÄòMeet the World‚Äô for over 20 years 
+ Real reviews from over 13 million+ passionate travellers 
+ Rated on value, location, atmosphere etc. by previous guests ‚Ä® 

Find events and experiences 
+ Discover hostel events and local plans 
+ Find FREE activities, helping you meet like-minded travellers 
+ Fun experiences to suit any backpacker or solo traveller. Walking tours, yoga, pub crawls and more 
+ Join a Roamies group tour to explore iconic destinations while staying in the world‚Äôs best hostels 
 
Packed with plenty of perks 
+ FREE cancellation available on all hostel bookings (we know travel plans can change) 
+ Use your location to easily find the perfect hostel stay near you 
+ Browse accommodation photos and view your future room 
+ Get access to your booking info 24/7 with or without internet access 
+ See where you‚Äôve been on the interactive ‚ÄòMy Map‚Äô feature 
+ Get inspired by our ‚ÄòTop Destination‚Äô feature and discover the best hostels in London, Amsterdam, Barcelona, Bangkok and more for a backpacking adventure or a gap year abroad 
 
Hostels for anyone, anywhere! 
 
Literally, anyone‚Ä¶ 
+ Whether you‚Äôre a veteran backpacker, travelling around the world on a budget 
+ A gap year student on your first ever backpacking trip 
+ A solo traveller making friends in every corner of the world 
+ A group tour sharing crazy adventures together  
+ Looking for cheap vacations, budget holidays or an epic backpacking trip 
 
Almost anywhere‚Ä¶ 
+ Our easy-to-use travel app offers you the biggest choice of accommodation at the best prices, with exclusive travel deals 
+ Find accommodation across 180 countries worldwide 
+ Hostels on the beach, in the city, even in the jungle 
+ Book accommodation all over the world in an instant 
+ Book whenever, from wherever. Whether you‚Äôre backpacking in Thailand or exploring Italy, the USA or Spain‚Ä¶ Access to the world‚Äôs best hostels, 24/7! ‚Ä® 

‚ÄúHostels are the best way to travel and Hostelworld is the best way to find them.‚Äù - Elite Daily 
 
Want more travel tips and inspiration? 
For travel tips and backpacking inspiration, check out our blog and follow us on social media.  
+ Hostelworld Blog 
+ Instagram 
+ TikTok 
+ Facebook 
+ Twitter 
+ Pinterest 
+ YouTube 
 
Please take a moment to review us on the App Store. Your feedback helps us improve our service for millions of travellers worldwide.

title: KAYAK: Flights, Hotels & Cars
description:
KAYAK searches hundreds of travel sites at once to find exactly what you need for your trip, from cheap flights to brilliant hotel deals and car hire. Direct flight leaving at 9 am? Sure. Pet-friendly holiday home by the beach? Sorted. Luxury car hire for under ¬£50/day? We're on it. Because we're travellers too and know that every trip is worth planning. 

BOOK FLEXIBLY
Easily search, filter and sort your options to find the right travel offers for you - whether it's flights you can change with no fees, hotels, holiday rentals and car hire with free cancellation, the cheapest deal, or the most comfortable seat.

SAVE MONEY
Get mobile-only rates and Private Deals on the app. Set Price Alerts to find out when prices drop, and use Explore to discover new destinations within your budget.

EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE
This is more than just a travel app. Our Trips tool keeps your plans in order. Receive alerts for flight and gate changes, access boarding passes on and offline and plan out and share your itinerary, all from one place. Use Guides to create, collect and share daily itineraries, tips and impressions along the way.

COMPARE FLIGHT DEALS FROM 900+ SITES
‚Ä¢ Take the stress out of trip planning. Find flexible flight offers with no change fees.
‚Ä¢ Search with flexible dates up to +/- 3 days to see when's the best time to fly.
‚Ä¢ Filter options based on stops, airlines, departure times, cancellation policies, amenities & more.
‚Ä¢ Save your preferences to see your favourite airlines and hotels first (and skip ones you don't like).
‚Ä¢ Book at the right time. Price Forecast lets you know whether you should wait or book now.
‚Ä¢ We'll even show you Hacker Fares which pair together two one-way tickets for a return flight (and save you ¬£).

FIND A RENTAL CAR THAT FITS YOUR TRIP
‚Ä¢ Search from over 70,000 locations to find the perfect car rental for your trip.
‚Ä¢ Filter your car hire search by vehicle type including hybrids and electric vehicles, offers with unlimited mileage, enhanced cleaning and much more.
‚Ä¢ Risk-free booking: Find car rentals with a free cancellation policy so if plans change, you can easily rebook.

HOTELS, HOLIDAY HOMES AND UNIQUE STAYS FROM THOUSANDS OF SITES
‚Ä¢ Compare all sorts of accommodation, from five-star resorts to holiday homes and boutique hotels.
‚Ä¢ Looking for a staycation? Uncover deals on amazing places to visit right here in the UK.
‚Ä¢ Stay flexible by easily filtering for hotel deals with free cancellation. 
‚Ä¢ Unlock Private Deals and exclusive mobile-only rates for even more savings.

EXPLORE: Discover new destinations on your budget
‚Ä¢ Whether you have ¬£300 or ¬£3,000 to spend, Explore lets you set a budget and shows you where in the world you can go.

TRIPS: All your travel plans in one place.
‚Ä¢ Keep all your plans organised in one travel app, regardless of where you booked.
‚Ä¢ Forward your booking confirmation emails to trips@kayak.com or sync your Gmail or Outlook account.
‚Ä¢ Use our Flight Tracker to stay up-to-date on any flight's progress, with real-time status updates, gate change & baggage reclaim notifications. 
‚Ä¢ Check your Trip Stats to see how far you've travelled, your top cities, and how many times you've been around the world.
‚Ä¢ Your traveller data is safe and secure - meaning you never have to re-enter your booking and credit card info.
‚Ä¢ Share your holiday plans with family & friends.
‚Ä¢ No signal, no problem. View your itinerary and notes with no internet connection.

MEASURE YOUR BAG
‚Ä¢ AR measuring tool lets you know if your hand luggage complies with the policy of the airline you're flying with.

PRICE ALERTS: Never miss a deal
‚Ä¢ Let us do the searching for you. Create a Price Alert and we‚Äôll notify you when the price drops.

Download the KAYAK travel app now and get ready for your next travel adventure!

title: TripIt: Travel Planner
description:
Join nearly 20 million travellers on the world's highest-rated travel planner app for trip and itinerary organisation!


TRAVEL ITINERARY

As soon as you book a flight, hotel, rental car or other travel plan, simply forward it to plans@tripit.com and we‚Äôll automatically add it to your comprehensive itinerary. Seamlessly sync travel plans to your calendar or share them with anyone you choose.


RESERVATION DETAILS

No more frantically searching through your inbox for important details about your travel plans, like when your flight gets in or the confirmation number for your hotel. Find them in a flash with TripIt ‚Äì even when you‚Äôre offline. Access this information hands-free with Siri shortcuts!


Upload PDFs, photos, boarding passes, digital passport QR codes and more to your travel itinerary so you can track everything in one place.


MAPS AND DIRECTIONS

The TripIt app includes all the map-related tools you‚Äôll need on the go (it‚Äôs great for road trips).

-	Plot out your entire trip on Google Maps or Apple Maps
-	Quickly pull up transportation options and driving directions between two points (powered by Rome2Rio)
-	Easily locate the closest restaurants, parking, cashpoints and more


TRIPIT PRO

For roughly the price of checking your bags, upgrade to TripIt Pro to access exclusive travel perks all year long. When you upgrade, TripIt Pro will do all this for you (and more!):


‚Ä¢ Share real-time flight status alerts and check-in reminders
‚Ä¢ Notify you if you're eligible for a refund if your fare price drops after booking
‚Ä¢ Track your reward programmes and alert you if points are expiring
‚Ä¢ Navigate you through the airport with interactive maps


Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. Your TripIt Pro subscription will be good for 1 year, and automatically renew each year at $48.99 unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before your term ends. To manage your subscription, including auto-renew, visit iTunes Account Settings.


FREE TRIPIT PRO FOR SAP CONCUR USERS

If your company uses SAP Concur, you may receive complimentary TripIt Pro benefits that most travellers have to pay for. Make sure you‚Äôre connected to TripIt to get itineraries created for you as soon as you book, and receive a complimentary subscription to TripIt Pro, if you‚Äôre eligible.


For more information, see the TripIt User Agreement (https://www.tripit.com/uhp/userAgreement) and Privacy Policy (https://www.tripit.com/uhp/privacyPolicy).
releaseNotes: ‚Ä¢ Introducing our newest TripIt Pro feature, Risk Alerts! Get proactive alerts about events that have the potential to disrupt your trip, so you can modify your itinerary if needed and still enjoy your trip. Alerts may cover inclement weather, unplanned airport closures, protests or strikes, public health events and more. Enable these push notifications by toggling ‚ÄúRisks and Disruptions‚Äù to ‚ÄúOn‚Äù within Settings.

title: Moovit: Public Transport Live
description:
Moovit is one app for all your urban mobility and transport rides!

Dailymail - "This travel app is a godsend for anyone using public transport ‚Äì with live updates to bus schedules, as well as a great route-planner for cities across the UK."

Transportation is an integral part of urban living. Whether you ride the train, subway/underground /tube, bus, light rail, ferry or metro, use bikes, ride-sharing like Uber, getting the best urban mobility information is critical. Moovit guides you from point A to B in the easiest and most efficient way. Get train and bus times, maps, and live arrival times with ease so you can plan your trip with confidence. Find critical alerts and service disruptions for your favorite lines. Get step-by-step directions of optimal route bus, train, metro, bike or a combination of them. 
This is why Moovit has been named one of the best apps of the year 2017 by the App Store!

Moovit guides more than 865 million users in over 3200 cities throughout the world.

‚ñ∫ Journey Planner that combines you all transport options and gives you the best route with live arrivals.

‚ñ∫ Live Directions: Get step-by-step directions with live guidance as you travel: know exactly how long you need to walk to your station, how long you‚Äôre waiting, view the arrival time of your line and how many stops are left. 

‚ñ∫ Real time arrivals. View real-time arrival updates, which are taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains.

‚ñ∫ Real time alerts. Know about issues ahead of time by receiving service alerts such as emergency or unexpected disruptions, delays, traffic jams, new construction and more...

‚ñ∫ Users reports. Moovit‚Äôs users report issues found with stations, line service, and timetables so that we can inform all nearby riders about what‚Äôs going on in their area.

‚ñ∫ Favorite lines, stations, and places. Get easy access to lines, stations, and places you ride and visit all the time. Plus, get real-time updates if/when there are changes to your favorite lines in case your bus or train time is impacted!

‚ñ∫ Bike routes. Get bike routes in addition to the bus, subway, train, or metro trip plans. If you ride bikes (yours or shared) we can plan a route that includes the train or bus. 
Bike docking stations are updated in real-time.

‚ñ∫ Maps view. View all stations, routes, and lines on the subway or bus map. Additionally, maps are available in PDF for when you‚Äôre offline, or underground on the subway. 

Ride with Moovit in all major cities:

UK:
‚Ä¢ London
‚Ä¢ Manchester
‚Ä¢ Birmingham
‚Ä¢ Leeds
‚Ä¢ Edinburgh
‚Ä¢ Glasgow
‚Ä¢ Liverpool
‚Ä¢ Sheffield

Ireland:
‚Ä¢ Dublin and all of the Republic of Ireland. 

Moovit supports all major transit:

UK:
‚Ä¢ TFL - Bus, Tube, DLR, Overground, Ferry (River Bus), Tfl Rail, Tram, Coach
‚Ä¢ National Express
‚Ä¢ National Rail
‚Ä¢ Arriva
‚Ä¢ First
‚Ä¢ Stagecoach and more...

Ireland:
‚Ä¢ Bus Eireann
‚Ä¢ Dublin Bus
‚Ä¢ Irish Rail
‚Ä¢ Luas
‚Ä¢ Kenneally‚Äôs Bus Service and more‚Ä¶

Bike sharing provided by:
‚Ä¢ Santander Cycles in London
‚Ä¢ BelfastBikes in Belfast
‚Ä¢ Bike in Bath
‚Ä¢ Nextbike in Glasgow

India:
‚Ä¢Delhi: Delhi Metro (DMRC), Delhi Buses (DTC), Northern Railways (NR)
‚Ä¢Mumbai: Mumbai Metro (M.M.R.D.A), all buses: BEST, NMMT, KDMT, VVMT, MBMT, KMT, TMT, Ferries and more
‚Ä¢Bangalore: Namma Metro, B.M.T.C (buses and metro feeder routes), South Western Railways
‚Ä¢Chennai: Chennai Metro Rail, all buses - Metropolitan Transport Corporation (MTA)
‚Ä¢Ahmedabad: A.M.T.S, Bus Rapid Transport System (BRTS), V.T.C.O.S 
‚Ä¢Pune: Indian Railways, Pune Local Central Railways, Pune Mahanagar Parivahan Mahaman.

Singapore:
‚Ä¢ MRT, LRT, bus, tram, cable car & shuttle buses. Service provided by:
‚Ä¢ SBS
‚Ä¢ SMRT
‚Ä¢ Tower Transit
‚Ä¢ Go-Ahead Singapore

You ride, we guide!

Feel free to contact us:

https://moovitapp.zendesk.com/hc/requests/new
moovit@Facebook, Twitter

Terms of Use
https://moovitapp.com/en-us/legal/terms-of-service-en
releaseNotes:
New! Add an extra stop
Customise your trip by adding an additional stop to your route. Simply tap the + icon next to your destination.
Traveling from Liverpool to London ? New! With Moovit‚Äôs new UK-wide journey planner you can plan a ride between Regions throughout the entire UK.
New! Know ahead of time if your line arrival is being delayed due to traffic. Just look for the ‚Äútraffic‚Äù icon near your line.

title: Tips for trips
description:
This app opens the gateway to thousands of impressive places and destinations across the Czech Republic. Get inspired by seasonal tips, discover hidden treasures in every corner of our country or check out upcoming events and weekend recommendations.

Go on amazing trips with our editorial picks of seasonal and themed tips, discover lesser-known destinations in the countryside or culture and sights in cities. Easy filtering lets you navigate between constantly updated travel tips and off-the-beaten-path places. For example, you can search for family-friendly activities, choose by weather, availability, find places with free entry and much more.

With a user account, you can create lists of where you've been or make travel plans using your favorites. You can also get involved with adding your own tips and photos, creating your own statistics on traveling around the country. You can also use the different map layers, connect with timetables, recommend the best times to visit, or find parking, an ATM or support sustainable farmers. The app also provides up-to-date information on weather in places or suggests alternative tours and attractions near your chosen points of interest.

title: Hotels.com: Book Hotels & More
description:
Find and book your perfect somewhere with the Hotels.com app. 

 

GET REWARDED THROUGH OUR APP 

‚Ä¢ Access Member Prices* of 10% or more on over 100,000 hotels worldwide. 

‚Ä¢ Rewards can add up fast when you have the choice of staying at over 500,000 eligible properties worldwide‚Äîso you can get rewarded while you sleep 

‚Ä¢ Silver and Gold members can enjoy extra travel benefits at select VIP Access properties 

 
 

DON‚ÄôT LET THE NAME FOOL YOU‚ÄîWE‚ÄôRE MORE THAN JUST HOTELS 

‚Ä¢ Easily find holiday homes, apartments, resorts and more on our app‚Äîwe have every kind of property for almost every kind of trip. So, whether it‚Äôs a short business trip or a long holiday, choose from over 500,000 properties worldwide. 

‚Ä¢ Filter by theme for different types of trips 

‚Ä¢ See the property‚Äôs location with the map view ‚Ä¢ Read verified guest reviews 

‚Ä¢ Save your favourites 

 
 

FAST, EASY & SECURE BOOKING ON OUR APP 

‚Ä¢ Pay now or later on most hotels‚Äîyou choose whether you want to pay online or at the property 

‚Ä¢ Save your payment details securely to book future stays even more quickly 

‚Ä¢ Use Apple Pay¬Æ to book your stay 

‚Ä¢ Enjoy flexible booking options on most hotels* 

 

 
 

OUR APP IS YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL COMPANION 

‚Ä¢ Save your confirmation and access your booking details anytime‚Äîeven offline 

‚Ä¢ Easily manage your booking on the go. You can change or cancel if something comes up 

‚Ä¢ Help is only a few taps away. Contact us or the property directly from the app 

‚Ä¢ Opt in for push notifications and we‚Äôll send you updates about your stay 

‚Ä¢ Use Siri shortcuts to quickly access your booking details 

 

 
 

*Hotels.com Rewards is open only to individuals who are eighteen (18) and older. When you book and stay 1 night at eligible properties, you‚Äôll get 1 stamp. Collect 10 stamps and you‚Äôll get 1 reward night to redeem at a Hotels.com Rewards eligible pre-pay property (as identified on the site). The maximum value of the reward night is the average daily rate of your ten (10) stamps collected, excluding taxes and applicable fees. The value of your reward night doesn‚Äôt count towards any applicable taxes or fees. Excludes package bookings (where available) and bookings made using a coupon. Your reward nights and/or your collected stamps will expire if you have not collected a stamp and/or redeemed a reward night using your Hotels.com¬Æ Rewards account in the previous 12 months. Subject to full terms and conditions https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html. Member Prices are available to Hotels.com app users, Hotels.com Rewards members and individuals who unlock Member Prices by subscribing to Hotels.com by email. Available on selected hotels and selected dates only. Subject to full terms and conditions https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html. Free cancellation on most hotels. Some hotels require you to cancel at least 24‚Äì48 hours before check-in. See property pages on our app for details. 

 
 
 
 

The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalisation and advertising. By downloading our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html
releaseNotes: We continue to update our app to help you find your perfect somewhere.

title: Google Earth
description:
Create and collaborate on immersive, data-driven maps from anywhere, with the new Google Earth.
See the world from above with high-resolution satellite imagery, explore 3D terrain and buildings in hundreds of cities, and dive in to streets and neighbourhoods with Street View's 360¬∞ perspectives.
releaseNotes:
Thanks for using Google Earth! This version includes bug fixes.
Our recent release brings a fresh new look, with new features to help you collaborate with others across devices, create maps on the go and add photos from your camera to your maps.

title: Weather&Rain Radar RainViewer
description:
The RainViewer weather app gives you highly accurate forecasts directly from weather radars. Be prepared for rain, snow, storm, hurricane, or any other severe weather conditions. Monitor the weather radar map and check the forecast - all in one app.

RainViewer gives you access to all the essential tools needed to stay aware of the weather. This includes hyperlocal forecasts, a down-to-the-minute rain chart, weather alerts, a radar map, and widgets.

WEATHER RADAR MAP

Watch the animation to see the storm‚Äôs intensity and its path in the past, present, and future. This will give you a quick heads-up of what to expect in your area.

GLOBAL RAIN&SNOW

No radar coverage? No problem! Our "Global Rain&Snow" map layer shows real-time, satellite-based precipitation data for radar-free zones, such as oceans or deserts. Stay informed about rain and snow patterns on the map and receive alerts no matter where you are.

FORECAST

Get the most important weather information with hourly and daily forecasts that help you plan your days better. Check the minute-by-minute rain forecast when it starts to rain, so you'll know when the rain stops and avoid getting wet.

WEATHER ALERTS

Get notified when the rain starts and ends with our precise Rain Alerts. Additionally, RainViewer provides you with crucial tools for your safety - severe weather alerts to notify you of upcoming critical weather conditions. Set up alerts and stay ahead of the weather.

WIDGETS

Small things can make your life easier, like widgets. Set them up to get quick weather updates without even unlocking your phone. Stay informed and be prepared for any weather, right from your lock or home screen.

LIVE ACTIVITY

Quickly check the weather with RainViewer‚Äôs Live Activity. It shows a minute-by-minute precipitation forecast, rain intensity, and the time left until the end of the rain.

STORM DIRECTION ARROWS

The storm direction arrows on the map show the exact direction and path of the storm's precipitation. This in-app feature can help you better understand the storm movement and plan accordingly.

DATA PRIVACY

We value your privacy. RainViewer doesn't personify or sell user data. With your geolocation, we enhance weather features like real-time location updates, precise forecasts, and alerts.

The RainViewer app is the ultimate weather tool, precise and reliable. But there's more, our in-app features take it to the next level:

‚Ä¢ Precipitation arrows on the radar map
‚Ä¢ Radar animation forecasts for the next 2 hours
‚Ä¢ Extended daily and hourly forecasts
‚Ä¢ 48-hour map archives
‚Ä¢ Weather tracking in up to 20 locations
‚Ä¢ No distracting ads

Premium features are available through an in-app monthly subscription for ¬£4.99 or an annual subscription for ¬£21.49. Subscriptions renew automatically each month or year unless cancelled in your App Store account settings. For more information, please refer to https://rainviewer.com/privacy-policy.html and https://rainviewer.com/terms.html.

title: Emirates
description:
Explore the world your way with the personalised Emirates App for iPhone and Apple Watch. 

1. SEARCH AND BOOK YOUR NEXT GETAWAY
Search for flights to over 150 destinations around the world, and complete your entire booking through the app.

2. MANAGE YOUR TRIP ON THE GO
Choose your meal and seat preference, and add services such as Chauffeur-drive. It‚Äôs easy to update your details, and you can view your full itinerary at any time - even when you‚Äôre offline.

3. DOWNLOAD YOUR BOARDING PASS
Check in online and download your boarding pass. You can print it, or send it to your phone via SMS or email to use it as a digital boarding pass.
On The Emirates App for iPhone and iPad you can download your boarding pass directly to Wallet.

4. GET REAL-TIME FLIGHT UPDATES
We‚Äôll send you real-time information about your check-in, departure gate, boarding time, baggage belt and more, straight to your personal device. Tailor the app to your needs by choosing which notifications you want to receive.

5. GET THE MOST OUT OF EMIRATES SKYWARDS
Explore ways to earn and spend your Skywards Miles directly within the app. Enjoy easy access to information about your tier status, benefits and Skywards Miles balance, and manage your account wherever you are.

6. THE EMIRATES APP FOR APPLE WATCH 
Get live travel updates at a glance. The app reminds you when it‚Äôs time to board, lets you know if there‚Äôs a change to your flight and tells you where to pick up your bags when you land ‚Äì all without you reaching for your phone.
releaseNotes:
We‚Äôve made general updates and bug fixes to make using the app even easier.  
 
Help us improve The Emirates App by telling us what you think. Open the app and go to More to fill out the feedback form, or email us at theemiratesapp@emirates.com.

title: Gastromapa Luk√°≈°e Hejl√≠ka
description:
It's been already 5 years, since Luk√°≈° Hejl√≠k embarked on a quest to uncover all Bohemian and Moravian gastronomic secrets. Everyday, he drops a new tip on where it is worth to stop for brunch, lunch or a drink.

So far, he has visited 1,500 places, of which 1,000 are in this app. This app will help you uncover the hidden gems of Czech gastronomy.

Plan a trip and let Gastromapa be your guide.

The application would not exist were it not for its proud partner, craft mineral water Krondorf.

title: PID L√≠taƒçka
description:
The PID L√≠taƒçka app allows you to have all the necessary information about your journey at your fingertips.

The PID L√≠taƒçka mobile app is a comprehensive guide to transport in Prague and the Central Bohemian Region. It enables you to find current public transport connections based on your location and also recommends the type of ticket you need for your journey. The app works with up-to-date data about closures, disruptions, and so on. If you wish to use the app for buying tickets regularly, you can create an account and have your tickets safely under control. You can store your payment card in the app and pay with a single click, or use Google/Apple Pay. The app allows you to purchase tickets in advance and activate them gradually before boarding a vehicle. Furthermore, you can purchase a subscription ticket (coupon) from 1 month up to 1 year directly in the app.

A new feature in PID L√≠taƒçka is the ability to pay for parking in paid parking zones throughout Prague. This new functionality allows you to store the license plates of your personal and company vehicles and pay for parking as easily and quickly as for a ticket.

The app can be used even without registration.

What else does the app offer?

-Check-in via the mobile app, or the possibility to use the mobile app as an identifier for long-term time tickets
-Find the fastest connection including closures and restrictions, and optimal tickets for your journeys
-Display a map of connections including navigation to the stop
-Display the status of your long-term coupon and your identifiers
-Buy tickets in advance with the option of later activation if necessary
-Forward an unactivated ticket to another person who can simply activate it themselves
-Purchase up to 10 tickets and activate multiple of them at once, for example for family and friends
-Display current departures from the stop, including delays
-Show an overview of nearby stops, passing lines, ticket sales locations
-Display a map of P+R parking lots and their occupancy
-Browse current closures, disruptions, or news in transport
-Monitor the status of barrier-free facilities
-Ability to pay for parking in paid parking zones throughout Prague
-The option to use Google/Apple Pay for payment, or click to pay

title: Tiqets - Museums & Attractions
description:
The Tiqets app opens the doors of culture to those who don‚Äôt want to wait in culture‚Äôs long lines! Whether you‚Äôre at home or already traveling, you can browse cultural attractions, read venue reviews, and purchase paperless tickets without leaving the app. With tickets delivered instantly to your smartphone, and many skip-the-line options, never again must you spend needless time waiting in line.

Skip-the-line tickets - no waiting at hundreds of venues
Mobile tickets - tickets right on your smartphone, be it online or offline. No printing required
Secure payments - pay for your tickets quickly and safely with a wide range of payment methods 
Inspiration - insider tips and trusted reviews to help you plan your trip
Quality information - all required directions and opening hours in one place

Top Cities
Amsterdam, New York, Paris, Rome, Barcelona, London, Berlin, Budapest, Las Vegas, Florence and many, many others.

Top Venues
Sagrada Familia, Vatican Museums & Sistine Chapel, Louvre, Park G√ºell, Rijksmuseum, Burj Khalifa, Prado Museum, Mus√©e d‚ÄôOrsay, Heineken Experience, Van Gogh Museum, 9/11 Memorial and Museum and more, so much more.

This app may contain translations powered by Google to help make content accessible in your own language.
releaseNotes: Embark on a captivating journey with the latest Tiqets App update. Our refreshed onboarding flow now delivers a sleeker and more intuitive introduction to our platform. Dive headfirst into seamless exploration from the very moment you start using the app.
reviews: Really, helped us a lot ü§ß | Beware of this app for Italy. We were in Rome and Pompei. Tickets via this app are ~30% than real prices in offices. | vyborn√©, rychl√© a p≈ôehledn√© | Prices in app are about 30% higher than normal prices. Sometimes it can save you time in the line. But you can always find another way how to buy tickets without waiting in line.

title: RegioJet
description:
Easy booking and search of train and bus tickets - Tickets to more than 90 European cities - Free cancellation 15 minutes prior the departure
Travel across Czechia, Slovakia, and Europe with yellow trains or buses

Save your time
- easy search of train and bus tickets across Czechia and Europe
- fast booking including a seat reservation
- free ticket cancellation 15 minutes prior the departure

Save your money
- affordable prices for signed up customers (Credit ticket)
- exclusive ticket deals
- safe online payments

All information in one app
- quick, simple, clear
- booking history
- timetables and a map of the stops
- search history

Some notes for improvements
- App often logs me out, often it happens right before I need to show the ticket to a bus driver and it's super stress inducing, if I hadn't had my credentials saved in keychain I'd probably use the email QR code
- When the ticket is open with the QR code showing and you leave the app and return, the on appear refreshes the view sometimes taking a long time before showing again, also stress inducing when the bus driver is waiting, would recommend a little smarter silent refresh without the presentation breaking
- Not sure if this is intentional and probably backend related but sometimes theres only a few seats left in the map (bus) if i only have one passenger selected and then if I select two most of the bus is empty. It happened to me a couple of times that i was offered 3 seats available and then the bus was empty.

Love the live activity! Would love it even more if there was a precise location tracking just like FlixBus has it.

title: App in the Air: Flights Hotels
description:
App in the Air: Your Personal Travel Assistant.

Editors Choice ‚óÜ‚óÜ Best of 2018 (Watch app) ‚óÜ‚óÜ Featured in Forbes, Wired, CBS News, Lonely Planet, Travel+Leisure and more.

App in the Air is the single place to track all your itineraries, boarding passes and manage your miles across airlines. Avoid hours of managing flight details through multiple apps by using App in the Air, your personal travel assistant that understands your flying needs and loyalties. Our app is the single place to track all your itineraries, boarding passes and manage your miles across airlines. Even more: app works offline (gate changes and flight status updates are delivered via SMS which requires no data roaming). What‚Äôs not to love? Book with app in the know, on the go. 
 
EXCLUSIVE FEATURES:
Real time updates: We‚Äôll remind you about any flight status changes and when to check-in, even without the Internet.
Apple Watch support: track your current flight, stay healthy by taking in-flight courses, get time to gate and security wait times, explore the landmarks you're flying over. Apple Watch revolutionary Glances and Force Touch make the app experience even better!
Track your loyalty points through our partnerships with all major airlines and hotels.
Manage your time at the airport. Find places to eat, WiFi passwords and much more
Network with fellow frequent flyers through our ‚Äònearby‚Äô feature, connecting you with travelers in the airport at the same time as you.
Stay informed about your flight history: hours, miles, cities and even aircrafts you‚Äôve flown.

GLOBAL FLIGHT COVERAGE:
North American Airlines: American, Delta, United, Southwest, Air Canada, JetBlue, Alaska, WestJet, Aeromexico, Spirit & more.
Over 1,000 airlines worldwide: KLM, Ryanair, China Eastern, Lufthansa, LATAM, China Southern, easyJet, Singapore, British Airways and others.
All major US airports: Hartsfield-Jackson, Los Angeles (LAX), O'Hare, Dallas/Fort Worth (DFW), Denver International, JFK, SFO, Charlotte and much more.
Busiest world airports - over 5000: Heathrow, Beijing, Haneda, Dubai, Paris-Charles de Gaulle, Hong Kong, Frankfurt, Istanbul, Soekarno-Hatta and others.
All airline alliances: Skyteam, Star Alliance and Oneworld.

TRACK YOUR LOYALTY POINTS:
Airlines: AirMiles Canada, British Airways Executive Club, JetBlue TrueBlue, Lufthansa Miles & More, Spirit Airlines FREE SPIRIT and more
Hotels: IHG Rewards Club, Starwood Preferred Guest, Le Club Accorhotels and others
Cars: Avis Preferred, Hertz Gold Plus Rewards, Enterprise Plus, Dollar EXPRESS and more

INTEGRATIONS: 
Import all your previous and upcoming flights via connecting your email account 
Import all your previous and upcoming flights via TripIt
Email forward your e-ticket information to myflight@appintheair.com

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION:
An annual subscription gives you real-time flight status updates, automated check-in and option to subscribe your family via SMS. Your first year subscription will be charged to your iTunes account once you confirm your purchase. 
Price varies by region and is currently $29.99.
Your subscription will automatically renew each year at the current subscription rate, and this amount will be charged to your account within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription year/month. 
To manage your subscription or stop it from automatically renewing, simply go to Account Settings and turn off automatic renewal at least 24 hours before your renewal date. No refunds will be issued after the annual subscription fee has been charged. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited once a subscription is purchased. 
 
Try the premium version now with a trial period. Have questions? Feel free to email us anytime: support@appintheair.com
releaseNotes:
Dear friends, our fresh version 8.7.8 is out now and contains some bug fixes and improvements

If you like the update we would be happy to see your review on the AppStore!

Questions / Suggestions? Write to us 24/7 at support@appintheair.com 

Let‚Äôs keep flying!

Sincerely, The App in the Air Crew

In last version watch complication does not work. Everyrhing up to date. | Super | Updates in last year are all about introducing more ways to monetize, but no real advantages or improvements added‚Ä¶ Skip this app

Let me be clear about this - as a long time user of this application and occasional subscriber (my subscription recently expired), I was shocked that they recently blocked basic functionality that was for free until now and they started to force users to pay for subscription instead. I would gladly subscribe if that would brought me some new functionality. As a matter of fact, application haven‚Äôt been extended with new functionality for a very long time (we‚Äôre talking years) and instead it was more and more stripped off good ones. title: CheckMyTrip ‚Äì Travel Itinerary
description:
CheckMyTrip is your digital travel assistant, bringing you flight information and alerts, travel services and extras to get you smoothly from door to door. And it‚Äôs free.  

Ideal for both business and leisure travelers, CheckMyTrip will help you travel smooth, reduce stress and stay on top of your travel plans.

SMART TRIP ITINERARIES
- Real-time updates of your flight bookings for FREE, including delays, cancellations and terminal changes plus layover times  
- View your trip in a master itinerary with all your bookings, including flight and accommodation, both online and off  

ADDING TRIPS IS EASY  
3 simple ways to add and organize your itinerary details.  
- Forward booking confirmation e-mails to trips@checkmytrip.com  
- Ask your assistant to import the trip automatically by using your booking reference number  
- Send the trip details to your assistant to create the trip for you  

DIGITAL ASSISTANT  
Your personal travel assistant to help you at every step of your trip.  
- Flight delay, cancellation, boarding gate notifications  
- Check-in reminders 
- 5-day weather forecast  
- Search and reserve airport transfer and lounge  
- Recommendations for local activities  

**IMPORTANT REMINDER**  
CHECKMYTRIP IS NOT A TRAVEL BOOKING AGENCY  
We only display information related to the trip details you add to your CheckMyTrip account. To modify, cancel or source additional information about your air, hotel, car, rail, taxi, parking, tour and activity booking, contact the provider directly for assistance.

We respect your privacy. Check our privacy policy. https://checkmytrip.com/privacy-policy  

By downloading the app, you accept the Terms & Conditions of use. https://checkmytrip.com/terms-and-conditions/  

If you have any questions, please contact us by e-mail at feedback@checkmytrip.com
releaseNotes:
In this release, we've added two exciting features to enhance your travel experience:
- Easily sync your travel plans with any calendar app, keeping essential details at your fingertips for a smooth journey.
- Your feedback matters! Share your thoughts by rating CheckMyTrip directly through the app, guiding us to continually improve and tailor the experience to your needs.

title: Expedia: Travel, Hotel, Flight
description:
The Expedia app is your all-in-one travel companion, making it fast, easy, and convenient to find and save on all your amazing adventures ahead. Dreaming of a beach vacation in Spain? Or a romantic getaway in Paris? Whatever your reason to escape, you‚Äôll find Member Prices to help you get there for a great price. 

Members get more through the app, including: 
- Save an average of 15% or more off thousands of hotels with Member Prices
- Double points on all eligible app bookings*
- Chat GPT integration: Get your travel-related questions answered with expert insight and personalized recommendations with the launch of our AI-powered trip planner. 
- Know when to book flights with price tracking
- In-trip extras as your status rises, like free room upgrades and late checkout 

Simply log in, or join for free to begin enjoying your Expedia member benefits. 

Why else should I use the app? 

- Explore over a million flights, hotels, rental cars, packages, attractions, and more 
- Enjoy free cancellation on most hotels. Because flexibility matters.* 
- Get extra savings when you bundle flights and hotels 
- Find car rentals in as little as 30 minutes 
- Plan for fun with deals on tours, shows, theme parks, and other attractions 
- Keep all your travel reservations in one place 
- Browse inspiring travel guides  
- Helpful alerts for flight delays, gate changes, and more 

 Download the Expedia app now to have everything you need for your next getaway at hand. 


*These offers are only available to Expedia members. The discount will be applied to the price of selected hotels (excluding applicable taxes and other fees). Prices displayed include the promotional discount and are per room, per night, based on two people sharing a room. Blackout periods may apply and a minimum hotel stay may be required. Please check individual hotel for details. Offers are subject to limited availability and may be discontinued without notice. Expedia‚Äôs usual booking terms and conditions apply. Bonus point offers are calculated on the base points earned for an eligible booking only and are not calculated on any bonus points earned for being Silver or Gold members, or otherwise. Free cancellation on most hotels. Some hotels require you to cancel at least 24-48 hours before check-in. See property pages on our app for details. 
Price Predictions are not a guarantee. Available to Expedia members on select routes.


The Expedia app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By using our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies.
releaseNotes: Thanks for exploring the world with Expedia as your on-the-go travel companion. This update contains bug fixes and performance improvements to make your digital experience as smooth as possible. Bon voyage, traveller!

title: park4night.com
description:
Share places where it is good to rest. With motorhomes, campervans and converted vans. 

With Park4night find and share the places where you enjoyed to relax, spend the night, have a picnic or clear your head. 

Uncover the hidden places, close to nature that gave you a feeling of freedom. Forests, beautiful views, parks, creeks, beaches, ... 

Inform the community of possible activities around (Windsurf / Kitesurf, Biking, Hiking) ... 

NEW (PREPARE YOUR TRIP) :

- Download all information into your device

If you have suggestions, ideas, please let us know: 
- Post a comment. 
- Contact us by email (contact@park4night.com) ------------------------------------------------ 
Ideas for future versions: 

- All good ideas from users.

title: Bolt: Request a Ride
description:
Use your smartphone to order a ride, get picked up by a nearby driver, and enjoy a low-cost trip to your destination.

Why choose Bolt? 
‚Ä¢ Get a comfortable, low-cost ride.
‚Ä¢ Fast arrival times, 24/7.
‚Ä¢ See the price of your ride before you order.
‚Ä¢ You can pay inside the app (Credit/Debit/Apple Pay).

Easily request a ride with the Bolt app:
1. Open the app and set your destination;
2. Request a driver to pick you up;
3. See your driver's location on the real-time map;
4. Enjoy the ride to your destination;
5. Leave a rating and pay.

Bolt is available in 45 countries and 400 cities around the world.

Bolt‚Äôs mission is to bring fast, reliable and affordable transportation to millions of people around the world, while also helping thousands of drivers support their families. The next time you need a ride, take Bolt!

Earn extra money driving with Bolt. Sign up at https://partners.bolt.eu

Questions? Get in touch via info@bolt.eu or at https://bolt.eu

Follow us on social media for updates, discounts and offers!

Facebook ‚Äî https://www.facebook.com/BoltUnitedKingdom/
Instagram ‚Äî https://www.instagram.com/bolt_uk/
Twitter ‚Äî https://twitter.com/Boltapp

title: Waze Navigation & Live Traffic
description:
Waze is a community driven navigation app that helps millions of users get to where they‚Äôre going through real-time road alerts and an up-to-the-moment map. Thanks to our network of drivers, Waze saves you time by instantly alerting you to traffic, roadworks, crashes, police and more. From traffic-avoiding reroutes, real-time safety updates and low petrol price alerts, Waze is a community of drivers helping other drivers.


With Waze you‚Ä¶


‚Ä¢ Get there faster: traffic-avoiding route updates
‚Ä¢ Avoid tickets: know where police, speed cameras and red light cameras are located
‚Ä¢ More accurate ETAs: based on live traffic, roadworks, weather and more
‚Ä¢ Community-based navigation: real-time updates from other drivers
‚Ä¢ Save money: find the cheapest fuel along your route
‚Ä¢ Avoid tolls: see toll pricing when you choose a route
‚Ä¢ Use Apple CarPlay: sync Waze to your car‚Äôs built-in display
‚Ä¢ Live Speedometer: get alerts when you‚Äôre speeding and avoid costly tickets
‚Ä¢ Customize your drive: get directions from your favourite celebs and characters
‚Ä¢ No app switching: use your favorite audio apps right from Waze


Drive safer and smarter, with Waze!


You can manage your in-app Waze Privacy Settings at any time. Learn more about the Waze privacy policy here, www.waze.com/legal/privacy.


Waze directions are not intended for emergency or oversized vehicles.
releaseNotes:
Saving time & avoiding traffic is even easier with this update:

Fixed bugs to ensure you can update fuel prices in Waze successfully.

title: Uber - Request a ride
description:
We‚Äôre committed to your safety at Uber. We‚Äôve established a Door-to-Door Safety Standard to help you feel safe every time you take a trip.

And with Uber, your destination is at your fingertips. Just open the app and enter where you want to go, and a nearby driver will help you get there reliably.

TAKE A TRIP FROM ALMOST ANYWHERE
Request a trip from 600+ airports and in 10,000+ cities around the world. The Uber app is a great way to make your travel plans stress-free. Request a trip on demand or schedule one ahead of time.    

TAKE A TRIP TO ALMOST ANYWHERE
Whether you‚Äôre looking for style, space or affordability, Uber can help you find the perfect trip to fit your needs:

Enjoy elegance and premium features with Uber Exec
Ride with extra room (and more of your friends) with UberXL

Uber Travel
Whether it's your usual commute by train, escaping the city with friends in a hire car, a coach trip to Cambridge, or even the Eurostar to Paris, you can now go anywhere with Uber.

All of these transport options and more are available in one place with the Uber app.

SEE PRICE ESTIMATES
With Uber, you can see your price estimate up front before booking. That means you‚Äôll always have an idea of what you‚Äôll pay before requesting your trip.

YOUR SAFETY DRIVES US
We‚Äôre committed to making every trip with Uber as safe as possible. That's why ‚Äì in addition to our Door-to-Door Safety Standard ‚Äì we've built new safety features and updated our Community Guidelines for respectful and positive experiences.

You can share your trip
Give your loved ones peace of mind while you‚Äôre on a trip ‚Äì you can share your location and trip status so they know you‚Äôve made it to your destination.

You can contact emergency services
You can call the emergency services directly from the app, and your location and trip details will be displayed so you can share them quickly with emergency services.

TIP AND RATE YOUR DRIVER
After every trip, you can submit a rating along with comments. You can also let your driver know you appreciated your experience by adding a tip for them directly in the app.

Not all products are available in all markets.

To see if Uber is available in your city, visit https://www.uber.com/cities
Follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/uber
Like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/uber

Questions? Visit uber.com/help
releaseNotes:
We update the Uber app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in the latest update:

- Updates to improve localization across the app
- Various bug fixes & improvements
  
Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps the Uber engine running. 
Any questions? Tap Help in the Uber app or visit help.uber.com.

title: Revolut - Mobile Finance
description:
Join the 40+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK customers only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay ‚Äî you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut Ôºú18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly ‚Äî set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore Stock Trading (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start trading stocks from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Stock trading services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (FRN: 832790), an appointed representative of Resolution Compliance Limited (FRN:574048) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA).

End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don‚Äôt be ‚Äî we‚Äôll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that‚Äôs right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks ‚Äì up to ¬£85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‚Äòem in the bud
- It‚Äôs our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We‚Äôre available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (Firm Reference 900562). Registered address: 7 Westferry Circus, Canary Wharf, London, England, E14 4HD.

Welcome to Revolut.

We‚Äôve made some tweaks and improvements under the hood in this version to make your Revolut experience even smoother.

title: momondo: Flights, Hotels, Cars
description:
Find, compare & book flights, hotels, and car hire with momondo‚Äôs beautiful all-in-one travel and reservation app

We believe that everybody should be able to travel - and there's no better place to start dreaming and planning than the momondo app. A beautiful, user-friendly design makes it easy to search and compare from hundreds of travel sites at once. Find just the right flight, hotel or car hire for your next holiday or business trip, at great prices. Save on travel deals with exclusive Mobile Rates available only on the app.

FIND THE BEST FLIGHT DEALS AVAILABLE FROM 900+ TRAVEL SITES
‚Ä¢ We search major airlines, low cost carriers and travel agencies to give you an easy overview of all the airfare options
‚Ä¢ We highlight airline ticket options with no change fees, to make it easy to book with flexibility
‚Ä¢ With this reservation app, you can make a flight booking directly from your device, wherever you are
‚Ä¢ Filter plane tickets by the factors that matter to you, including number of stops, departure and arrival time, duration, airlines and ticket type
‚Ä¢ Cheapest, quickest or best flight deal? With one click you can see which ticket is the best deal according to your needs
‚Ä¢ Not ready to book? Save your results for later, or share them via email or text
‚Ä¢ Search without worry - the prices you see are never affected by your searches
‚Ä¢ Beautiful and easy to use ‚Äì finding the perfect plane ticket doesn‚Äôt have to be tricky and dull

SEARCH THOUSANDS OF CAR RENTAL OFFERS AT ONCE
‚Ä¢ See rental car deals in 70,000+ locations
‚Ä¢ Filter your search to see eco-friendly options like hybrids and electric vehicles
‚Ä¢ Easily filter to only see car hire with free cancellation and enhanced cleaning
‚Ä¢ Total transparency, no surprises -  see the total cost of your car rental up-front

SEE DEALS FROM 3M+ HOTELS AND HOLIDAY HOMES IN ONE PLACE
‚Ä¢ Search from all the major booking, accommodation, and rental comparison sites as well as individual hotel websites to find the best place to stay
‚Ä¢ Use our filter to find stays with free cancellation, so you can cancel and re-book a hotel or holiday rental for free if you find a better deal
‚Ä¢ See ratings based on millions of real guest reviews, so you know what everyone else is saying about a property before you book
‚Ä¢ Looking for something close to home? Get inspired with amazing hotel deals right here in the UK.
‚Ä¢ Find last minute hotel deals with the Around Me Tonight feature
‚Ä¢ Sort accommodation results by cheapest, closest, best review, or most popular
‚Ä¢ Search by the amenities that matter most to you
‚Ä¢ Beautiful and user-friendly ‚Äì finding a place to stay has never looked this good or been this easy

A PERSONALISED SEARCH EXPERIENCE
‚Ä¢ Create your own momondo profile to keep everything the way you like it
‚Ä¢ Not just a reservation app. Save and sync your preferences, your search history and all your favourite flights and hotels
‚Ä¢ Search from one device ‚Äì and book from another.

LOOKING FOR INSPIRATION?
Not sure where to go? Our Explore feature makes it easy to find destinations within your budget. Your next best holiday destination may be somewhere you‚Äôve never even heard of!

Download the momondo travel app now and open your world.
releaseNotes: We fixed some bugs here and there to make our app even better.

title: Trainline: Book train tickets
description:
Welcome aboard Trainline. Travel confidently with Europe‚Äôs leading train and coach app.

We‚Äôve made it quick and easy for you to travel across the UK and the rest of Europe by rail and road. Book tickets for Avanti West Coast, GWR, LNER, National Express and more. You can even plan your international trips by train or bus across 45 countries in Europe and the rest of the world, including the UK, France, Italy, Spain and Germany. And if you‚Äôre looking for some travel inspiration, why not check our pick of popular journeys?


Plus, you‚Äôll always be in control of your trip thanks to our live train timetable (for UK rail, Trenitalia, Renfe, and SNCF routes), price alerts, mobile tickets / etickets and seat selection (where available).

Get live train times, railcards, mobile tickets / etickets and seat selection. Safe travel is our top priority - use contactless travel and crowd alerts to find out how busy your train is.

Why Trainline?
‚Ä¢	Book all your train and coach journeys in one place.
‚Ä¢	Compare travel options from 220 rail and coach companies.
‚Ä¢	Quickly find the cheapest UK Advance tickets.
‚Ä¢	Ask Siri how your journey‚Äôs doing.
‚Ä¢	Pay in your preferred currency. Available in GBP, USD, EUR, AUD, CAD, CHF, and SEK.
‚Ä¢	Get great discounts like GroupSave 34%. (GroupSave is a discount of up to 34% for adults travelling on a single or return journey at Off-Peak or Super Off-Peak times in groups of three to nine people.)
‚Ä¢	Skip station queues using tickets on your phone (selected routes).
‚Ä¢	Find carriages with available seats.
‚Ä¢	Book in advance or on the day of travel.
‚Ä¢	Buy your tickets with Apple Pay, PayPal, and all major credit cards and debit cards.

Save money with cheap UK Advance tickets. Once you‚Äôve booked your tickets, save them to your phone and use live train times, platform numbers or delay info to keep your trip on track.


Have you considered coach? Book coach tickets with Trainline and you‚Äôll get air conditioning, free WiFi and VUER ‚Äì National Express‚Äô onboard entertainment system. Start your search and if there‚Äôs a coach available, we‚Äôll show you the options. No need to print tickets either because with etickets, your phone is all you need.
Trust Trainline to get you where you need to be.


In the UK we partner with Avanti West Coast, London North Eastern Railway, London North, Western Railway, Great Western Railway (GWR), South Western Railway, London

Overground, TfL Rail, Gatwick Express, Heathrow Connect, Heathrow Express, Stansted Express, ScotRail, Greater Anglia, East Midlands Trains, West Midlands Railway, Thameslink, Southeastern, Southern Rail, c2c, Caledonian Sleeper, Chiltern Railways, CrossCountry, Hull Trains, Island Line, Grand Central Railway, Mersey Rail and TransPennine Express.



Eurostar (France and Belgium)
SNCF (France)
TGV Lyria (France)
Thalys (France)
Renfe (Spain)
Trenitalia (Italy)
Italo (Italy)
Deutsche Bahn (Germany)
√ñBB (Austria)
SBB (Switzerland)
SNCB (Belgium)
NS (the Netherlands)
Alsa (Spain) and Flixbus

You‚Äôll always get the best fare for every journey and with every carrier. So, download your FREE Trainline app and get access to live train times and cheap train and coach tickets across the UK & Europe.


To find out more, see our FAQs: https://www.thetrainline.com/en/help/


Follow Trainline on social:
‚Ä¢	Our blog: www.thetrainline.com/blog
‚Ä¢	Facebook: facebook.com/thetrainlinecom
‚Ä¢	Twitter: twitter.com/thetrainline
‚Ä¢	Instagram: @trainline
releaseNotes:
The little things matter

This update lays the rails for essential fixes and improvements.

You might not notice any visual changes, but we‚Äôve done some work in the back-end to improve our app‚Äôs performance.
reviews: I would like to post my review on this company. The interface was friendly and nice, thought can‚Äôt put same characteristics about the service. I was buying tickets from Prague to Vienna, i was surprised that in application i can‚Äôt choose sits even though i was buying first class with and paying for sits. I was assuming that this option will be available during the payment, i selected that we want to be sit near the window as preference. But after that no sit choosing, It didn‚Äôt give me such option even after i paid, so i wrote to support team because me and my fianc√© were sat separately. They told me that they can‚Äôt do any changes in sittings and our tickets can‚Äôt be changed or refunded. But we can come on the train and agree with other passengers if they are willing to change places. So basically you would need to buy new tickets. Then i went to website of Czech Railways and there you could choose sits even before you paid, and tickets in 1st class cost 100 euros less!!! I was very upset so i would recommend people - if you want to chose sits better use different companies or applications and check the market wisely | The transit time between our booked tickets were so short that when our first train had a slight delay, we missed the rest of our trains and there was no refund or any help to book a substitute ticket. Very dissappointed. | No idea what have I done wrong but the app says it‚Äôs unable to accept my payment even if my card detsils are filled corectly. And it work on laptop websites. Otherwise, I love this app, makes my traveling around the UK way too easier. | I don t have any problem with this app... | This app works really well :-)

title: Agoda: Cheap Flights & Hotels
description:
Experience the world with Agoda, the ultimate app for booking your travel plans. Find cheap flights and affordable hotels in just a few taps! 

Booking international or domestic flights on Agoda is seamless. Discover countless airfare deals across 200 airlines worldwide. Our unique search engine compares flights and prices in near real-time  so you can book the best deal as soon as it drops.

Booking hotels, resorts, villas, homes, BnBs, and more is even easier now with over 3.9 million  accommodations available to book in 39 languages and currencies. Make the most of your hotel search with filters, hi-res photos, map views, local information, and over 28 million  verified reviews. On Agoda, you can even discover hotel rooms tailored to your travel needs and preferred budget. 

Want to earn? With Agoda Homes, you can become a host and start earning from your own property. 

Travel with confidence! See the world for less, with up to 80% off from Member Offers , Last-Minute Deals, and much more. Book a flight. Book a hotel. Book an unforgettable vacation with massive savings on Agoda. 

AGODA FEATURES
CHEAP FLIGHTS WITH JUST A TAP
- Search for affordable flights from over 200 airlines, flying to almost any destination
- Book flights knowing you‚Äôre getting a highly competitive price 
- Save your info and adjust your flight booking directly in the app

BOOK A ROOM EASILY 
- Choose from over 3.9 million  properties across the globe
- Reserve your next stay whether it‚Äôs a hotel, resort, villa, home, BnB, vacation rental, or anything in between
- Travel confidently! Read user reviews, view pictures, and browse local information

DEALS MADE FOR AFFORDABLE TRAVEL
- Save on trips with extraordinary deals on cheap flights and budget-friendly accommodations
- Plan your trip, travel, and fulfill your wanderlust without breaking the bank
- Enjoy a variety of special offers , with secret deals, discounts, and more

TRAVEL WORRY-FREE
-  Save your vouchers, details, and maps directly in the app for easy check-in and print-free travel
- Manage or edit your booking anytime, anywhere
- Need help? Agoda's Customer Support is available 24/7 in various languages to ensure your journey is both smooth and cost-efficient

releaseNotes:
Agoda now offers flights! Your trusted accommodation partner now brings you the very best updated deals on flights to your destination. So you can book your room and your flight from one great app, knowing you'll get the lowest price on both and 24/7 customer support. And with the Agoda Widget, you can stay on top of great deals and travel ideas!

Other recent improvements include:
- Find your next great destination with the Agoda Widget
- Send messages to a property when you have a question
- Easily recognize homes & apartments in search (pink stars)
- Host mode for Agoda Homes hosts (list your home on agoda.com/homes)

Explore, travel safely, and keep in touch!

It's Possible.

title: Lime - #RideGreen
description:
You have places to be and people to see. Get there easily and on time with an emissions-free Lime e-bike or e-scooter! 

START YOUR RIDE IN 3 STEPS
Step 1
Download the app, create an account and accept our terms and conditions https://www.li.me/user-agreement
Privacy Notice 
https://www.li.me/legal/privacy-policy/ 

Step 2 
Find a nearby Lime vehicle on the map (vehicle availability depends on your city and supply)

Step 3
Unlock your vehicle by scanning the QR code, entering the plate number, or by tapping a button on the app.
RIDE RESPONSIBLY
A safe community starts with riding responsibly. It‚Äôs important to remember the rules of the road before every ride. You should always:

- Ride in bike lanes, never on sidewalks
- Wear a helmet when you ride
- Park clear of walkways, driveways and access ramps
- Visit https://safety.li.me/ to learn more

#RIDEGREEN
Lime is on a mission to build a future where transportation is shared, affordable and carbon-free.


You can read more about Lime‚Äôs products and services, including how we calculate our prices in our terms and conditions https://www.li.me/user-agreement.
