title: SmartGuide travel guide & map
description:
Smart Guide ‚Äì Where All Journeys Begin
You Explore, We‚Äôll Guide

SmartGuide is your personal tour guide to the world. Turn your phone into a personal audio tour guide to accompany you on your travel adventures.
Whether you are looking for a self-guided tour, audio traveler guide, city offline maps or you just want to know all the best sightseeing spots, fun activities, and authentic experiences for your travel destination, SmartGuide is the perfect choice for your travel guide needs.

ONE DIGITAL GUIDE APP FOR THE WHOLE WORLD
This personal guide app offers travel guides for over 1000 popular destinations around the world. Wherever your journey may take you, SmartGuide tours will meet you there!
You explore. We‚Äôll guide.

SAFE CONTACT-LESS TOUR GUIDE
Crowded tour groups from all around the world are a prime breeding ground for respiratory viruses and similar bugs. This is not a souvenir you want to bring from your trip. Our virtual tour guide recommends different places to each tourist based on their individual interests and guides you safely outside of the crowds. Stay safe with a self-guided tour.

AUDIO GUIDE
The personal travel planner app is your audio guide to the world that lets you conveniently listen to a travel guide with interesting narratives from local guides that play automatically when you reach an interesting sight. Just let your phone talk to you and enjoy the scenery!

FREE SELF-GUIDED TOURS
SmartGuide won‚Äôt let you get lost and you won't miss any must-see sights. City-guide app uses GPS navigation to guide you around the city at your convenience at your own pace, for free. Gone are the days when you had to follow the crowd. Now you can use SmartGuide and travel whenever you want, however you want.
Sightseeing guide for the modern tripwolf on the hunt for undiscovered wonders of nature!

FIND HIDDEN GEMS AND ESCAPE TOURIST TRAPS
With extra local secrets, our guides provide you with inside information about the best spots off the beaten path. Escape the traps when you visit a city and immerse yourself in the culture trip. Get around like a local and discover the actual culture and heritage of any locality!

EVERYTHING IS OFFLINE.
Download your city guide and get the offline maps and guide with our premium option so you have the freedom to roam and discover the world like the tripwolf that you are, without worrying one bit about finding an internet connection. Your travel guide will be available offline in the form of verbal instructions from natives and if you are someone that prefers reading over listening, the transcripts of the audio guides are also available.

Get the most out of your world travel experience by exploring with SmartGuide: Your Personal Travel Audio Guide!

title: BeeSpeaker Learn English
description:
BzZzZz! Join our hive and start communicating smoothly in foreign languages. It has never been easier to learn English!

BeeSpeaker is a true revolution and the first-ever app totally devoted to learning to speak English. It‚Äôs a voice-controlled tool, based on modern machine learning technology, which offers much more than just one-sided learning - the interface recognizes the words and sentences pronounced by you and checks your progress when you learn English. This way, you know how you're doing and what you need to improve.

Are you bored with English flashcards or another English conversation app? Are you feeling stuck when you practice English? Well, you're in the right place! BeeSpeaker is the perfect fit for you.

Thanks to BeeSpeaker, the obstacles and excuses that have stood in your way of learning English no longer exist! Our app features short and quick English lessons that you can do at your own pace, anytime, anywhere. We put emphasis on learning to speak English as we believe it is a key skill that is useful in every aspect of life.
Why should you take advantage of our digital native speaker - English teacher?

Because it‚Äôs the first step to bringing down your speaking barrier which often hampers learning English! Do your lessons (available categories: vocabulary, useful phrases, grammar, listening and pronunciation) and short video cards and get the premium version to access all English lessons and master English conversation.

Are you looking to learn to speak English fluently? Our instructors are experienced teachers, native speakers from countries like Great Britain, the United States, and Australia. Thanks to them you will learn different accents and ways of pronouncing particular words. 

During your ‚Äòconversations‚Äô, you will quickly gain self-confidence and get rid of your blockages in speaking.

We focus on a natural method of learning English, which is a novelty in mobile apps. Instead of swotting up on English words, grammar rules, or reading flashcards, you learn by listening and repeating in English. And if you make a mistake - BeeSpeaker will let you know that you need to try again. It's an extremely interesting, fun and effective method for you to learn English, which eliminates stress and allows you to focus on what is most important - talking freely in a foreign language. The teachers in our app always speak English, thanks to which you start to break it up and just speak! 

Become part of the BeeSpeaker revolution. Start learning English today and you'll soon realize that speaking foreign languages is easy. English is really simple! Try it out today by downloading your digital native speaker!

Terms of Use : https://beespeaker.com/terms/

Privacy policy : https://beespeaker.com/privacy-policy/

title: Babbel - Language Learning
description:
Millions of people learn languages with Babbel ‚Äî the language app built by language experts. Why Babbel? Our short and effective language courses get you speaking with confidence.

BABBEL WORKS:

‚Ä¢ 92% of Babbel users improved their proficiency in just two months*

‚Ä¢ After 10 hours with Babbel, Michigan State University researchers found:
96% of learners saw better test scores on grammar and vocabulary
73% of study participants became better speakers**

====================

Our language experts build every language course tailored to your native language. This way you learn Spanish and 13 more languages quickly and effectively.

TRY BABBEL ‚Äì DOWNLOAD THE APP AND TAKE A FREE LESSON

====================

LEARN 14 LANGUAGES:

Spanish, French, Italian, German, Portuguese, Russian, Polish, Turkish, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Dutch, Indonesian, and English

====================

Why learn languages with the Babbel language app?

SHORT, EFFECTIVE LESSONS
Easy to fit language lessons into your day

LESSONS FOR EVERY SITUATION
For travel, work, and more

LISTEN, SPEAK, WRITE
Well-rounded language practise

PERFECT YOUR PRONUNCIATION
Sophisticated speech-recognition technology

RETAIN WHAT YOU LEARN
Review feature that‚Äôs optimised to help you retain knowledge

LEARN GRAMMAR IN CONTEXT
Useful tips & tricks as you learn

OVER 5,000 LANGUAGE COURSES
Learn Spanish and 13 other languages with in-depth content, including more than 60,000 language lessons

OFFLINE MODE
Download lessons and learn anywhere

====================

Read Babbel Magazine to get tips, tricks, and interesting facts about how to learn languages:
* Babbel Magazine: https://www.babbel.com/en/magazine

Follow us on social media for tips on language learning!
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/babbel/
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/babbel.languages/

====================

You will need a subscription in order to get access to the full learning materials for one language. Each subscription will be automatically renewed unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period. Your iTunes account will be automatically charged at the same price for renewal within the 24-hour period prior to the end of the current payment period unless you change your subscription preferences in your iTunes Account Settings. When a subscription is cancelled, access to the app‚Äôs courses and features will expire at the end of the current payment period.

You'll get access to all courses for the following durations:

3 months
6 months
12 months

Privacy policy: https://about.babbel.com/en/privacy/
Terms of use: https://about.babbel.com/en/terms/

CONTACT US:

Ideas, comments, or feedback? Email us at support-mobile@babbel.com


*Vesselinov, R. and Grego, J. The Babbel Efficacy Study. New York 2016

**Based on a study conducted with Babbel users learning Spanish. Loewen, S., Isbell (both Michigan State University) & Sporn. Z (Babbel), 2018. ‚ÄúLearning Spanish with Babbel: Oral Proficiency Outcome in App-Based Foreign Language Learning‚Äù.
releaseNotes:
You learn from us, and we learn from you. We take your feedback seriously and never stop trying to improve our app. And you know what, we've just released the latest version. Fewer bugs, and more upgrades to your favourite courses!

Questions? Email us at support-mobile@babbel.com

title: Busuu: Language Learning
description:
Busuu helps you communicate with confidence from day one. Combine expertly designed language lessons with feedback and tips from our global community of native speakers and harness the power of learning together. 

Looking for the best way to learn a new language on your phone? You‚Äôve just discovered it, with Busuu, a Chegg service ‚Äì we‚Äôre the app that makes learning new languages easier, more fun and more effective for all.

Whether you‚Äôre learning to get confident having new conversations, for a higher grade, a career boost, or for mind-blowing travel experiences, Busuu‚Äôs got your back.

We‚Äôre already helping millions of people overcome their learning struggles, from lack of time and motivation to problems with grammar and vocab. We help our learners achieve their goals, one milestone at a time ‚Äì and we want to do the same for you.

DOWNLOAD THE APP NOW FOR FREE LANGUAGE LEARNING

================

How are we doing this? We‚Äôre glad you asked. Whether you‚Äôre learning on your iPad or iPhone, Busuu helps you‚Ä¶

‚Äì Learn up to 14 languages
That‚Äôs right, 14! We‚Äôve got complete courses in English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese (Brazilian), Polish, Russian, Arabic, Dutch or Turkish with Busuu. 

‚Äì Master languages with real people
You want to learn the relevant language, right? You‚Äôre in luck: we‚Äôll connect you with our community of native speakers so you can get localised language knowledge and support. Feel even better when you help other learners in return.

‚Äì Learn from the experts
Busuu‚Äôs online courses are created by our ingenious language experts. Learn step-by-step with bite-sized lessons, plenty of practise and lots of opportunities to test your progress.

‚Äì Say hello to useful language skills
Learn the language that will really take you places! With regularly updated content, video flashcards featuring real people and useful cultural tips, you‚Äôll be fully immersed in no time. 

‚Äì Kiss goodbye to stressful timetabling
We‚Äôre serious. We organise your learning time for you with a personalised Study Plan. Simply tell us when you want to study and for how long, and we‚Äôll send you notifications to keep you on track.

‚Äì Revise with ease
There‚Äôll be no forgetting on our watch. Smart Review cleverly saves all the grammar and vocab you learn in lessons and stores them in one handy place, so you can make those tricky words and rules stick.

‚Äì Show off achievements with official certificates
With our Busuu language certificates, you‚Äôll have actual proof of your language capabilities.

‚Äì Access specialised courses for language lovers
You‚Äôve learned the basics, and now you‚Äôre hungry for more. Learn about manga, advance your pronunciation or add travel-specific phrases to your skillset, plus much more. 

================

DON‚ÄôT JUST TAKE OUR WORD FOR IT.
See what others have to say about Busuu:

‚óè EDITOR RATING: EXCELLENT - PC MAG
‚óè Named 'Best Buy' language learning app by the Independent in 2021
‚óè Language Learning App of the Year at the EdTech Breakthrough Awards 2020 


================

PLEASE NOTE
A lot of the features are free, but you will need a subscription in order to get access to all features of this app. Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current payment period. Your iTunes account will be automatically charged at the same price for renewal within the 24-hour period prior to the end of the current payment period unless you change your subscription preferences in your Account Settings.
You can manage your subscriptions through your Account Settings after purchase.
Privacy policy: https://www.busuu.com/en/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://www.busuu.com/en/terms/

title: Leo Express
description:
All tickets in your pocket. And much more.

The Leo Express app lets you easily manage your tickets. In addition, you can find out about any changes on your route. So what are you waiting for? Download and travel for experiences right now!

* TICKETS FULLY UNDER CONTROL
You can make an order fast and easily. You can see all your travels and cancel the tickets without any problems.

* INFORMATION ABOUT YOUR JOURNEY
Is your connection delayed? You will find out immediately with our app.

* TICKETS OVERVIEW
All your tickets together. You have a full overview of when, where and for how much you traveled or will travel.

* INTEGRATED SMILE CLUB
Sign up to the Smile Club and enjoy our app to the fullest. You collect kilometers for every ride for which you will get a discount on next tickets. That makes traveling even more fun!

* BENEFITS OF LEO CREDITS
Recharge your leo credits and pay simply anywhere, anytime. When you cancel your ticket, you will get its full value back in leo credits.

Did we forget about something? Send us your comments and suggestions and help us improve the Leo Express app. Send your ideas via the app or via the email address app@leoexpress.com.

title: MAPS.ME: Offline Maps, GPS Nav
description:
Fast, detailed and entirely offline maps with turn-by-turn navigation ‚Äì trusted by over 140 million travelers worldwide.

OFFLINE MAPS
Save mobile data; no internet is required.

NAVIGATION
Use driving, walking and cycle navigation anywhere in the world.

TRAVEL GUIDES
Save you time planning the trip and never miss an interesting place with our ready-made travel guides. We've partnered with the best travel content creators to build travel guide catalog for hunderds of destinations around the world. Whether you prefer city travel, car trips or outdoor activities you will find a great choice of guides for a perfect journey.

INCREDIBLY DETAILED
Directions to points of interest (POIs), hiking trails and places missing from other maps.

UP-TO-DATE
Maps are updated by millions of OpenStreetMap contributors daily. OSM is an open-source alternative to Google Maps and Apple Maps.

FAST AND RELIABLE
Offline search, GPS navigation along with optimized maps to effectively save memory space.

BOOKMARKS
Save locations you love and share them with your friends.

AVAILABLE WORLDWIDE
Essential for home and travel.

MAPS.ME is free to download and use. 

AND MORE!
‚Äì Search through different categories, e.g. restaurants, cafes, tourist attractions, hotels, ATMs and public transport (metro, bus, etc).
‚Äì Make hotel bookings via Booking.com directly from the app.
‚Äì Share your location via text message or social media.
‚Äì When cycling or walking, the app shows whether the way is uphill or downhill.

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
If you have any questions, visit our Help Center: support.maps.me.
If you are unable to find the answer to your question, contact us at: ios@maps.me.
Follow us on FB: http://www.facebook.com/mapswithme | Twitter: @MAPS_ME

Privacy Policy: https://maps.me/policy/
Terms of Use: https://maps.me/terms/
releaseNotes:

- Brand new Search section design
- Updated Object card design with the ability to add your review

title: Lufthansa
description:
Book flights, reserve seats and manage your boarding passes ‚Äì the Lufthansa app offers you all this and much more. The Lufthansa app: your mobile travel companion for smooth and seamless journeys with Lufthansa Group Network Airlines.
With push notifications and real-time flight information, relevant flight status updates and offers will be sent directly to your smartphone. This way you‚Äôll be up to speed throughout your entire flight.
The Lufthansa app keeps you informed during your journey, from the moment you book your flight to when you arrive and even after you have landed, ensuring everything runs as smoothly as possible. With your personal profile, you can conveniently manage your data and personalized services.
In short: With the Lufthansa app, you‚Äôre well taken care of during your travels.
The key features of the Lufthansa app:

Before the flight
‚Ä¢	Book flights, reserve seats and add baggage: Book your desired flight and rent a car if you need to. You can also reserve or change your seat and add extra baggage.

‚Ä¢	Online check-in: Use the Lufthansa app to check in for all flights operated by Lufthansa Group Network Airlines. You will receive your digital flight ticket on your smartphone and can conveniently access your mobile boarding pass from the app.
‚Ä¢	Travel ID and Lufthansa Miles and More: With the new digital wallet, you can store multiple payment methods in your Travel ID account, allowing for seamless and easy payment any time and from anywhere. Use your Travel ID or Lufthansa Miles & More login for personalized services. For a greater level of convenience, you can save your personal information in the Lufthansa app.
‚Ä¢	Real-time information and flight status: Your personal travel assistant provides you with important flight details and updates about your trip starting 24 hours before your flight departure. You‚Äôll receive push notifications for check-in and the flight status and any gate changes will be displayed clearly on your home screen. This way you are able to keep track of your flights and prepare for them accordingly so you can start your trip feeling as relaxed as possible.
During the flight
‚Ä¢	Flight ticket and onboard services: With the Lufthansa app, you always have your mobile boarding pass and onboard services at your fingertips ‚Äì even when you‚Äôre offline. Access all relevant flight information as needed and always stay informed about any changes, without having to ask the flight crew.
After the flight
‚Ä¢	Track baggage: Your digital travel companion is still there to support you even after you‚Äôve landed. Conveniently track your checked-in baggage in the smartphone app and stay informed about the next parts of your journey.
The Lufthansa app is the complete solution for a smooth travel experience. Conveniently book your flights and rental cars via the app, receive automatic notifications and updates about upcoming flights, and manage your personal data conveniently on the go.
Download the Lufthansa app now and enjoy your trip! Your personal travel assistant is there for you before, during and after your flight.
Find out about our flight offers at lufthansa.com and follow us on Instagram, Facebook, YouTube and X to stay up to date with the latest news.
If you have any questions or need support, please do not hesitate to contact us. You can get in touch with us at lufthansa.com/xx/en/help-and-contact.

title: LoungeKey
description:
Download the LoungeKey‚Ñ¢ app today - the must-have travel companion for LoungeKey cardholders.
 
Register your account in the app with your payment card details to access a global network of airport lounges and experiences, including dining, spa and sleep pods in over 700 airports worldwide.
 
‚Ä¢Enjoy contactless entry with your Digital Card
 
‚Ä¢Stay up to date, check your current visit entitlement and history
 
‚Ä¢Search for lounges and experiences, and save your favourites
 
‚Ä¢Unlock more with access to additional Travel Services and benefits that elevate your travel journey
 
Enhance your airport experience with the LoungeKey app.
releaseNotes:
We regularly update the app to make it faster, safer and more engaging for you.
  
Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in this latest release:
  
 - Feature enhancements and bug fixes

Could these be considered as new features? | The team who designed this should be sent to 12h Ryanair flight as punishment | A terrible log in system requires the one to create a new account when a new version is available, only to fail the account creation due to having the applicable card already registered with an account. title: Royal Cooking: Kitchen Madness
description:
Enjoy cooking mania and fever, get ready to make food and open a restaurant or don't forget to work in a crazy kitchen! Are you ready for the madness of this crazy kitchen?

Do you love time management games? Or are you looking for a different food gameplay?
If so, this crazy kitchen is totally for you. You can be a creator of your own restaurant story and open a family style cafe or diner. Immerse yourself into the mania and fever of making food!

This restaurant game teaches you to make food & cook delicious burgers, good and great pizza and other popular street foods. Join this crazy kitchen with time management gameplay and simulation fun.

The Royal Cooking game is one of the most interesting restaurant games. Experience the fun of time management!

 FEATURES:
 - Enjoy gameplay, classic casual and time management games.
- Unlock advanced diaries, make food and become a star chef with mania and fever.
- Hundreds of fun levels: you need to cook good and great pizza, burgers, and sweet baked goods.
- Get combo streaks to earn big rewards.
- Upgrade your crazy kitchen equipment to become the star chef of mania and fever.
- Use powerful boosters to have more fun!

You can find the answers to many questions by contacting our in-game support team. The FAQ is available here: 
https://matryoshka.helpshift.com/hc/en/8-cookinglive/

Reach out to us regarding any questions or suggestions you have. We read all the messages!

Subscribe to our social media pages to stay up to date on the latest news and to get useful tips for the game: 
https://www.facebook.com/matryoshkagamescom

Sincerely, the Matryoshka Games team
releaseNotes:
Dive into a new restaurant!
- Master the art of cooking Peking duck, perfect the delicate Xiao Long Bao, and learn traditional tea service to enhance the dining experience. Take on new challenges and get rewards!
Don't lose your Prestige progress!
- Your progress stays with you forever. Come back and continue your quest for trophies right where you left off!
Enjoy a smoother gaming experience!
- Bugs fixed and game performance improved.

title: Qatar Airways
description:
Award-winning journeys, at your fingertips.

Book flights, manage your booking, check in and take full control of your journey with the Qatar Airways mobile app.



1. BOOK FLIGHTS

With the tap of a finger, find and book flights to enchanting destinations around the world. If you are undecided, you can hold your booking along with the guaranteed fare for up to 72 hours, for a minimum fee. Booking flights through our mobile app also streamlines the process, allowing you to enter your travel details by simply pointing your mobile phone camera at your passport.



2. COMPLEMENT YOUR JOURNEY 

Enhance your journey with an array of additional services. Through our mobile app, you can purchase extra baggage as well as book lounge access, meet and greet services, hotel stays and car rental. 

3. MANAGE YOUR BOOKING

Manage your booking conveniently through our mobile app, by adding your booking to ‚ÄúMy Trips‚Äù. Once added, the app will help you keep track of every step throughout your journey. ‚ÄúMy Trips‚Äù also allows you to seamlessly change your seat and meal preferences, modify your flight details and much more.



4. CHECK IN

Check in through our mobile app by simply pointing your mobile phone camera at your passport. Choose your seat, view/save your boarding pass and use the fast-bag-drop counters at the airport to check in your bags.



5. GET FLIGHT STATUS NOTIFICATIONS

Through our mobile app, you can request arrival and departure information on all Qatar Airways flights, and receive updated information on the status of your flight directly on your mobile phone, via SMS.



6. FIND EXCLUSIVE OFFERS

Through our mobile app, you can check our special fares for flying to the destinations you have longed to visit. You will always find the same fare available on the website at the time of search (and sometimes, you may even find reduced fares when booking through our mobile app).




7. MAKE THE MOST OF PRIVILEGE CLUB

Through our mobile app, Privilege Club members can easily view account details on their dashboard, use the My Calculator to check Avios and Qpoints that can be earned on flights, claim missing Avios on past flights, communicate with the Privilege Club member service centre, and much more.
releaseNotes:
We‚Äôve made accessing the app a breeze. Stay logged in for longer and enjoy a smooth, uninterrupted experience to access all the features you love.
 
What‚Äôs more, you can now also book our meet and assist services or rent a car through ‚ÄòMy Trips‚Äô with a few simple taps.
 
We‚Äôd love to hear what you think about our mobile app. Share your thoughts by sending us an email at mobilepod@qatarairways.com.qa.
reviews:
It constantly logs you out with verification required every time. It doesn‚Äôt work without internet connection (very stupid for an airplane app) and it‚Äôs super slow and heavy for data. No support for apple pass. | I try login, but never posible.
All the time anwer is not valid password.
I try again diferend email, but the same again.

I will delete soon, because ist not function. | Not able to add my boarding pass to Apple Wallet. There's always an error. It works for the first person in the booking but not the other ones. | Cannot log in | Leteck√° spoleƒçnost s nadstandardn√≠mi slu≈æbami!up≈ôednost≈àuji ji!üòä | My favorite airline. | The worst airline i have dealt with.  Zero customer service.  We have been trying to change our name for 5 months because of the wedding, and after submitting all the documents, Qatar informed us that it is not possible.  GL with this company. | Trying to add my family members repeatedly, everytime some part of the process does not work properly, it consumed so much of my time, that I‚Äôm not sure if this worth | Canceled my flight let me 10 hours at layover with no hotel during night and didn‚Äôt get any compensation!!!! Never flying with qatar again!! | Not possible to add boarding pass to apple wallet :( | After last update cannot use without english keyboard, so useless | The app is very unstable, crashes often. Plus Qatar Airways is an airline that doesn't give a f uk about customers personal needs. Cannot recommend neither this app or the airlines itself. | Why you stop to support International keyboard on mobile devices?? iPhone 7 in my case??üôà | Cannot login | Very poor application
- unresponsive 
- user interface is tragically outdated
- orientation difficult

- check flight status takes ages to load 
One of the worst application next to Air Asia | Can‚Äôt log in for some days...ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è | Error | For 1 month I can not login to app.. | Very poor app. Never log in

title: Fotor - AI Headshot Generator
description:
Fotor is a powerful all-in-one photo editor app for everyone, including photo editing tools, design maker and photo collage maker. Powered by Artificial Intelligence technology, many tools of Fotor's photo editor can meet all your editing photo needs in seconds, such as One-Tap Enhance, AI Magic Remove, AI Retouch, AI Background Remove, AI Enlarger, Effects, Filters, Design Templates, Collages, Overlay, Colorize, AI Art Effects, Crop, HSL, Curve, Text and other features. 

[ONE-TAP ENHANCE]
With just one click, automatically adjust the light and tone, balance the light and dark changes, and quickly improve the image quality in no time. 

[REMOVE UNWANTED OBJECT]
With Fotor's magic eraser, quickly remove an image's unwanted objects, such as remove text, remove people, erase acne, erase building, and more. Our watermark remover is a good choice for better creation. Automatically remove watermark, and get perfect image in one click without losting image quality. 

[AI RETOUCH]
One click to have flawless skin, make it natural and delicate, create perfect makeup without effort. There are also beauty features of Fotor's photo editor such as Smoothing, Wrinkle Remover, Reshape, Clone, Red-eye Removal, Teeth Whitening, etc. retouch photo easily. 

[Remove Background & Photo Background Changer]
Try AI background remover to delete background or erase background from all kinds of images to get transparent background in one click. After remove bg, use fotor's photo background editor and photo background eraser to change background easily. Fotor's background remover also offers photo white background, blue background, background images, etc. You can change the photo to white background or any background you like by yourself instead of spending much money to hire white background studio shots.

[AI ENLARGER]
Use Fotor's photo enhancer to make blurry images clear instantly without quality loss. Whether it's portrait, photography, or products, Fotor's photo enhancer uses AI technology to analyze and transform your image into high-definition quickly.  Enhancing colors,¬†reducing blur, increasing sharpness, removing haze, highlighting focus, and more photo enhancement. 

[PROFESSIONAL PHOTO EFFECTS]
With hundreds of professional filters and special-style effects, real analog film, retro filter, fresh, black and white filter, and other classic effects, easy to cope with all kinds of scenes and present various aesthetic styles.

[CREATIVE DESIGN TEMPLATES]
Various wallpaper, poster, Instagram post, Youtube video cover, card, logo, and more design templates, update weekly. Suitable for all graphic design occasions. 

[CLASSIC & POSTER COLLAGE]
Various collage templates, covering food, clothing, festivals, travel, and other scenes, easily make photos better.

[ART EFFECTS]
Turn ordinary photos into artwork with just a few taps. Based on a unique model algorithm and machine learning technique, quickly turn your photo into paintings by Van Gogh, Monet, Picasso, and other master artists, as well as the trendy art styles "cyberpunk".

[RICH IN ELEMENTS AND RESOURCES]
Stickers, frames, fonts, backgrounds, mosaics, stock photos, and massive elements resources. Provide more vitality for creativity and show the personal style.

The Fotor Pro subscription fee is charged monthly or yearly. The fees for the Fotor Pro plan are paid following purchase confirmation. The subscription will automatically renew on expiry unless the automatic renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the expiry of the current subscription period. Once the subscription is confirmed, your iTunes account will be charged according to the plan you chose. After purchase, you may go to the iTunes Settings to manage your subscription and turn the automatic renewal off. A canceled subscription becomes effective after one month.

https://www.fotor.com/service.html?f=iphoneapp&v=1

Privacy Policy:
https://www.fotor.com/privacy.html

title: Drops: Language Learning Games
description:
Join over 40 million people who use Drops for free language lessons. It‚Äôs fast, fun, and easy! Practice vocabulary in Spanish, Japanese, French, Korean, Chinese, German, English. Discover 50+ different new languages with Drops!

Learn new languages while playing games. You can become fluent, learn vocabulary and common phrases in English, German, French, Russian, and Italian. Set goals, unlock achievements, and get rewards!

‚Ä¢ Become fluent in a foreign language with this language learning app
‚Ä¢ Learn to read characters and scripts from different alphabets like Korean, Japanese, Chinese, Hebrew, Arabic, Russian, and Hindi 
‚Ä¢ Custom illustrations for each vocabulary word makes it easy to remember
‚Ä¢ From beginner to expert levels, grow your foreign language vocabulary
‚Ä¢ A professionally curated vocabulary list with more than 3,000 words and phrases 
‚Ä¢ Game-like language lessons that make language learning fun and effective
‚Ä¢ Level up! Track your progress and get rewards
‚Ä¢ Professional voice artists and sound design with correct dialect pronunciations
‚Ä¢ Learn to speak languages like European Portuguese, Castilian Spanish, Korean, Japanese, Arabic, American English, British English, German, French, Russian, Italian, Mexican Spanish, Latin-American Spanish, Tagalog, Hebrew, Icelandic, Polish, Mandarin Chinese, Turkish, Cantonese Chinese, Dutch, Norwegian, Thai, Swedish, Vietnamese, Maori, Brazilian Portuguese, Farsi (Persian), Hungarian, Greek, Hindi, Danish, Samoan, Indonesian, Finnish, Serbian, Croatian, Esperanto, Estonian, Hawaiian, Ukrainian, Yoruba, Bosnian, Swahili, Igbo, Sanskrit and even Ainu!

"By focusing on visually appealing games and vocab, Drops aims to lower the barrier preventing users from exploring a new language and, ultimately, accessing the social and economic benefits knowing that language may provide." - TechCrunch

We are featured by CNET, Forbes, VentureBeat and many other places too!

Try Drops Premium with a 7 day free trial. Download the app to learn about different membership options, and register to learn all about exclusive discounts.

Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of Drops premium. Afterwards your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase. You can cancel your subscription anytime, and you won't be charged in the next billing cycle.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use: http://languagedrops.com/privacypolicy.html

title: Lyft
description:
Count on Lyft to take you where you need to go with safety first. Got an appointment? Need to pick up some groceries? We‚Äôll match you with a driver, help you find the quickest bus route, or show you the nearest scooter ‚Äî you‚Äôll be on your way in minutes. If it gets you there, it‚Äôs on the app.

USING LYFT IS EASY
Choose your destination, find a ride in seconds, and pay directly in the app. It‚Äôs that simple.

CHOOSE HOW YOU RIDE
With Lyft, you‚Äôve got options. Choose from a variety of different ways to travel, all available right from your app.* Whether you‚Äôre looking for an affordable ride, the most direct route, or a way to treat yourself ‚Äì we‚Äôve got the mode to suit your needs. 

* Lyft ride types may vary by region. Check the app to see what is available in your city.
‚Äî
Prices vary based on market condition.

By downloading the app, you agree to allow Lyft to collect your device's language settings.
releaseNotes: Thanks for using Lyft! We update our app regularly to make your rides even better. Every update of our Lyft app includes improvements in speed and reliability, as well as bug fixes and performance improvements. As new features are released, we‚Äôll highlight those for you in the app.

title: Loopsie: AI Photo Generator
description:
We update new effects or presets every week!

Loopsie lets you create stunning photo edits with stickers, special effects, filters and theme presets! Our animation allows you to create 3D Photos, D3D Camera like videos and much more. All-in-one app without any professional equipment. Just a bit of creativity and your photos will come to life with a stunning cinematic effect!

Our motion photo effects make your short videos unique and let your content stand out from other photos and videos. Forget those old photo filters and photo editor, welcome our new breathtaking video loops.

‚Äî Popular Presets & Special Effects ‚Äî
Anime, Legends, Vertigo, Motion blur
Butterfly, Neon, Sparkle, Cloud, Vapourware, vhs, Indie

‚Äî 3D Photo ‚Äî
Add a new dimension to your photos.
You can use our integrated 3D camera or create a 3D photo starting from a normal photo.
You can choose between a vintage effect like a D3D camera, or a standard high quality 3D picture. Loopsie mimics many movement, from the classic 360 wiggle, to a vertical fast movement.

‚Äî Advanced Technologies ‚Äî
Machine Learning Based Depth Prediction:
We built a Neural Network that accurately predicts the depth of every photo.

Augmented Reality Stickers:
Loopsie enriches the picture with 3D augmented reality stickers.

Advanced 3D Scene Reconstruction:
We developed a unique algorithm to fill the missing part of the 3D scene.

3D Segmentation:
The neural network we developed will segment the subjects from the scene for a more dimensional view.

‚Äî Subscription Information ‚Äî
Subscribe to Loopsie Pro to unlock all the stickers, filters, effects and tools!

Subscription Plans:
Weekly, Monthly, Yearly or Unlimited Access

Payment & Cancellation:
Subscriptions are billed at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan. Alternatively a one-time payment plan is available to obtain ‚Äúunlimited access‚Äù¬† (this is not a subscription). The subscription fee is charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
Subscriptions auto-renew at the cost of the chosen package, unless cancelled 24-hours in advance prior to the end of the current period.
You may manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

Free Trial Policy:
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

‚Äî Follow Us ‚Äî
Instagram: @loopsieapp
TikTok: @loopsieapp

‚Äî User Feedback ‚Äî
Developer e-mail: iOS.support@loopsie.it (Any feedback is appreciated!)

‚Äî Recruitment ‚Äî
Loopsie is looking for creators to collaborate in our social media communities. If you‚Äôre interested to build Loopsie‚Äôs social presence together, feel free to contact us at info@loopsie.it
Thank you for your support!

Read more about our terms and conditions here:
https://bit.ly/2PWcXgi

Read more about our privacy policy here:
https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/8126812
releaseNotes:
Thank you for using Loopsie!
We would love to hear your thoughts on this update, please email us at ios.support@loopsie.it.
This update includes some bug fixes.

title: Microsoft Translator
description:
Need to communicate with someone who uses a different language? Microsoft Translator is here to help you break through language barriers and connect with people from around the globe.

Microsoft Translator allows you  to translate text, speech, images, and group conversations in over 100 languages - for free. Whether you‚Äôre traveling and need help understanding a menu or navigating unfamiliar streets, or you‚Äôre trying to communicate with a colleague at work or school, Microsoft Translator has you covered. Download it now and see how it can help you break language barriers, stay on top of group conversations by navigating easily within transcripts via chapters.With an intuitive interface and real-time accurate translations, Microsoft Translator makes it easier to communicate with confidence. Plus, use features like chapters and transcripts to navigate within group conversations to stay on top of the conversation.

Don‚Äôt let language barriers hold you back. Download Microsoft Translator now and see how it can help you connect with people from different cultures and backgrounds. With support for over 100 languages (https://aka.ms/applanguages), you‚Äôll be able to communicate with ease no matter where you are in the world.
releaseNotes:
This update includes the following:

- Copy only the translated text or both original and translated text.

- Bug fixes and general improvements.

Our latest update includes UX improvements and new features. Here is a quick rundown of what is new:
 
- Improved user experience: We have made a number of tweaks and adjustments to the app's interface to make it more intuitive, user-friendly, and easier to access microphone, camera, and text input controls.
 
- Different translation views: you will notice a panel of different views (split-screen, single or full-screen, history, and converse (multi-device conversation)) that is easy to access and switch between. The current view is saved as default view for the next time the app is relaunched.
 
- Split-screen view: with this feature, you can now have a 1:1 conversation with the other person viewing the translation on their side by flipping one half of the screen. You can adjust the height of original or translated text space in this view.
 
- Single or full-screen view: with this feature, you can view your original and translated text on a single screen.
 
- Turn on/off history: with this setting, you can choose to save history or turn off saving history. In the history view, you can delete all translations with a single tap.
 
- Languages: you can now swap source and target languages to let the app know which languages to translate from and to.
 
- Microphone customization: with this setting, you can keep the microphone always on which means it will identify the language as you speak. You can also turn it off which will require you to manually press the microphone whenever you speak.
 
- Auto-scroll translated text: with this setting, you can turn on/off the ability to auto-scroll translated text.
 
We hope you enjoy the update and welcome any feedback you may have.
  

Bug fixes and general improvements.

title: Splitwise
description:
Splitwise is the easiest way to share expenses with friends and family and stop stressing about ‚Äúwho owes who‚Äù. Millions of people around the world use Splitwise to organize group bills for households, trips, and more. Our mission is to reduce the stress and awkwardness that money places on our most important relationships.
 
Splitwise is great for:
- Roommates splitting rent and apartment bills
- Group trips around the world
- Splitting a vacation house for skiing or at the beach
- Weddings and bachelor/bachelorette parties
- Couples sharing relationship costs
- Friends and co-workers who go out to lunch or dinner together frequently
- Loans and IOUS between friends 
- And so much more
 
Splitwise is simple to use:
- Create groups or private friendships for any splitting situation
- Add expenses, IOUs, or informal debts in any currency, with support for offline entry
- Expenses are backed up online so everyone can log in, view their balances, and add expenses
- Keep track of who should pay next, or settle up by recording cash payments or using our integrations
 
We also have powerful features that can handle almost any money sharing situation. Here are some of our industry-leading features:
- Multi-platform support for smartphones and web
- Simplify debts into the easiest repayment plan
- Expense categorization
- Calculate group totals
- Export to CSV
- Comment directly on expenses
- Split expenses equally or unequally by percentages, shares, or exact amounts
- Add informal debts and IOUs
- Create bills that reccur monthly, weekly, yearly, fortnightly
- Add multiple payers on a single expense
- See total balances with a person across multiple groups and private expenses
- Custom user avatars
- Cover photos for groups 
- Activity feed and push notifications help you stay on top of changes
- View your edit history for changes to an expense
- Any deleted group or bill can be restored easily
- World-class customer support
- Pay back using our integrated payments: Venmo and PayPal (US only), Paytm (India only)
- 100+ currencies and growing
- 7+ supported languages

Endorsements:
‚ÄúMakes it easy to split everything from your dinner bill to rent.‚Äù - NY Times
"Fundamental for tracking finances. As good as WhatsApp for containing awkwardness." ‚Äì The Financial Times
‚ÄúI never fight with roommates over bills because of this genius expense-splitting app‚Äù- Business Insider
‚ÄúThe Single Best App You Can Download for Group Trips of Any Kind‚Äù - Thrillist
‚ÄúLife Changing! I don‚Äôt review many things, but this app has seriously improved my quality of life. It has saved my sanity when it comes to splitting utilities, mortgage, groceries, dog expenses...the list goes on. No more saving receipts, making spreadsheets, and manually calculating each month. So handy for group trips/weekends, too! THANK YOU!!‚Äù ‚Äì Courtney via the App Store

We offer in-app purchases for ‚ÄúSplitwise Pro‚Äù, the benefits of which are described below. The subscription amount will be charged to your App Store account and will vary by plan and country. You‚Äôll see the total price before completing your first payment. If you don‚Äôt choose to purchase ‚ÄúSplitwise Pro‚Äù, you can continue using Splitwise for free.

Premium Subscription Service ‚ÄúSplitwise Pro‚Äù:
1. Store high-resolution receipts in the cloud (10GB cloud storage)
2. OCR integration for scanning and itemizing receipts
3. Backups to JSON, downloadable from our website
4. Convert expenses to different currencies using our Open Exchange Rates integration
5. Access to ‚Äúspending by category‚Äù budgeting tools and other charts
6. Search full expense history

‚ÄúSplitwise Pro‚Äù subscriptions purchased in-app renew monthly or yearly depending on your plan. Plan pricing may vary by country. To avoid renewal, you must turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before your subscription ends. You can turn off auto-renew at any time by visiting the App Store.

Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: https://www.splitwise.com/terms

title: British Airways
description:
To Fly. To Serve.

The British Airways app makes booking, boarding and accessing everything about your flights easier than ever before. Personalised to you, the app gives you instant access to the information you need, when you need it.

Features:

- Personalised home screen
Your home screen is your personal gateway into the BA app. Themed around your next destination, it will give you easy access to important information surrounding your flight, including your mobile boarding pass.

You will also have quick access to flights you track, your most recent search and our best return fares to our most popular destinations.

- Book flights
Booking a flight with British Airways has never been easier. Browse our cheapest fares or quickly access your recent flight searches made from any device, and book a flight from over 130 countries.

- Manage your flights
Access and purchase upgrade offers from your phone, book seats in advance, add flights to your calendar or send them via email and get up-to-date arrival and departure times for all of your flights. Additionally, lounge users can access the British Airways Lounge Wi-Fi password.

- Apple Watch
The British Airways app on Apple Watch provides easy access to the most important flight information while you‚Äôre on the move. You can quickly view the flight number, route, departure time, flight status, a countdown to the departure time and the weather at your destination.

- Flight status and schedules
Search and track all British Airways flights for the latest arrival and departure times.

- Exclusive features for Executive Club Members
If you‚Äôre an Executive Club Member, you can check your Avios and Tier Points as well as view your full transaction history on your device. Optional enhanced services available for our Executive Club customers travelling with baggage to check in at the airport. Anyone can join the Executive Club for free on ba.com


- Siri Shortcuts
Add Siri Shortcuts to quickly check your next flight and Avios points

Please refer to the 'Application Licence Agreement', linked on this page, to view the terms of use of this application and use of mobile boarding passes. By downloading the BA application, you agree to the terms of the Application Licence Agreement.
British Airways Plc Web Site British Airways Support Application Licence Agreement.
releaseNotes: We‚Äôre always working behind the scenes to make improvements to your experience. Our tweaks improve the British Airways app by making it faster, safer and easier to navigate.

title: Vueling Airlines-Cheap Flights
description:
Over 120 destinations await you on the Vueling app. Book cheap flights, choose the fare that best suits your trip and customise it with the most exclusive services.

BOOK YOUR FLIGHTS

Choose your destination and book flights at the best prices on your mobile app quickly and easily. Choose the fare that you prefer and book using your favourite payment method.

ONLINE CHECK-IN AND BOARDING PASSES

Check in online and forget about queueing at the airport. Download your boarding pass on your device, carry it with you at all times and check it whenever you want, even offline. We make your trip even more comfortable.

VUELING CLUB

Sign up for Vueling Club and collect Avios every time you book. The more Avios you collect, the more you'll save on your flights! And if you ever forget to collect Avios when you book, you can retrieve them on the app.

FLIGHT STATUS

Check the scheduled times, terminal and boarding gate for your next flight. All the information on arrivals, departures and possible incidents, just a click away.

MY BOOKINGS

Manage all your bookings easily. Add bags, choose your seat on the plane, change your flight, bring your flight forward... Everything you need at your fingertips.

FLEX PACK

Book our Flex Pack and enjoy more flexibility for your booking. If your plans change or something unexpected comes up, you can always choose the best solution for your trip: get the amount back as Flight Credit or change your flight at no extra cost.

Have we missed anything? Let us have your feedback and suggestions and help us improve so we can continue offering you new services and enhance your experience via the Vueling app.
releaseNotes: We are constantly testing our app to correct any possible errors and to optimise its performance. We hope you like the new version of the Vueling app. Thank you for your comments ‚Äì they really help us to improve!

title: KLM - Book a flight
description:
Your journey with us starts when you open the KLM app.



With this pocket-sized travel assistant, you can book a ticket, customise your booking, check in and get real-time flight updates. Everything required for a smooth trip is at your fingertips!



BOOK A FLIGHT 
Select one of our many destinations and book your ticket. To save time on future bookings, add your contact information to your profile. Next time, we‚Äôll pre-fill your details. 



MANAGE YOUR TRIP
View the pre-travel checklist and adjust your booking at any time until check-in. Lounge access or extra legroom? Enhance your travel experience yourself with just a few taps.


GET YOUR BOARDING PASS 
Travel with peace of mind ‚Äì no need to print out your travel documents or wait in line at a check-in desk. Get your boarding pass directly in the app or add it to your Wallet. It‚Äôs so easy!



YOUR FLYING BLUE ACCOUNT
Check your Miles balance, book a reward ticket, modify your profile, or access your digital Flying Blue card in your personal dashboard.



STAY UP TO DATE
Turn on your notifications for real-time updates like gate changes and check-in times, and receive exclusive offers. Share your flight status to stay in touch with those on the ground. They‚Äôll be happy to know you landed safely and sound.

title: Norwegian Travel Assistant
description:
Manage your trip with Norwegian on the move! Book flights, add Fast Track and other extras, keep track of your travel plans and get important updates about your trip ‚Äì everything in one handy app.



* You‚Äôll have all your travel documents in one easy-to-access spot ‚Äì both tickets and boarding passes are stored in one handy travel folder
* Book flights directly from the travel assistant
* Add and keep track of trips that haven‚Äôt been booked with your profile
* Check in on the go ‚Äì convenient and quick
* Add Fast Track and skip the queues through security ‚Äì handy when you‚Äôre running late or when you just feel like spending your time on other things than standing in line
* Travelling with more bags than expected? The travel assistant lets you add extra checked bags easily
* Add seat reservations to your flights and make sure you get your favourite seat
* Get push notifications with up-to-the-minute info about your flights
* Automatic login for faster access to your information and for booking flights
* Travel archive with your previous flights
* Check if flights are on time with our flight status overview 
* Offline access ‚Äì your travel information‚Äôs always there when you need it
* Passbook support for your boarding passes when you‚Äôve checked in online



Help us improve the app!
Got tips or suggestions on what we should improve or include in the travel assistant app? We‚Äôd be glad to hear from you. Contact us at travelassistant@norwegian.com

title: Vetus Maps
description:
Die Zeit vergeht, und die Landschaften √§ndern sich, es ist sehr schwierig, auf einem riesigen Feld ein uraltes Geisterdorf zu finden. Das schafft erhebliche Hindernisse f√ºr Lokalhistoriker und Liebhaber der Antike. Vetus Maps l√∂st dieses Problem! Jetzt alle notwendigen Alte-Karten der Landkreise und Provinzen in Ihrem Smartphone. Die Anwendung erm√∂glicht es Ihnen, die alte Karte auf die entsprechnede moderne Karte zu √ºbertragen.

Anwendungsmerkmale:

- √úbertragung auf eine moderne Karte (Satellit, Hybrid, Gel√§nde)
- √Ñnderung der Transparenz der Karte
- Kartenkatalog zum Herunterladen
- Markierungen setzen
- GPS-Tracks aufzeichnen
- Suche nach Orten

Auf den alten Karten ist eine gro√üe Anzahl verschiedener Objekte angegeben, die man als wertvolle Datenquelle f√ºr die Toponymie verwenden kann, da viele Namen verloren gegangen sind - sie sind auf keiner topographischen topografischen Karte zu finden. Selbst in unserer heutigen Zeit, viele Jahre sp√§ter, kann man mit Hilfe dieser Karten recht sicher durch die Landschaft navigieren.

Alte Karten sind immer offline verf√ºgbar, f√ºr Satellitenkarten ist eine Internetverbindung erforderlich. Die Markerinstallation erfolgt durch langes Dr√ºcken auf die Karte

Premium Abonnement:
Mit dem Jahresabonnement erhalten Sie Zugang zu allen Karten zum kostenlosen Download und k√∂nnen auch Karten von Drittanbietern oder Ihre eigenen Karten mit Dropbox herunterladen. Die Zahlung f√ºr den ersten Abonnementzeitraum wird Ihrem iTunes-Konto bei Best√§tigung des Kaufs belastet. Der Preis ist regional unterschiedlich und betr√§gt nun 14,99 ‚Ç¨ pro Jahr.

Ihr Abonnement wird automatisch jedes Jahr bzw. jeden Monat zum g√ºltigen Abonnementpreis verrechnet, und dieser Betrag wird 24 Stunden vor Ende des Jahres-/Monats-Abonnements von Ihrem Konto abgehoben. Um Ihr Abonnement zu verwalten oder die automatische Verl√§ngerung zu beenden, gehen Sie einfach zu Ihren Kontoeinstellungen und inaktivieren Sie die automatische Erneuerung mindestens 24 Stunden vor dem Verl√§ngerungsdatum. Nach Berechnung der Jahres-Abonnements k√∂nnen keine R√ºckzahlungen mehr erfolgen. Jeglicher unverbrauchte Anteil der Probezeit verf√§llt bei Kauf eines Abonnements. F√ºr weitere Informationen, sehen Sie bitte die Benutzungsbedingungen (http://www.vetusmaps.com/termsofuse.pdf) und die Datenschutzerkl√§rung ein (http://www.vetusmaps.com/privacypolicy.pdf).

Die Aufnahme von GPS-Tracks l√§uft im Hintergrund. Die fortgesetzte Verwendung von GPS im Hintergrund kann die Akkulaufzeit Ihres Ger√§ts erheblich verk√ºrzen.

title: Yandex Go: Taxi Food Delivery
description:
Yandex Go is an app to request rides, order food from restaurants or send items across town. Request a ride or delivery with just a tap and track your driver in real time. Never waste time again with another call center or parking problem.

‚Ä¢ AFFORDABLE FARES
Choose a service class for any occasion. Ride Economy for everyday errands, treat yourself to Comfort and Comfort+ to relax in a more spacious car, or go with Business when every detail counts. Use Delivery to ship items of any size by car. Fares and available service classes vary by location, but we always show the exact price (or a fair estimate) before you request a ride.

‚Ä¢ PAY BY CARD OR CASH
You can pay for rides automatically if you add your card in the app, but drivers also accept cash. Payment method availability may vary depending on location.

‚Ä¢ A SMART APP THAT SAVES YOU TIME
Yandex Go uses smart algorithms built on live traffic data to connect riders with drivers who can reach them fastest. Depending on your location, the app will also suggest alternative pickup points to help lower your fare.

‚Ä¢ RIDES WITH MULTIPLE STOPS
Request a ride with multiple destinations, like if you‚Äôre dropping your kids off at school, picking up a friend on the way, or need to run a quick errand. Yandex Go maps all your stops on one route and calculates the fare for the entire trip upfront.

‚Ä¢ CHILD SAFETY SEATS
Choose the Kids service class to ride safely with your child in a safety or booster seat.
Currently available in the capitals of Armenia, Georgia, Estonia and Latvia, as well as 13 cities across Russia.

‚Ä¢ DELIVERY
It's just like requesting a ride: enter your address in the app, and a courier delivers your item. Both sender and recipient meet the courier at their car.

‚Ä¢ FOOD FROM RESTAURANTS
Order food from local cafes and restaurants. Just enter your address and we‚Äôll show you everything that‚Äôs available nearby. Narrow down your search with filters and find your favorites or try something new. Currently available in Russia and Kazakhstan.

‚Ä¢ AVAILABLE IN 9 COUNTRIES
Russia, Armenia, Belarus, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Uzbekistan, Serbia and Moldova. Visit https://taxi.yandex.com to see rates and availability in your city.

If you‚Äôd like to share your opinion about our app, a driver or company that handled your ride, please send us feedback in the app.
releaseNotes: The new version of the app is available: everything's as convenient, but works a little faster and more consistently. Bug fixes and performance improvement.

title: Mytrip.com
description:
Welcome to the Mytrip app!

Our app puts the world in the palm of your hand. Fast, simple, safe and secure‚Äìinstantly access your booking details and experience real-time updates and notifications so you never miss a flight again. Easily update your booking with baggage and other services from our pre-travel store. Get access to exclusive offers like early check-in for free (a $15 value), plus save up to 70% on flights, hotels rental cars and so much more!

What are you waiting for? Download now and let‚Äôs get traveling!¬†¬†

FREE EARLY CHECK-IN
- Exclusively for our app users, passengers can now check-in for their flight, months in advance ‚Äì for free! Let us do the hard work for you and we‚Äôll send your boarding pass directly to your mobile device.¬†

BOOKING INFO AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
- Multiple bookings? No problem! All your bookings in one place‚Äìno need to head to the airline‚Äôs website or download their apps
- Easily access your booking info. From your reservation details, boarding passes the app has everything you need. Plus you‚Äôll receive real-time notifications on gate or schedule changes in real-time, so you‚Äôll never miss a flight again

BOOK FLIGHTS TO ANY DESTINATION, WORLDWIDE:
- Search and compare more than 650 airlines, big and small, to find the best deal there is.
- Flexible booking options ‚Äì we get it, changes happen! Choose our Flexible Ticket option and change your flight when you need to.

AVAILABLE FOR A WIDE SELECTION OF BRANDS
- Get your booking info for many popular booking platforms including Gotogate, Supersaver, Supersavertravel, Flybillet, Travelstart, Travelfinder, Goleif, Travelpartner, Seat24, Flygvaruhuset, Avion, Budjet, Trip, Mytrip, Pamediakopes, Airtickets24, Flight Network and FlyFar.

ADD SERVICES ON THE FLY
- Already booked? Travel just the way you want by adding baggage, choosing your seat and more from our pre-travel store.¬†

PAY YOUR WAY
- Choose from a number of payment options available throughout the world.

FIND AND MAKE RESERVATIONS AT GREAT HOTELS
- The best places, the best prices ‚Äì with more than 300,000 hotels to choose from, there‚Äôs something for everyone.

CHEAP CAR RENTAL ANYWHERE AND ANYTIME
- Search and find great deals on rental cars. Take the scenic route and explore your destination at your leisure.

title: EXA Bike Tracker
description:
Bike Tracker is an app for everyone who loves cycling and other sport activities like running, trekking, hiking or biking. 

Doesn't mater, you like winter or summer sports, you are a profesional cyclist, BMX fan, use electric bike or bike enduro trail, this app is perfect for you! 
It will measure your bike speed, the distance, altitude and GPS position,  record and mark your routes on the map and provide full statistics of your sport activities.

Inside the app you can activate 30 days free, premium app version, which is extended on many additional and useful functions.

Bike Tracker includes the following features:
- measure and recording the maximum biking speed and average speed
- measure and recording distance cycling tracks, 
- measure time, pace, slope and calories 
- marking your routes on the map
- light and dark color mode 
- monitoring the altitude above sea level, with recording min. and max. values (based on data from GPS, maps and barometer sensor) and elevation gain
- you can adjust and personalize data on bike computer main screen (from 1 to 9 tracking data on screen)  
- all data and statistics you can record all day and later view history

Our idea is - any bicycling activity statistics, maps, graph and others data in one app.

To use this app you don't need a mobile internet roaming data, just GPS is enough. Remember that the GPS work poorly inside the buildings and can generate inaccurate data. Sometimes outdoors GPS bike tracker may need more time to catch the good signal, especially in bad weather conditions.

This cycling app can also be used to training cross-country, enduro bike training, running, skiing, skating or any other sports practiced in the open. This app is useful for experienced professionals cyclists, but also novice bicycling users will have while using it a lot of fun.

With this bike app, you can compare your GPS bike tracker results with friends, organize sports competitions and other forms of competitive in cycle or any sport activities.
This bike computer - GPS cycling tracker, can also help you navigate on the enduro bike trails, in finding interesting routes and tourist attractions or touch with your friends.

You're going biking in popular EuroVelo routes? Or maybe Great Divide Mountain bike route? Check the weather and instal GPS Bike Tracker app. No matter where you'll be, this bike app certainly give you a lot of fun and impressions!

Over 50 millions satisfied worldwide users have installed our EXA apps - join them and have fun!



Information
We are continuously working to develop and improve this application. If you see something that can be improved, we will be grateful for a message on help@examobile.pl. We want to make our apps the best in App Store - Thank you in advance
releaseNotes:
- Fixed issues with loading calibration of the barometric altitude
- Bug fixes and stability improvements 
- Session Edit
- Total Distance & Time in History
- Export and Import All Data From Bike Tracker
- Black (AMOLED / OLED ) Color Theme
- GPX, TCX files from Endomondo, Garmin, etc. import
- Turkish, Danish, Slovak and Hungarian translations
- Sound and voice notifications about time or distance
- Fixed user-reported bugs
- Improved performance, lowered resources consumption

title: FREENOW
description:
FREENOW is Europe's largest multimobility app, available in 9 European countries. Book black cabs, Rides (private hire vehicles), taxis, eScooters and eBikes all directly through the app. You are in control to choose how you roll, book easily, pay in-app quickly and complete your trip safely!

HOW IT WORKS - RIDE-HAILING
1. Enter your destination
2. Book a car or a cab near you
3. Track your driver's arrival
4. Pay easily through the app

HOW IT WORKS - ESCOOTER & EBIKE
1. Switch to the 2-wheels tab
2. Find a eScooter or eBike nearby
3. Unlock the eScooter or eBike by scanning the QR code or by selecting it directly on the map
4. Go to your destination and pay easily through the app


FEATURES
- The only ride-hailing app where you can choose an electric Black Cab, Eco Taxi or Private Ride every time you take a trip! Same great service, lower environmental impact.
- You can choose a black cab or a taxi with a partition screen to allow for social distancing. 
- Highest quality drivers, fully licensed with all Ride drivers met and onboarded face-to-face
- Convenient prebook feature available up to 4 days in advance making planning ahead that bit easier.
- All black cabs and wheelchair accessible taxi options are available for those requiring extra assistance.
- All drivers are reminded to sanitize their vehicle after every trip. 


STREAMLINE YOUR BUSINESS TRAVEL
Automatically collect your receipt via email after each trip when you pay with the app, or skip manual expense reportings altogether by using a FREENOW for business account.

EASY AIRPORT TRANSFER
Book last minute or up to 4 days before your flight. Need a pickup? No problem, just collect your luggage, order your vehicle of choice through the app and follow the in-app walking directions to the FREENOW pickup point within your terminal.

FREENOW is available for both business and holiday travel at Europe's largest airports, including Heathrow, London City, Gatwick, Stansted, Dublin, Frankfurt, Madrid-Barajas, Barcelona El-Prat, Munich, Rome Fiumicino, Manchester, D√ºsseldorf, Vienna Schwechat, Milano Malpensa, Berlin, Paris Charles de Gaulle, Nice C√¥te d'Azur and Malaga.

BOOK THE RIGHT VEHICLE FOR YOU
UK:
Black cab: Iconic British taxi with high-quality knowledgeable drivers 
EV black cab: Electric black cab with high-quality knowledgeable drivers 
Ride: Private hire vehicles with professional drivers and the lowest fixed prices in London
EV Ride: London‚Äôs largest electric fleet of PHVs 
eScooter: Book an eScooter directly in the app in London 

Ireland:
Taxi: Book a taxi with a fully licenced driver with Ireland‚Äôs shortest waiting times
Taxi + Screen: Taxi with a partition screen offering you a more comfortable way to travel
Taxi XL: Taxi with more than 4 seats
Accessible Taxi: wheelchair accessible for those requiring extra assistance 
Eco Taxi: Ireland‚Äôs largest electric and hybrid taxi fleet offering you a greener way to travel

TRAVEL ALL OVER EUROPE
The FREENOW  service is available across 10 countries in over 100 European cities.

SUPPORT
If you have any questions, please visit the help & contact section of the app (via your profile) to see our most frequently asked questions.
releaseNotes:
Make sure to update your FREENOW app. The most recent version ensures that you have the fastest and most reliable service yet.

What‚Äôs changed?

- Bug fixes and improvements

Enjoying the app? Leave us a review.

title: BVG Tickets: Train, Bus & Tram
description:
BVG Tickets is the official ticket-purchasing app for public transport in Berlin! 


With BVG Tickets you can buy tickets for train, subway, tram, and bus from the official source and travel anywhere in Berlin. Purchase and download tickets straight to the app and enjoy your trip.


By the way: You can now order the new Deutschlandticket via the BVG website or in our customer centres. It costs ‚Ç¨49 per month and is available as a personal season ticket without transferability. With the ticket, you can use the entire public transport system, including regional trains, throughout Germany. It is not possible to take other people, or bicycles with you on this ticket.


We will provide you with the ticket as a mobile phone ticket or as an electronic FahrCard in good time before the nationwide launch. Do you already have a BVG subscription? Great, you don't have to do anything at the moment, because we'll get in touch with you.


Travel anywhere with your BVG ticket, whether you are a Berlin local or a visiting tourist. Always as fast and as simple as possible!


So how does it work?


‚Ä¢ Download the BVG Tickets app to your device 
‚Ä¢ Connect your payment information 
‚Ä¢ Select your ticket type
‚Ä¢ Purchase the ticket 
‚Ä¢ Download straight to your device and start your journey


BVG Tickets offers a ticket purchasing service only and does not contain any other kind of travel information. If you need further travel and transport connection information then please download our BVG Fahrinfo app. 


Avoid waiting for the ticket machine in busy train and metro stations by connecting the BVG Tickets app with payment methods such as Amazon Pay, Apple Pay, credit card, PayPal, prepaid, SEPA direct debit, or express purchase (registration and payment with Apple Pay, PayPal). 


In our app you can purchase tickets covering any of the following tariff zones: 


‚Ä¢ Berlin AB
‚Ä¢ Berlin BC (C area includes, for example, Potsdam and Berlin Airport BER)
‚Ä¢ Berlin ABC (C area includes, for example, Potsdam and Berlin Airport BER)


All you need to do to get your next train, subway, tram or bus ticket straight to your phone is to register by using your email address, password, first and last name...that‚Äôs it. You‚Äôre good to go as soon as you purchase your ticket with the app. 


Do you already have a BVG account? Great, you don‚Äôt need to register again. You can use your current account information to log in and purchase tickets.


BVG Tickets can offer you any kind of ticket for traveling in Berlin. We have something for everybody whether you have lived here for 20 years or are only visiting for 2 days! 


With the BVG Tickets app, you can purchase any type of ticket for travel in Berlin, whether you are on your train journey to work or on the subway home. 


Our ticket app offers: 


‚Ä¢ Monthly pass 
‚Ä¢ 7-day card
‚Ä¢ Monthly ticket trainee (AB)
‚Ä¢ Berlin Ticket S (AB)
‚Ä¢ 4-trip card
‚Ä¢ 24-hour-ticket
‚Ä¢ Single ticket
‚Ä¢ Short haul
‚Ä¢ Connection ticket
‚Ä¢ Tourist tickets
‚Ä¢ Bicycle ticket


We‚Äôve got you covered for any type of ticket you need in Berlin whether you‚Äôre taking the train to Sch√∂neberg, taking the subway in Kreuzberg, getting the bus in Neuk√∂lln or riding the tram in Prenzlauer Berg. Just purchase any of these tickets to suit your needs and away you go


We guarantee that buying your Berlin transport tickets through the app will save you time on any purchase. Don‚Äôt wait around in line at the service desk or ticket machine ever again. With the BVG Tickets app, your transport links throughout Berlin just got a whole lot easier and faster! 


We welcome your feedback or suggestions. If we can do anything to help, you can contact us at appsupport@bvg.de and we‚Äôll get back to you as soon as possible.


Accessibility disclaimer for the BVG Tickets app:
https://www.bvg.de/en/subscriptions-and-tickets/all-apps/ticket-app/accessibility-disclaimer

title: Flighty ‚Äì Live Flight Tracker
description:
"Truly phenomenal" NYTimes ‚Ä¢ iPhone App of The Year 2023 Finalist ‚Ä¢ Apple Design Award 2023 ‚Ä¢ Made for passengers first

LIMITED TIME: Pro is free on your 1st flight. No credit card. No trial.

‚ñ∂ INDUSTRY-FIRST FEATURES
- 25-hour where's my plane
- private friends/family following
- pilot-grade FAA integration (direct data feed)
- delay forecast
- taxi times
- ground radar
- proximity radar

‚ñ∂ FULLY AUTOMATED
- calendar sync
- TripIt sync
- email forwarding
- Flighty Friends: private sharing with friends

‚ñ∂ PILOT-GRADE DATA
- live-streaming
- actual flight plans
- commercial data ‚Äì same source used by your pilot
- FAA advisories, warnings, and delays
- your tail number with birthday and type
- pilot flight timetable
- proximity radar - see flights around you
- ground radar - radar even while taxiing

‚ñ∂ PREDICT DELAYS
- Alerts for late or canceled inbound aircraft
- Alerts for airport weather or traffic
- Delay forecast

‚ñ∂ ASSISTANTS
- Morning-Of Assistant - wake up informed
- Check In Assistant - your reservation number and check in link at the right time
- Connection Assistant - make tight connections a breeze

‚ñ∂ WORLDWIDE + LIVE + UNLIMITED
- every airline
- every flight
- 24/7/365 live global coverage

‚ñ∂ FLIGHTY FRIENDS
- Often sharing with Family and Friends? Invite them to see your flights and never manually share again!
- Picking someone up, excited for a friend to visit, meeting a colleague? Share your live flight status with one tap.

‚ñ∂ WHATS FREE?
- no ads
- unlimited flights
- Flighty Friends
- live data
- weather

- aircraft model and image
- personal flight log and map
- personal all-time and annual stats

- historical flight lookup limited to past 365 days (due to costs)

‚ñ∂ WHATS PRO?
- industry's fastest push alerts

- live inbound plane tracking
- live lock screen widgets
- pilot-grade FAA delay alerts
- unlimited past flight lookup
- delay predictions
- arrival forecast
- TripIt sync
- calendar sync
- email forwarding
- Apple Watch complications
- tail number
- taxi times
- and more

Pro is included on your first flight. No trial required.

title: Austrian
description:
Book flights, reserve seats and keep track of your boarding passes - the Austrian app accompanies you throughout your journey with the Lufthansa Group network airlines.
You receive real-time information and all relevant updates about your flight directly on your smartphone in the form of push notifications. The Austrian App ensures you are always up to date.
Experience a smooth journey with the Austrian app. From booking your flight to landing and beyond, you can stay informed at all times. You can also conveniently manage your data and access personalized services via your personal profile.
In short: The Austrian App keeps you well informed throughout your journey.
Here‚Äôs how the Austrian App makes your journey easier:

Before departure
‚Ä¢	Book your flight, reserve your seat and add your baggage: Search for your desired flight, book it, and rent a car that will be waiting for you at your destination. You can also add any additional pieces of luggage directly in the app and reserve or change your seat.
‚Ä¢	Online check-in: With the Austrian app, you can check in online for all Lufthansa Group Network Airlines flights. Your digital flight ticket will then appear directly on your smartphone. When boarding, simply open the app to show your mobile boarding pass.
‚Ä¢	Travel ID and Austrian Miles and More: You can now save several payment methods directly to your Travel ID account thanks to the new digital wallet. This means you can pay with ease anytime and anywhere. Enter your personal details and select your personalized services to make the Austrian app even easier to use. To do this, use your Travel ID or your Austrian Miles & More login.
‚Ä¢	Real-time information and flight status: Starting 47 hours before your departure, your personal travel assistant will provide you with all important updates and information about your flight. Push notifications about check-in, flight status and gate changes make sure you are always up to date. With messages that pop up on your home screen, you always have an overview of your trip and can relax and enjoy your journey.

During the flight
‚Ä¢	Flight ticket and on-board services: With the Austrian app, you always have your mobile boarding pass and all on-board services with you ‚Äì even when you are offline. That way you can keep track of all important flight information and changes at all times.

After the flight
‚Ä¢	Track your baggage: Even after landing, the Austrian app will keep you informed of further steps that need to be taken. This means you always have an overview of your checked baggage and can track it easily.

The Austrian app is the perfect companion to ensure a relaxed journey. You can use the app to book your flights and rental cars, receive automatic notifications and updates on your next flight and edit your personal data easily and conveniently while on the move.
Download the Austrian app now for a relaxed travel experience with a personal digital travel assistant that accompanies you before, during and after your flight.
Learn more about our flight offers at austrian.com and follow us on Instagram, Facebook, YouTube and X to stay up to date.
If you have any questions or need any assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us. You can get in touch at https://www.austrian.com/at/en/contact#/.

title: HoppyGo
description:
Unlimited freedom of movement for everyone!
 
Do you want to head out for an adventurous weekend in a new crossover? Do you need a van to move your furniture? Or are you in dire straits because your car is being serviced? With HoppyGo car sharing, you can easily rent from more than 1 500 cars directly from the owners. Find the perfect vehicle for any occasion with over 300 car types in more than 240 cities across the Czech Republic. Get the key from your first rental within 24 hours since the sign up. 

At the same time, if your own car is parked in the lot far too often, you can join hundreds of car owners and start earning money by renting it to the others. HoppyGo will be your middleman. 

Is car the only missing piece in your plans?
1)	Create an account 
Signing up, filling in your profile and uploading necessary documents takes only a couple of minutes of your time. The approval process then takes less than 24 hours.

2)	Choose your car
Pick whichever car fits your need, choose the time of your rental and select your pickup location. All you have to do now is to wait for the approval from the owner. We recommend requesting multiple cars in case of some owners being busy. Finally, payment for the rental happens through app. You pay only for the car that has approved your rental first.

3)	Pick up your car or have it delivered to your doorstep
Communicate with the car owner via the HoppyGo app. Then meet the owner, go through the handover procedure and hit the road. You don‚Äôt have to worry, all rentals are insured to cover both drivers and owners.


Is your car sitting in the parking lot unused?
1)	Create an account within minutes
Becoming a part of the community of HoppyGo owners could not be easier. Then add your car, upload car documents and complete the car profile section.

2)	Fill in the rental details
Set the price for which you will rent your car and use our calendar to choose the times when your car is available. 

3)	Rent your car
Communicate with a driver beforehand and upload photos while handing the keys over for insurance purposes. You don‚Äôt have to worry, all rentals are insured to cover both drivers and owners.

4)	Collect the money 
The money arrives to your bank account in less than a week after the rental is finished.

Follow HoppyGo on
Facebook via https://www.facebook.com/HoppyGoCZ 
Instagram via https://www.instagram.com/hoppygo.cz/

Have a question?
Try our blog https://blog.hoppygo.com/ or give us a call at +420 220 311 769
