title: FordPass‚Ñ¢
description:
FordPass offers the ability to manage your vehicle right from your phone:

‚Ä¢	Send convenient remote commands ‚Äì Lock, unlock, and start your vehicle using complimentary remote vehicle controls (1) ‚Äì when equipped with FordPass¬Æ Connect (2)
‚Ä¢	Electric vehicle ownership support ‚Äì Monitor charging progress and use Departure Times to pre-condition your battery and cabin (3) 
‚Ä¢	FordPass feature availability varies by vehicle and country. Images shown for illustrative purposes only


(1) Remote lock/unlock requires power door locks. Remote starting requires automatic transmission.
(2) FordPass Connect (optional on select vehicles), the FordPass App and complimentary Connected Service are required for remote features (see FordPass Terms for details). Connected service and features depend on compatible network availability. Evolving technology/cellular networks/vehicle capability may limit functionality and prevent operation of connected features. Connected service excludes Wi-Fi hotspot.
(3) Effectiveness of cabin conditioning may be reduced by extreme outside temperatures.

title: iTranslate Converse
description:
Turn your iPhone into a translation device!  

Introducing iTranslate Converse, a revolutionary new speech translation App. iTranslate Converse turns your iPhone and Apple Watch into a two-way translation device. The simple design enables natural conversations in 38 languages, and automatically detects the correct language between two selected languages for a fast and accurate translation.

Speak directly into your iPhone‚Äôs microphone and dramatically improve results as well as create a more natural conversation experience. It literally turns your iPhone into the first real translation device.

SIMPLE & EASY
Tap & Hold to Speak. Release to Translate. The entire screen becomes your translation button.

SUPERIOR TRANSLATION ACCURACY
Works well in noisy environments.

BLAZING FAST
Delivers translation results in near real time.

38 LANGUAGES
Instantly converse in 38 languages.

LANGUAGE DETECTION
Automatic detection between the 2 selected languages for a seamless translation experience.

TRANSCRIPTS
View and export full transcripts for every voice conversation.


Learn more about iTranslate Converse at https://www.itranslate.com/converse

SUPPORT
Visit https://www.itranslate.com/support/ or contact us at help@itranslate.com

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/iTranslateApp
Like & share on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/itranslateapp
Learn more about iTranslate: https://www.itranslate.com

Supported languages & dialects for translation:
Arabic (Saudi), Arabic (UAE), Arabic (Egypt), Catalan, Chinese (Mandarin), Chinese (Taiwan), Chinese (Cantonese), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English (US), English (GB), English (Australian), Finnish, French, French (Canada), German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (Portugal), Portuguese (Brazil), Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Spanish (Spain), Spanish (USA), Spanish (Mexico), Swedish, Thai, Turkish

For a Complete Language overview: https://itranslate.com/languages

---
Auto Renewable Subscription Terms:
Subscriptions are billed monthly or annually at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan.
The price corresponds to the same price segment, which are set in the "Apple's App Store Matrix" for other currencies.
* Your free trial subscription will automatically renew to a paid subscription unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period. 
* Please note: any unused portion of a free trial period (if offered) will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period.
* You can cancel a free trial or subscription anytime by turning off auto-renewal through your iTunes account settings. This must be done 24 hours before the end of a free trial or subscription period to avoid being charged. The cancellation will take effect the day after the last day of the current subscription period, and you will be downgraded to the free service.
* Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.

Terms of Service: 
https://www.itranslate.com/terms-of-service

Privacy Policy: 
https://www.itranslate.com/privacy-policy

California Privacy Rights: 
https://www.itranslate.com/privacy-policy#InformationCaliforniaPrivacyRights

‚Ä¢ An internet connection is required to use the app.

To improve our App for you, we regularly bring updates to the App Store with improvements for both speed and reliability. If you enjoy iTranslate Converse, would you mind taking a moment to write a review on the App Store? We‚Äôd greatly appreciate it

title: Marriott Bonvoy
description:
Unlock extraordinary experiences with the Marriott Bonvoy‚Ñ¢ app.

The Marriott Bonvoy App lets you elevate every aspect of your stay at more than 7,000 hotels worldwide. So you can spend more time taking care of the most important detail‚Äîenjoying yourself. Download the app today and discover a world of opportunity.

Check in from anywhere with Mobile Check-in. Let us know when you‚Äôre arriving and you‚Äôll receive a notification when your room is ready.

With Mobile Key you can get to your room faster, and never have to worry about forgetting a key card.  Use it to open your room, parking garage, fitness center, lounge, and pool. 

Mobile Chat lets you talk directly to your hotel. Available just before, during and even after your stay, ask the front desk for local recommendations, request amenities and more while on-the go. 

Need something? Mobile Requests gives you a list of amenities to choose from to customize your stay, or even ask for something you forgot, like a comb or toothpaste.

Plan ahead while you‚Äôre out exploring. Browse and order food and drinks from your hotel‚Äôs menu at participating properties, and it will be ready when you return. 

Search hotels and book all from your phone. Get our lowest rate when you book directly with Marriott. Earn and redeem points for your stays, for a rewarding vacation.

Manage your account easily on the app. Check your point balance, view your stay history, folio, and more.

Want to book with points? Easily redeem points on the app to pay for your next stay.

Enjoy exclusive offers and content for Marriott Bonvoy members that you can take advantage of right away.

Not a Marriott Bonvoy member? Download and join, all through the app.

The Marriott Bonvoy App lets you enjoy more at Marriott‚Äôs 30 brands including AC Hotels by Marriott¬Æ, Aloft¬Æ Hotels, Autograph Collection¬Æ Hotels, Bulgari¬Æ,Courtyard¬Æ, Delta Hotels¬Æ, Design HotelsTM, EDITION¬Æ, Element¬Æ, Fairfield Inn & Suites¬Æ, Four Points¬Æ by Sheraton, Gaylord Hotels¬Æ, JW Marriott¬Æ, Le M√©ridien¬Æ, Moxy¬Æ Hotels, Marriott Executive Apartments¬Æ, Marriott Hotels¬Æ, Marriott Vacation Club¬Æ, Protea Hotels¬Æ, Renaissance¬Æ Hotels, Residence Inn¬Æ, Sheraton¬Æ, SpringHill Suites¬Æ, St. Regis¬Æ, The Luxury Collection¬Æ, The Ritz-Carlton¬Æ, TownePlace Suites¬Æ, Tribute Portfolio¬Æ, W¬Æ Hotels and Westin¬Æ Hotels & Resorts.
releaseNotes:
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

We are constantly improving our app to offer you a frictionless trip planning and travel experience. Thank you for trusting the Marriott Bonvoy¬Æ App for your travel!

title: Pelipecky
description:
Pelipecky is your travel buddy. It finds the cheapest flight tickets, highlights the latest news, offers, discounts and promotions, it shows you how to travel round the world. Use this application as a travel and holiday inspiration. Download our travel articles to your phone and read them later and offline.

BENEFITS OF THE APP

HOT NEWS
Just click on the section ‚ÄúHot News‚Äù and get the best deals 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. If we find a great flight ticket, holiday package or a new flight route, you can be sure you‚Äôll find them here. Don‚Äôt forget to enable the push notifications to get the best deals and latest news. 

SIMPLE FLIGHT BOOKING 
You can book your flight easily, without filling the passengers‚Äô contact details. Thanks to the simple registration and intuitive order management you‚Äôll find, book and purchase your ticket easily for yourself and your family members. It‚Äôs a fast way of making reservations allowing you to book your tickets before they sell out.

OFFLINE TRAVEL GUIDES
Our articles, guides, holidays, tips and news about destinations can be saved in the app and read later. For example at the airport or on the airplane. 

BENEFITS AND DISCOUNTS
We give special discount codes to the TOP and fastest users of our app. You can redeem the codes directly in the app op buy flights or accommodation cheaper.

CHECK YOUR ORDER STATUS
Do you like the flight tickets and gift vouchers from Pelikan? You can also find them in the Pelipecky app. After booking your flight you can check the status of your reservation at any time. No unexpected event can surprise you.

UNIQUE FLIGHT COMBINATIONS 
Combine flights from different airlines and use small local airports. The section TOP flights at the best prices allows you to find the best deals quickly and easily.

ROUND THE WORLD TRIPS
Plan, choose and buy a trip around the world with the Pelipecky app. The application offers an easy selection of return and one-way tickets or tickets with different arrival and departure airports. Discover our Multicity deals and see the whole world with the Pelipecky.
 
APPLICATION FEATURES
- Return and one-way ticket searching and booking
- Multicity ticket searching and booking
- Flight filters by number of transfers, airports, airlines etc.
- Overview of reservations and orders
- Login to the App
- Travel Articles 
- Saving articles and viewing them offline
- Hot News
- iMessage stickers
releaseNotes:
NEW FEATURES:
- functionality to mark promotional calendars as favorite
- premium features directly in the app
- brand new hotel reviews 



UPGRADES:
- adjustment of passenger selection
- better overview of the purchased products in the order details
- minor bug fixes

title: Trip.com: Flight, Hotel, Train
description:
Winner of 'Europe‚Äôs Best Online Travel Agency 2023' from the World Travel Awards.
¬†
The Trip.com app is your trusted travel companion whenever and wherever you are. Get the app now to create your perfect trip at a fantastic price!
¬†
#Why is the Trip.com App Trust-worthy?
¬†
24/7 SERVICE GUARANTEE¬†‚ñ∫ You can rely on timely customer support and post-booking protection with our 24/7 service guarantee. Our awarding-winning customer support helps every customer with a stress-free trip.
¬†
24 LANGUAGES SUPPORTED ‚ñ∫¬†Switch the app to your native language and manage all your bookings with ease.
¬†
31 CURRENCIES & MULTIPLE PAYMENT OPTIONS ‚ñ∫¬†We have a payment solution for international travellers. All frequently-used payment methods supported in the app.
¬†
TRAVEL INSURANCE ‚ñ∫¬†Fly with peace of mind with our comprehensive travel insurance plans.
¬†
OFFICIAL PARTNERSHIPS ‚ñ∫¬†Trip.com app is an official partner of National Rail, Eurostar, Ryanair, British Airways, meaning you have access to industry-leading travel products. In short, you can count on us for a reliable travel experience!
¬†
MEMBER-ONLY REWARDS ‚ñ∫¬†Become a Trip member and get exclusive rewards, such as earning in our rewards scheme Trip Coins that will help you save more in the future. Join us now for free and get more for less!
¬†
#How can you get the best service at the best price on the Trip.com app?
¬†
FLIGHTS.
¬†
FIND YOUR PERFECT FLIGHT ‚ñ∫ The Trip.com app offers flights to around 5,000 cities worldwide. You can even book a chartered flight! The Trip.com app lets you filter by price, flight duration, travel time, airline, or number of stops. Pick a multi-city itinerary, so you can fly into one city and out of another.
¬†
LOW-PRICE MAP ‚ñ∫¬†The map offers our cheapest available flights worldwide, from Europe, Asia to the Americas, Oceania, and Africa. Get inspiration from thousands of routes and find your next adventure.
¬†
PRICE DROP ALERTS ‚ñ∫¬†Can't find a flight in your price range?¬†Just set up a price drop alert. We'll let you know as soon as it hits the point you're happy with.
¬†
FLIGHT STATUS CHECKER ‚ñ∫¬†Enter your flight number and get real-time flight info.
¬†
TRAINS.
¬†
WORLDWIDE TRAIN TICKETS ‚ñ∫¬†Whether you're hitting the rails in Europe (incl. the UK, France, Italy, Spain, and Germany), mainland China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, or South Korea, you'll find everything you need on Trip.com.
¬†
OFFICIAL PARTNERSHIPS ‚ñ∫¬†We connect directly with the train's information for updated schedule info and prices, which lets you search quickly through available fares, saving you time and money.
¬†
SPLIT TICKETS ‚ñ∫¬†Book your journey in separate segments and enjoy lower fares without compromising on your travel experience.
¬†
LIVE TRACKER ‚ñ∫¬†We'll keep an eye on the status of your train. Check back one day before departure for the latest information.
¬†
HOTELS.
¬†
ADVANCED SEARCH FILTER ‚ñ∫¬†On Trip.com, you can browse more than 1.4 million options worldwide.¬†Whether you‚Äôre in the mood for a money-saving apartment stay or a luxury five-stay hotel, a cozy B&B or a fun-filled resort, it‚Äôs easy to find the right accommodation.
¬†
WE PRICE MATCH ‚ñ∫¬†We aim to offer you the best possible price. If you find a cheaper option elsewhere, we'll refund the difference.
¬†
VERIFIED USER REVIEWS ‚ñ∫¬†We have over 30 million verified hotel reviews to help you make your decision.
¬†
HOTEL AND FLIGHT BUNDLE BOOKING ‚ñ∫¬†Save money by booking your hotel and flight together. If your flight is rescheduled, we'll guarantee your hotel room.
¬†
AND MORE.
¬†
TRIP.BEST RANKINGS ‚ñ∫ You can find top attractions, family-friendly spots, natural sites and much more!
¬†
TRIP MANAGEMENT IN ONE APP ‚ñ∫ You¬†can add itinerary to your calendar, or save as a photo for offline use.
¬†
CAR RENTAL ‚ñ∫ Free cancellation available!
¬†
Download the Trip.com app now to discover more amazing features and create your perfect trip - just like that!
releaseNotes:
We've been working hard to improve the Trip.com app, to make sure you have the best trip possible. Here's what's new:

„ÄêTripGenie 2.0„Äë
TripGenie is an AI assistant created by Trip.com to help users with travel questions. Voice chat with TripGenie to get instant travel tips and personalized itineraries tailored just for you.

„ÄêChina Travel Guide„Äë
Planning a trip to China? Trip.com has everything you need. Search the keyword "China", to access Trip.com's exclusive 2024 China travel guide. From airport arrival to accommodation, transportation, sightseeing, shopping, payment solutions, and more, our travel guide will help you get the most out of your trip to China.

„ÄêTrip Map„Äë
Finding your way between airports, hotels, stations, and attractions too chaotic? Make Trip.com your travel assistant. Trip Map is a DIY feature you can use to visually display travel routes. Just tap to view your personal map, distances, and itinerary times, and even optimize your route.

„ÄêChuang Asia TH x Trip.com„Äë
Chuang Asia Thailand Dream Voyage Star Search! Search "Chuang Asia" and vote for your favorite trainees! The winners will have an extra sharing session during the show! 

We hope you love our new app version. If you need help or have any feedback, feel free to contact our online customer support or leave an app review.

Have a great trip! 

The Trip.com Team

title: Air France - Book a flight
description:
Meet a pocket-sized travel assistant designed to help you at every step of your journey.





From booking a flight, checking in, and receiving real-time flight updates to managing your Flying Blue account, the Air France app is your must-have travel tool.





BOOK A FLIGHT

Book your ticket for any of our destinations using your preferred secure payment method. To save time on future bookings, simply add your contact information to your profile, and we‚Äôll prefill your details. 




OBTAIN YOUR BOARDING PASS

Check in, select your seat, and obtain your boarding pass directly in the app.




STAY INFORMED

Turn on notifications and get real-time flight updates and exclusive content about your destination. You can also share your flight status with your loved ones to stay in touch with those on the ground.




MANAGE YOUR BOOKING

Need to review your ticket conditions, update your contact information or make a last-minute change to your booking? Manage your booking seamlessly directly in the app.



ENHANCE YOUR TRAVEL EXPERIENCE

Go the extra mile and add one of our extra travel options to your booking with a simple click (seat selection, special meals, lounge access, and more).



A SPECIAL SERVICE FOR YOUR CHILD

Is your child traveling alone via the trusted Kids Solo service? Track and manage their journey directly in the app.



ACCESS YOUR FLYING BLUE ACCOUNT

Check your Miles balance, book a rewards flight, modify your profile, and access your virtual Flying Blue card!

title: TIER - Move Better
description:
OUR MISSION: NO EMISSION

TIER is reinventing how we travel within our cities by offering shared electric micro-mobility options as an alternative to traditional forms of urban transport. Take a TIER electric scooter and choose a sustainable and emission-free way to get around.

Our safe and affordable scooters, bikes, and mopeds are fully electric and climate-neutral, allowing you to contribute towards a cleaner, greener, and more sustainable city - all while having fun along the way. 

WHY OWN A CAR WHEN YOU CAN OWN THE STREETS

TIER scooters are conveniently placed in your city to make traveling from A to B hassle-free. Simply rent a TIER e-scooter near you on the map, scan the QR code and go!

‚Ä¢ Why take a TIER?
‚Ä¢ No CO2 emissions with TIER e-scooters
‚Ä¢ Find parking easily
‚Ä¢ Beat the traffic
‚Ä¢ Save time
‚Ä¢ Explore new cities
‚Ä¢ Rent to live a get-up-and-go lifestyle
‚Ä¢ Ride e-scooters with friends
‚Ä¢ Commute with e-scooters to and from work
‚Ä¢ Renting = Sharing is caring

To rent rather than to buy is how we take back our cities, and TIER mobility is here to help. Download the app, sign up, and start sharing scooters in seconds. Here‚Äôs how to use the TIER app


USING THE TIER APP

TIER electric scooters, bikes and mopeds give you the freedom to explore your city and to get where you need to be in a smart, safe, and sustainable way. Simply open the app and rent a ride with a few simple steps.

HOW TO START A TIER E-SCOOTER & GET GOING

‚Ä¢ Download the TIER app, sign up, and add your preferred payment method
‚Ä¢ Find a TIER scooter near you on the map
‚Ä¢ Scan the QR code on the scooter to unlock it and start a ride
‚Ä¢ Push the e-scooter forward to flick the kickstand back
‚Ä¢ Put one foot on the board and push off with the other
‚Ä¢ Push down the throttle to gain speed
‚Ä¢ Let go of the throttle or use the brakes to slow down.
‚Ä¢ Surf your city and enjoy the ride!

HOW TO END YOUR RIDE

‚Ä¢ Find a safe place to park the scooter and flick the kickstand down
‚Ä¢ Open the TIER app and tap 'End Ride'
‚Ä¢ Get out there and live your best life!

APP FEATURES

The TIER mobile app is truly mobile. A sleek design and easy-to-use interface allow you to make the most of your smartphone as a tool for fast and efficient mobility.

‚Ä¢ NAVIGATE nearby electric vehicles
‚Ä¢ SCAN the QR code on a scooter to unlock it
‚Ä¢ RING a scooter if you are having trouble finding it
‚Ä¢ VERIFY your license to use e-mopeds (not required for e-scooter use)
‚Ä¢ STORE minutes and unlocks in your wallet
‚Ä¢ REDEEM free rides with a discount voucher or promo code
‚Ä¢ REFER friends for free minutes
‚Ä¢ SAVE money with our deals in the shop

RIDE MORE FOR LESS WITH OFFERS IN OUR SHOP

Save money with our monthly or daily passes. When you‚Äôre on the go, it‚Äôs better to pay a flat rate and get the most out of your usage!

‚Ä¢ RIDER PLUS skip the unlock fee on every ride + 300 minutes!
‚Ä¢ MONTHLY UNLOCKS no unlock fees. Pay only for minutes. 
‚Ä¢ DAY PASS enjoy up to 45 minutes during each ride for free + no unlock fees

TAKE A TIER AND JOIN THE REVOLUTION AGAINST POLLUTION

TIER gives you access to sustainable urban travel. With our fleet of shared electric scooters in 100+ cities worldwide, TIER is on a mission to change mobility for good. So whether you're headed to work, class, or just around the block, let TIER get you to where you‚Äôre going on our scooters, bikes or mopeds.

title: What Would You Choose? Rather

Would You Rather is a fun and addicting game where you have to choose between two difficult scenarios.

- Works offline. No Wi-Fi is required to play this game

Would You Rather is a great game to play with your family or friends to start conversations. 

What are you waiting for? Grab your friends and have a fun by playing a game of What Would You Choose.

title: SAP Concur
description:

title: NS Travel Planner
description:
About the NS app
The free NS app is your ideal travelling companion. It lets you plan your entire journey to any address in the Netherlands and keep up to date with the latest travel information and any disruptions as you go. You can also easily check where you can hire a public transport bicycle or shared car in your area, or quickly find the nearest P+R if you are travelling partly by car. See how crowded it is on the train and have your tickets quickly on hand. Everything to help you get going by whatever transport suits you best today.

Why traveling with the NS app
+ Best app in the Public Transport category
+ over 2 million users
+ Quick, safe and easy payment
+ The ‚ÄúNearby me‚Äù feature lets you see exactly which forms of transport are available in the neighbourhood, from train, bus, tram and metro to public transport bicycles and shared cars. All in a single overview. So it‚Äôs the easy way to plan your entire door-to-door journey.
+ Arrange it all easily in Mijn NS. You can check your balance, access your journey information, simply change your travel class and view and change your season tickets.

Feedback
Every journey starts with the NS app. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôre always improving the app with new functions that will help you with your journey even more. If you have any questions, tips or other feedback, let us know in the app. That will let us make the app experience even better!
releaseNotes:
Every journey starts in the NS app. That is why we keep improving the app with larger and smaller changes that help you on your way even more.

If you have any questions or suggestions, let us know in the app.

Enjoy your trip!

title: ESTA Mobile
description:
The Electronic System for Travel Authorization (ESTA) app from U.S. Customs and Border Protection allows Nationals of Visa Waiver Program (VWP) countries to apply and pay for a travel authorization without a visa. The ESTA app is a mobile version of the ESTA application process and information that can also be found on the ESTA website at https://esta.cbp.dhs.gov. 

The ESTA app currently has two features available: Apply for New Individual Application and Search for Existing Application.
‚Ä¢	The ‚ÄúGET STARTED‚Äù feature allows travelers to create a new ESTA application, pay for the ESTA and submit the application to be processed by the system to determine if they are eligible to travel to the United States under the Visa Waiver Program without a visa. The system will provide the traveler with an automated response.
‚Ä¢	The ‚ÄúFIND IT‚Äù feature allows travelers to check the status of their existing ESTA application..
CBP recommends that you apply for ESTA at the time you book your travel, but no less than 72 hours prior to boarding.
releaseNotes: Fix to address scanning issue with some recently issued passports

title: Careem ‚Äì rides, food & more
description:
Meet Careem, the everything app for your everyday needs. Rides, food, groceries, payments and more. 
Unlock unlimited savings and exclusive benefits with Careem Plus. 


Yalla, simplify your life with a tap. 

Careem Plus
If you‚Äôre looking for value and unlimited savings, this subscription is for you. Save AED 200+ every month and unlock unbelievable benefits on rides, food, dining out, groceries, cleaning, plus more!
*Now in Dubai and Amman only, coming soon to more cities

GO anywhere
Book a ride or schedule a pick-up for later with affordable and comfortable car types - including city to city*, Hala taxi or local taxi services*. Or explore the city on two wheels with Careem Bike*! Enjoy instant 10% credit back on 10 rides and unlimited 45-minute bike rides with Careem Plus.
Explore our ride services: Hala taxi |  Comfort, Executive, Premier rides | Careem Bike | Car Rentals
*Services and Careem Plus benefits vary from location to location

EAT everything
Get your favourite food delivered on time and straight to your door. Customise your order to your liking, and track your food delivery in real time. Or discover Dubai‚Äôs finest restaurants with Careem DineOut. 
With Careem Plus you can skip the delivery fee on food and enjoy special discounts on  dining out. 
 Explore our food services: Food delivery | CareemDineOut 
*Services and Careem Plus benefits vary from location to location

GET anything
Get your groceries delivered in a flash with Quik Groceries and enjoy no delivery fee with Careem Plus.
Book everything from home cleaning to laundry, tickets, salon & spa services and more with just a tap.
Explore our services: Quik Groceries | Laundry | Home Cleaning | Tickets | Salon & Spa | Delivery 
*Services and Careem Plus benefits vary from location to location

PAY anyone
The easiest way is Careem Pay. Send money abroad, pay your bills, split the check and more, with just a tap. 
Explore our services: Send money | Split Bills | Bill Payments | Global transfers 
*Now in UAE only, coming soon to more countries
releaseNotes:
We had a look under the hood, crossed some wires. Uncrossed others. Sprinkled a little tech dust, and now your app experience is better than ever.

In this release:
- Updates in Rides, Food, and Pay experiences
- Various fixes and improvements
reviews:
And there seen no improvement for many months. | I've had extremely negative experience using this app. 

We booked a trip to the airport for our morning flight. The pickup time was set to 3am and I charged Careem credits explicitly so I didn't have to use cash and deal with scammer taxi drivers. Our driver called me at 2:55 claiming that he needs a payment in cash and that it'll be 100Dhs instead of 50-73 which was the range the app listed. What I didn't realize at the time was that the app was already charging us the Careem credit so the driver was trying to scam us into double paying.

We needed to catch our flight so I agreed but said I needed to withdraw from ATM at the airport. The driver proceeded to drive us AWAY from the airport looking for ATMs because I refused to pay a large withdrawal fee at the one where he stopped for us. 

When I found out he wasn't going to the airport I threatened to call support and police at which point he finally turned around. At the airport I found out he was trying to double charge us the entire time.

I contacted Careem support with this case and they did not react.

Stay away from this app. Let your hotel arrange a driver with pre set price instead. | Driver marked as Arrived, however not to where he was meant to pick me up. Kept chatting with him for 10min asking him where he is, even sending him pic showing him where he‚Äôs meant to be, he just cancelled the ride without my knowledge or agreement, making my account outstanding and unable to book another ride! Support not responding even 6 hours and 4 messages later - no one answered or dealt with the issue, I am still unable to book a ride and go where l was going. Just awful experience - with the drive and non existent customer service | Book your taxi via different providers, Careem is the worst service ever | I can not find a button for cancelling a plus subscription. | I ordered a taxi that didn‚Äôt come to my location and it was driving around instead, the driver didn‚Äôt reply to any of my message where he is. After 15 minutes of trying, waiting and searching I gave up and caught taxi on the street because I really had to go. Btw normal taxi was 70% cheaper!!!! The customer service was absolutely horrible and refused to refund my money or get me some voucher. They were constantly ending the chat in the middle of conversation. Please don‚Äôt bother to use this app and take normal taxi. | I was using careem for years, Im done with this app as they charge me more money for fault of their captain which drive me in wrong location and I almost missed flight! Both cases are from April 5th. | Bad | Worst app, incapable service, always late, never using again, over charging money, zero customer support more like customer disgust . Just horrible‚Ä¶ literally anything else is better even nothing. | I just wanted one item to be delivered but there is no information in the whole App customer journey saying the item can‚Äôt exceed particular size and weight so after 20 minutes waiting for the driver I just got a call from call center that it won‚Äôt be delivered and I will be charged anyway. Very bad customer experience and the improvement is so easy!!! Just add a sentence behind the note ‚Äúcaptain can buy items up to maximum amount of 350 AED and size that won‚Äôt exceed x and weigh up to y‚Äù. You will avoid many complaints. Thank you. | Taxis are comming more and more LATE!!! | Now with Covid it‚Äôs a pain to get taxis for a family of 4 since front seat sitting is restricted.  With the app you are able to book various sizes easily.  Note that for the airport make sure to book the wheel chair accessible van in order to fit 4 people and luggage. | I used Careem in Amman and had the worst experience. The user experience is a disaster, one time the app works and 20 times it doesn‚Äôt. I keep receiving error messages that I can‚Äôt book rides. I submitted many forms to their customer service and received no response. I have also contacted them through their FB page but the issue wasn‚Äôt resolved. I even topped up my account with credit that I can no longer use because of the issue.

title: WiFi Map: Internet, eSIM, VPN
description:
WiFi Map is an all-in-one app that will come in handy whenever you're on travel.

#1 App for Travellers in 100+ countries

WiFi Map and Passwords
Always find a free WiFi hotspot around. WiFi Map will navigate you to the nearest shared hotspots, show passwords, and let you connect to the internet in a few taps.
‚Ä¢ millions of shared WiFi hotspots
‚Ä¢ offline regions to find WiFi without the internet
‚Ä¢ detailed map with hotspots and POIs
‚Ä¢ guided navigation to public WiFi
‚Ä¢ speed testing capabilities

eSIM
Stay online even without a Wi-Fi nearby. Get our eSIM now and access the internet wherever you go.
‚Ä¢ Internet in 70+ countries
‚Ä¢ 30 days validity
‚Ä¢ 1GB, 3GB, 5GB and 10GB available packages
‚Ä¢ fast refill
‚Ä¢ High speed 4G and LTE networks
‚Ä¢ no contract
‚Ä¢ activation in a few taps


VPN
Secure your internet connection when using public hotspots. Select from dozens of VPN servers and enjoy fast, secure, and reliable internet access to your favourite services.

Handy Widgets
Meet small but useful widgets that contain all the information you may need while traveling. Find actual rates, calculate tips, keep an eye on the weather, and time from a single app.
‚Ä¢ currency rates converter
‚Ä¢ world clock
‚Ä¢ tips calculator
‚Ä¢ local weather
‚Ä¢ and more

WiFi Map offers a subscription plan that gives you more functionality including downloadable offline regions, fast and secure VPN, and completely disabled ads.
‚Ä¢ Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
‚Ä¢ Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
‚Ä¢ An account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
‚Ä¢ Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
‚Ä¢ Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

----------------------------

title: Rentalcars.com - Car hire App
description:
Rentalcars.com Car Hire App.
Need a great car at a great price ‚Äì fast?Download our mobile app and you can...
1) Book the nearest car at the lowest price.Need a car on another continent? Or just around the corner? With over 49,000 locations worldwide, our app will find you the right hire car in the right place ‚Äì at the best price.
2) Pick your car up with your phone.The Rentalcars.com eVoucher is accepted almost everywhere, so forget the printer. Just save your voucher on the app and pick your car up with your phone.
3) Enter your details once ‚Äì and only once.Every booking, every driver, every credit card‚Ä¶ our car hire app stores all the information securely, so you don‚Äôt need to re-enter your details every time you hire a car.
A great travel app for people on the go!
The world‚Äôs biggest...As the world‚Äôs biggest car hire booking service, we work with every major car hire company in the world and serve over 7.5 million customers every year. That means we can negotiate the best rates ‚Äì and pass the savings on to you.
For exclusive deals in over 49,000 locations, download our app today.
releaseNotes:
We update our app on a regular basis, making it even faster, simpler and more reliable.

It‚Äôs already the ideal companion for anyone who loves the freedom and independence that only a car can provide.

And each new release means it‚Äôs easier than ever to find the perfect car, wherever your journey takes you.

title: ISIC
description:
Get access to thousands of student offers and services available to ISIC cardholders worldwide. Discover what student discounts are available to you and instantly prove your student status with your digital ISIC card! The International Student Identity Card (ISIC) is the only internationally accepted proof of official student status for millions of students in over 130 countries. 

Features:

‚Ä¢ Search thousands of ISIC offers worldwide and redeem them instantly
‚Ä¢ Verify your student status with your digital ISIC card
‚Ä¢ Browse and filter discounts around the world at the location of your choice
‚Ä¢ View discounts near you on the map
‚Ä¢ Store your favourite discounts and get notified about new offers	

You‚Äôre a student and don‚Äôt have your ISIC card yet? Visit www.isic.org to get your card now and start saving both at home and when you‚Äôre travelling abroad.

The ISIC Association is the non-profit organisation behind the International Student Identity Card (ISIC). The application can be also used for the International Youth Travel card (IYTC) and International Teacher Identity Card (ITIC).

Tell us what you like, dislike and need for future releases. We value and need your feedback to give you the best mobile experience out there. Email us at mobile@isic.org and we will get back to you.
releaseNotes: We have added support for Italian and Chinese language.

title: Road Trip: Fun adventure town!
description:
Expeditions, adventures, merges, and puzzles await you in our exciting Road Trip game! It is an amazing life story of a girl Alex and her friends. Become a part of it!
- Expeditions to islands, locations, and caves.
- Hundreds of levels and cool riddles.
- Exciting plot.
- Merge and puzzles.
- Lots and lots of fun.
Hurry up and play our game and enjoy all its features.

Casual Adventure Game! Mobile Application Adventure Game. Casual Adventure in your pocket! Road Trip: Royal merge Adventure Games is an Adventure Game about traveling through the world of secrets and mysteries!  World with a unique history and events awaits you! 
        Mobile application Road Trip: Royal merge Adventure games is a mobile application that is always with you in your mobile device. Mobile game is an Adventure for the whole family. Road Trip is a whole Klondike Adventure! Real family island with different locations and mysterious places. Casual Adventure game is waiting for you!

         Our Road Trip game is a unique township of story-driven Adventures and journeys. Merge items and have fun with the events! Journey through our game will introduce you to Alex, the main character of this story!
   Join Alex, an aspiring designer, on a journey to discover the secrets of unexplored lands!
   Merge items Alex and her friends desperately need in their Adventure!
   Visit the unusual locations of the 1980s and enjoy their authentic architecture and interiors!
   Complete quests to advance in your travels with Alex and earn fantastic rewards!
   Solve challenging puzzles encountered along the way!
   Many colorful characters, different backgrounds, professions: cooks, mechanics, gallery owners, adventurers, shamans and scammers. Many animals - for each location of our game Road Trip!

  - 30+ locations with different geographical settings: empty ones are replaced by mountain peaks, snow forests, tropical islands! Urban landscapes with wild thickets, jungle - all this is available in our mobile game Road Trip: Royal merge adventure! Real road Adventure with a constant change of scenery outside the window.
  - Each chapter is a separate living world, a reference to a certain American state and iconic places like Roswell and UFOs and the like!
  - Each location is a small story. Our game Road Trip gives freedom of genres and moods: there are action-packed adventures in the jungle, traps and crocodiles, mystical ghosts of the Hawaiian Islands, chases and bizarre mechanisms, reality TV shooting (intrigue, investigation), dates and balloon flights. Treasures and architectural puzzles, caves and ancient civilizations! Love line and a triangle in the fight for the heart of our heroine Alex!
  - Setting in the spirit of 1960-1980 blurred timelines, lack of modern gadgets, nostalgia for a bygone time!
  - Road Trip: Royal merge adventure games has a huge number of different mini-games! Play for fun!
  - Every month there is an update with new mechanics/time events. We release a new location every week!
  - Event Expeditions, time-limited expeditions with new mechanics in the merge! Treasury rooms, crafting, garden beds, energy generators at the location, tournaments, season pass, wheel of Fortune!

Road Trip is a matching puzzle merge adventure game! Game of merge items for the whole family. Play our relaxing puzzle merge game. You‚Äôll match and merge items, solve puzzles. You can play our Road Trip game without internet!

     The great merge journey is about to begin! Have fun exploring the worlds of Road Trip!
releaseNotes:
Alex's journey continues! In this update, you'll find:
- Daily tasks and gifts for our favorite players!
- New albums with collectible cards.
- Attractive deals and offers. Hurry, they are time limited!
- Bonuses, surprises, and lots of rewards!
Enjoy!

title: SWISS
description:
Book flights, reserve seats and access your digital boarding passes. With the SWISS app, your mobile travel companion for journeys with the Lufthansa Group network airlines, you can do all this and more.
Push notifications will inform you of your flight‚Äôs status in real time, so you are kept up to date throughout your journey.
With the SWISS app you are always well informed, from booking your flight to the arrival of your baggage at your destination so you can rest assured that your journey will run smoothly. Your personal data and personalized services can all be conveniently managed on your smartphone.
In short, the SWISS app ensures you are well informed about all aspects of your flight.
The main features of the SWISS app:

Before your flight
‚Ä¢	Book your flight, reserve your seat and add your baggage: All this can be done conveniently in the app. You can also book a rental car or reserve or change your seat on the plane if you need to. With the app, you also have the option to add additional baggage.

‚Ä¢	Online check-in: Use the SWISS app to check in with ease for all flights operated by Lufthansa Group Network Airlines. Your digital flight ticket will be sent directly to your smartphone. Use the app to show your mobile boarding pass at the airport.

‚Ä¢	Travel ID and SWISS Miles and More: You now have the option of adding several payment methods to your Travel ID account so you can pay seamlessly and easily anytime and anywhere. To log in, use your Travel ID or SWISS Miles & More login credentials. Enter your personal data and personalized services to adapt the SWISS app to your needs.

‚Ä¢	Real-time information and flight status: In the 24 hours before your flight, your personal travel assistant will inform you of all important updates about your trip. Push notifications will appear on your home screen, so you always know when it‚Äôs time to check in or if there have been any gate changes. This way you always have an overview of your flight and the most current information.

During the flight
‚Ä¢	Flight ticket and on-board services: With the SWISS app, you always have your mobile boarding pass and on-board services in your pocket, even during the flight and when you‚Äôre offline. This means you receive important flight information when you need it, ensuring that any changes to your flight don‚Äôt come as a surprise.

After the flight
‚Ä¢	Track your baggage: Your digital travel companion is also there to lend a helping hand after landing. You can easily track your checked baggage in the SWISS app so you can arrive relaxed at your destination.
With the SWISS app, you can enjoy a carefree journey. From booking your flights and rental cars to receiving automatic information and updates on the day of travel, the smartphone app is your handy travel companion. You can also manage your personal data while on the go.
Download the SWISS app now and enjoy your flight! Your personal travel assistant is there for you before, during and after your journey.
Find out about our flight offers at swiss.com and follow us on Instagram, Facebook, YouTube and X to stay up to date.
If you have any questions or require support, please do not hesitate to get in touch. You can contact us at https://www.swiss.com/ch/en/customer-support/faq.
releaseNotes: Minor bug fixes and improvements

title: Hilton Honors: Book Hotels
description:
The Hilton Honors app has everything you need for the perfect vacation. Book a hotel, earn rewards, plan your trip, and so much more ‚Äî plus, it's free.

Top app features:
- View and manage your reservations in one place
- Check in before you arrive and go straight to your room (skip the front desk)
- Choose your room prior to your stay
- Unlock your door with your phone using Digital Key
- Book your next trip and find hotel deals

Member benefits:
- Get the lowest price at over 7,000 hotels when you book direct
- Earn Points with every stay and redeem them for free nights and perks with our partners
- Enjoy free WiFi, late checkout, and no charge for a second guest
- Achieve Elite member status and get perks like free upgrades, free continental breakfast or a Daily Food & Beverage Credit, and more

Our brands:

title: Tandem: Conversation exchange
description:
**The language learning app where millions of people teach each other.**

Languages are a 'learn by doing' kind of thing. This particular method is at the heart of Tandem, the global language exchange community. Connect with native speakers, start chatting and finally reach fluency in the language you‚Äôre learning!

Reach fluency in 300+ languages, including Spanish, English, Japanese, Korean, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified and Traditional Chinese, and 12 different sign languages, including American Sign Language.

Why Tandem helps you to practice and learn languages:

BOOST YOUR VOCABULARY
For the times when you‚Äôre struggling to find the correct words, our in-app translation feature helps you compose a message or translate an incoming one. 

PERFECT YOUR PRONUNCIATION
Fit in with the locals and improve your speaking skills using voice notes, audio and video calls.

GRASP THE GRAMMAR
Help each other grasp the difficult parts of language learning with our message correction and comment features.

TANDEM YOUR WAY
Forget strict schedules and learning by the book. Embrace your personal language learning style‚Äîwhether that‚Äôs messaging, calling, or even meeting in person. 

DOWNLOAD TANDEM AND MASTER ANY LANGUAGE NOW!

______________

What is language exchange?
Tandem language learning is the process of joining forces with someone who is a native speaker of the language you want to learn. Through conversation with your Tandem partner, known as language exchange, you improve your language skills and develop intercultural competence.

Tandem‚Äôs core value is to unite people across borders through language learning. Languages hold great power for unity, inclusivity, and equality. Language and cultural exchange are keys to unlock global understanding in our increasingly interconnected world. 

How to learn languages on Tandem:
1. Select the language(s) you want to learn in the app
2. Tell us about your language learning goals and your ideal Tandem partner
3. Search for native speakers of your target language in the community 
4. Kick-off your language exchange experience by sending your first message
5. Share topics with the Tandem community so you can have meaningful conversations about what interests you
6. Keep up the conversation with your new Tandem ‚Äúpen pal‚Äù and speak like a native in no time!

Tandem Pro‚Äî Upgrade to unlock the ultimate language learning tools:
- Unlimited translations
- Find members near me
- Search members by city
- Tandem Maps
- Profile visitor insights
- Profile verification and badge
- No ads

Read the Tandem Blog to get top tips, tricks, and interesting facts about everything language learning: https://www.tandem.net/blog
 
Got a question? Contact us on support@tandem.net or chat with us on our social channels...

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/TandemAppHQ
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@TandemAppHQ
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TandemLanguageApp/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TandemAppHQ
VK: https://vk.com/TandemAppHQ 

Licenses: Tandem ‚Äì Language Exchange is licensed by Tandem Fundazioa (http://tandemcity.info)
www.tandem.net/pages/termsofservice
releaseNotes: Thank you for downloading Tandem, a place to connect to native speakers worldwide and practice the language you are learning. Some cheeky bugs were trying to distract you, but we found them and, well, let‚Äôs say, you don‚Äôt need to worry about them anymore... :)
reviews:
Not so helpful and there are a lot of men, who are using this app instead of tinder. Definetelly cant reccomend. | I had hope in this one. When I was done signing up, it said ‚Äúalmost done, you need to be verified the wait time can be up to 2 weeks!‚Äù Two weeks!? I‚Äôve waited for three months. Nothing. Left it be, I forgot about it and now de-discovered it being on my phone for about a year now, still nothing. Two weeks? Y‚Äôall gotta fix this | Nothing to say about the scope of the app and how it let us reach the goal of connecting with other people who want to learn languages like us, but the UX of the app is below average. The onboarding experience has been a nightmare, forcing me to switch from desktop to mobile, lot of forced steps before even seeing the app, the filtering when I try to look for the right people in my area fail on many UI principles, and I could continue but I‚Äôll just say that there‚Äôs a lot to improve. Contact me if you want the help of a Lead UX Designer ;) | It is great to talk to people from all around the world | I found this app for practicing Japanese‚ò∫Ô∏è People here are really welcoming and have the same goal as me (Learn the language). There I found a lovely girl, which is my friend now. The function of spelling and translating is amazing. | Whenever I try to use my external ipad keyboard to write a message the chatbox disappears‚Ä¶ So I can either write blind or use the touch keyboard, which is kinda inconvenient. :( | The application opened automatically in Ukrainian.  I do not know why. | best app | After some negative experiences with other so-called language exchange apps, I‚Äôm really glad I was recommended to try Tandem. 

Most users there really want to learn languages and don‚Äôt misuse it as a dating app.

Also, It was super easy to find people to talk with who are happy to help me. I was even contacted by an amateur teacher who gives me lessons every week. So I‚Äôm very excited about the results.

I‚Äôve even taken their certificate, and to be honest, I was really pleasantly surprised by its quality.

The chat is nice as well, moreover, it offers many features making the communication easier.

So far I‚Äôve only found two issues within the app:

1) There is a bug on changing the profile picture. I‚Äôve reported it about two months ago, but so far the error still occurs.

2) It would nice to have an option to view people who want to learn my native language to help them (no matter what their nationality is). So far I can only see people speaking the language I am learning.

So it would be nice to change these things, however, the rating is still 5 stars for me. | In my opinion, this kind of app should have a large base of users so you can easily find someone to chat with. title: European Coffee Trip
description:
Find a good coffee shop in a few clicks! European Coffee Trip is a mobile app built for coffee lovers and baristas living in or visiting Europe.

We manually curate a list of specialty coffee shops around Europe, from big cities to tiny villages, to guide you to excellent cafes nearby! Our database features over 3500 cafes in 39 countries that we handpicked for the best coffee experience.

We build this mobile to make it even easier to drink tasty coffee wherever you are!

-- KEY FEATURES --

- Find a specialty coffee shop nearby
- Find a specialty coffee in any European city
- Search by proximity or navigate through the map
- Filter cafes based on your preferences
- Browse through rich cafe profiles with photo galleries
- Plan your coffee trip in a few clicks

Our database is stored offline, on your phone, so you can browse and navigate even without the Internet. We regularly review and update cafe profiles with new photos, opening hours and offerings. You can quickly check if the cafe is open or not!

-- PICK THE RIGHT CAFE --

- Types of coffee: espresso, filter coffee or cold brew
- Food menu: breakfast or lunch
- Plant-based and vegan alternatives
- Kids or dogs friendly
- Internet access and laptop friendly

Our goal is to make it easy for people to drink delicious coffee. Avoid bad coffee; get the app!
releaseNotes:
Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs new in this update:

‚Ä¢  Fixed: We've fixed an issue with Google Maps navigation. Earlier, some users encountered wrong or multiple results when trying to navigate to a specific cafe. With this update, Google Maps will lead you directly to your chosen cafe, every time.
‚Ä¢  New Sponsors in 'About Us': Take a peek at the 'About Us' section! We're excited to introduce new sponsors who are joining us on this journey to enrich your coffee exploration.
‚Ä¢  Minor Updates: We‚Äôve made some under-the-hood improvements for keeping the app up to date.

title: Pulse for Booking.com partners
description:
Why you‚Äôll love Pulse 
Our new property partner app lets you keep Booking.com in your pocket. Manage your property easier and faster ‚Äì plus keep your guests happy anywhere, anytime.

Whats going on today?
-Stay up-to-date on today‚Äôs arrivals, departures, new bookings, cancellations, modifications, and reviews

Interact with your guests in a few taps
- Stay in touch via live chat between you and guests
- Use pre-translated templates to quickly reply to frequent requests

Quickly view at a glance‚Ä¶
- Your performance, updated daily
- Your reservations calendar for previous or upcoming activity
- Reservation details including the number of guests, rooms, room types and nights
- Total rate and breakdown per night
- Applicable cancellation policies

Download our app now

title: Mercedes me Service
description:
THE MERCEDES ME SERVICE APP AT A GLANCE

YOUR SERVICE STATUS
Your calendar is always pretty tight? No worries, with the Mercedes me Assistant app you always know when your maintenance or annual inspection is due and receive timely reminders about it. 

BOOK YOUR APPOINTMENTS
Whether it‚Äôs time for your inspection or you want to change your tires: Mercedes me Assistant provides you with a direct link to your Mercedes-Benz dealership to book your appointments in just a few taps. 

FIND THE DEALERSHIP FOR YOU
Easily find authorised Mercedes-Benz dealerships near you. Not sure whether a dealership can service your car? Mercedes me Assistant only shows dealerships fit for you and your car.

PERSONALISED OFFERS
Want your Mercedes-Benz in good hands for maintenance? Get access to service offers that are specially tailored to the needs of your car (requires Mercedes me connect services), and book them right at your preferred service dealer.

LEARN MORE ABOUT YOUR CAR
Not sure how to pair your smartphone with your new car? Do you want to do some small repairs by yourself? Access curated videos and articles to help you get the most out of your Mercedes-Benz.

ALWAYS WELL INFORMED
Ever left wondering what a warning lamp meant? No need to search for the manual. Mercedes me Assistant shows you active warning lamps (requires Mercedes me connect services) and gives you in-depth information about them and what to do next.

Please note: 
The Mercedes me connect services only work with Mercedes-Benz vehicles equipped with the Mercedes me connect communication module. The range of functions depends on the respective vehicle equipment and your booked services. Your Mercedes-Benz partner will be happy to advise you. An active, free Mercedes me account is required for use. The functions may be temporarily restricted due to insufficient data transmission bandwidth. Continuous use of the GPS function in the background can reduce battery life.
releaseNotes:
We are continuously working on improving the Mercedes me Service app. For this reason, there are regular app updates. This update includes the following changes:
- Bug fixes
- Performance improvements
- Damage report

title: Fly Delta
description:
Welcome to Fly Delta, Delta‚Äôs award winning iOS app. With our dynamic Today screen which provides quick access to your boarding pass and other important day-of-travel information, Fly Delta makes travel easier than ever before.

‚Ä¢ Enroll in Delta's SkyMiles¬Æ program and earn miles every time you travel
‚Ä¢ Find, compare and book Domestic and International flights
‚Ä¢ Book SkyMiles award tickets
‚Ä¢ Purchase Delta Comfort+‚Ñ¢ seats and Trip Extras, including in-flight Wi-Fi, Priority Boarding and more
‚Ä¢ Reserve Preferred Seats like bulkhead and aisle
‚Ä¢ Rebook cancelled flights or missed connections
‚Ä¢ Manage your trips, profile and customize your travel preferences
‚Ä¢ Check your SkyMiles account balance and current Medallion¬Æ status
‚Ä¢ Check in, view your boarding pass and add it to Apple Wallet
‚Ä¢ Pay for checked bags and track their location
‚Ä¢ Check the latest flight status and receive flight and gate change notifications
‚Ä¢ Save a photo to remember your parking spot
‚Ä¢ Check your status on the upgrade or standby list
‚Ä¢ View or change your seat
‚Ä¢ Locate Delta Sky Club¬Æ lounges
‚Ä¢ View interactive airport maps, public transportation details and weather information
‚Ä¢ Get detailed info about our fleet and partners
‚Ä¢ Map flights en route with an interactive flight tracker
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúToday‚Äù gathers everything you need for your day of travel into one convenient place
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúNotifications‚Äù ensures you always have the latest flight updates, gate changes and more
‚Ä¢ View countdown to departure and arrival along with gate and baggage carousel information on Apple Watch

The Fly Delta app for iPhone and delta.com are always free to use on Delta‚Äôs Wi-Fi-enabled flights. Visit delta.com/app for more information.

When downloading the Fly Delta app, you agree that your personal data will be processed in accordance with Delta‚Äôs Privacy Policy which can be accessed via the link below or on our website at delta.com.
releaseNotes:
‚Ä¢	Copying your SkyMiles and Confirmation number is easier than ever - just look for the copy icon.
‚Ä¢	Expanded support for pre-select menus to partner airlines.
‚Ä¢	Continued enhancements to streamline the check-in process.
‚Ä¢	Minor enhancements & bug fixes to keep things running smoothly.
reviews:
Let‚Äôs be honest, airline apps are bad. They‚Äôre basically just bad websites in the shape of an app. Delta‚Äôs app has some of these details but is better than the competition.

But it is still a painful, often useless and broken app.

The app constantly reports errs with no explanation. In the case of network errors once encountered they can‚Äôt be reaolved without restarting the app, no matter how good your network.

The upcoming trips UI is a mess. It doesn‚Äôt even have my flight dates. It shows I have a trip from the 5th to the 23rd for example but when you tap into the detail the flights themselves don‚Äôt have this info. And indeed due to the time difference my return flight was shown as leaving at 1.35AM. On the 23rd? No dear boy, the 24th. If I were to use the app as my primary Delta tool, which is kind of the goal, I‚Äôd probably miss my flight.

Likewise the profile system is barebones.

I‚Äôm lactose intolerant and can‚Äôt set a special meal as a default. Delta optimistically assumes I might be cured someday and so I have to manually add my special meal for each. And. Every. Flight.

As software goes this is truly a brick. | Doesn‚Äôt work, I was not able to check in any flight. 5 passangers.. only 2 of them checked in! | It working compare to some apps from competition. | For online check-in, the app was utterly unusable: it didn‚Äôt allow to add any checked bags even though I had allowance for two. Human check-in had no such problems. On the day of my flight, the ‚ÄúToday‚Äù screen reported repetitive failures when updating the state of my flight. The airport website was much more useful. | ...unstable. I really like the idea of having all my flight info via Delta in my pocket. Actually, I still like it, it's awesome. Booked a trip to NYC in September, wanted to use the app to select my seats (I was going for the Comfort+ seats in the Economy class), but everytime I try to enter my MasterCard data, the app collapses upon tapping the expiration date selection. Every single time. The iPad app on the other hand, doesn't even notice I tapped the seats, nothing happens to them. If you could fix this feauture, I'd be happy for 5 stars!

title: TfL Go: Live Tube, Bus & Rail
description:
Travel confidently around London with maps and live travel updates on our official TfL app. Check live arrival times for Tube, London Overground, DLR, Elizabeth line and Thameslink trains as well as Trams and IFS Cloud Cable Car. Make step-free journeys and look up station facilities. See on the map when stations and lifts are closed. Walking or cycling? Our reliable journey planner will map a safe route.

The app is built around our iconic Tube map. To get started:
‚Ä¢ Touch the map or search to plan your journey
‚Ä¢ See the status of all lines
‚Ä¢ Check how busy each London Underground station is right now
‚Ä¢ Re-route as you travel - we‚Äôll suggest alternatives
‚Ä¢ Switch to the step-free map for accessible journeys
‚Ä¢ Find out when your next train, bus or tram is due
‚Ä¢ Look up which platform your train will arrive on
‚Ä¢ See when the stations you want to travel through are quieter
‚Ä¢ Check out station information and facilities such as toilets

Most recently we‚Äôve:
‚Ä¢ Added more information about station toilets ‚Äì find out where they are by gender and which ones are accessible and/or with baby changing facilities
‚Ä¢ Built a new map showing nearby bus stops ‚Äì making it simple to see where you can catch your bus from
‚Ä¢ Refreshed the navigation ‚Äì it‚Äôs even easier to get to the features you want

Our simple and clear layout is designed to make using the app easy for everyone.

Planning your journey: We‚Äôll suggest multiple ways to get to your destination ‚Äì you pick the one that suits you best. Choose the quickest journey, bus-only or one that‚Äôs step-free.

Check before you travel: See how the line is running and when to expect your next Tube, bus, train or tram

Freedom to explore: Choose the right travel options if you or someone you‚Äôre travelling with needs to avoid steps, lifts onto a train or in a station.

Bus stops near you: Find the bus stop nearest to where you are, and next bus live arrival information for every route.

Available underground via Wi-Fi (or 4G in some places) for live updates on the go.

What users have said:

‚ÄúI think that out of all of the transport apps I have owned on my phone, this is by far the best‚Äù

‚ÄúI love how clean the design of the app is & how easy it is to use. The best part of the app is it‚Äôs simplicity & how it helps you to navigate across London so effortlessly.‚Äù

‚ÄúThe map is awesome! The ability to zoom in and out and see more/less information as you do so. The station information is really useful and seeing which lines/stations are closed or have delays at a glance is really helpful. It‚Äôs also beautifully designed! Very slick, clean, and responsive.‚Äù

‚ÄúThe app is beautifully designed and free to use. Step free mode also works really well."

‚ÄúThis is a must have app ‚Ä¶ very much worth the wait. Well done TFL.‚Äù
releaseNotes: Improvements to VoiceOver support, plus some other bug fixes.
reviews: The one fair finder is missing in app | Amazing application. I am absolutely charmed with it. | The app is beautifully designed and free to use. Step free mode also works really well. Just maybe add a night tube and national rail map.

title: Cabify
description:
Whether you want to move around the city in a cab, in an electric motorcycle, order private car rides or send your things from one area of the city to the other, Cabify is your transportation and mobility app. And without giving up the most important thing: the safety and quality of your trips.

Cabify, the safe transportation option for your trips. Reach your destination in a premium cab or private car.

How does Cabify work?

1. Reserve or request your car or taxi ride. Indicate in the app where you are located. Select your destination, as well as the type of transportation you want to use: Cabify, cab, electric moped or delivery.
2. Confirm your request to order a trip and that's it! We will provide you with the details of the car or taxi and the driver, either for a trip or for a delivery.
3. Always know the estimated price before traveling. We will tell you how much you will pay for your car or cab ride. In addition, you can select the payment method that best suits you: debit card, credit card or cash.
4. Share your journey. Send the details of your trip to family and friends so that they know where you are at all times and make you feel even safer.

In addition, you will always move with maximum safety measures.

What are the advantages of traveling with Cabify?

- The safety of your trips is our priority. All trips are geolocated and can be shared immediately with any family member or friend. They will be able to see which taxi or car you are in, which driver you are with, and even where you are in your trip.
- A very easy to use app. You will be faster than Usain Bolt ordering a cab ride, riding an electric moped or making a delivery.
- Delivery. We don't just move you, we move your stuff too. Our drivers will take what you want from one place to another in their cars or motorcycles. It couldn't be easier!
- More options for you. Because we know you don't always travel the same way, we have cars and cabs for every occasion. Cabify for your day-to-day trips, Taxi to get there as soon as possible, electric motorcycles or Delivery to receive what you want.
- Carbon neutral trips. We offset all the CO2 emissions generated by your trips with Cabify. Choose a transportation option that thinks about the environment!
- The best drivers. At Cabify we have the most selective criteria when it comes to accepting car or cab drivers.
- No surprises. We show the price before you request a trip. This way you can travel with the peace of mind of knowing how much you are going to pay.
- 100% customization. You decide how to move. Choose from the payment method that best suits you to what beat you want to play on your radio.
- For everyone. Cabify's app is accessible for people with sight impairments, and we have accessibility settings for people with disabilities.

Where is Cabify available?

Cabify is now available in 7 countries so you can get around by car or cab. Order your taxi driver in cities like Bogota, Lima, Madrid or Buenos Aires and start enjoying more transportation options with the leading taxi app: car rides, motorcycle deliveries, airport cabs, and more. Get to know in detail all the services available in each city at cabify.com.

Want to use Cabify for drivers and become a taxi driver?

If you're passionate about helping others discover your city, find out more at cabify.com or download the Cabify Driver app.

Looking for corporate transportation for your company?

Offer the best transportation app to your employees. Open a corporate account to have a large fleet of cars and cabs available for your company's trips and deliveries. In addition, our management platform will allow you to have greater control of expenses.

Download Cabify, your car or taxi transportation app and move or send whatever you want around your city.
releaseNotes:
We're working hard to make sure you've got the whole city within reach via our app. In this version we've made a few adjustments to improve your experience.
- If you have a discount, we'll remind you of it from the start and we'll show you the final price with the discount applied.
- We corrected a few small errors for an improved experience.

title: MobiMatter: eSIM Marketplace
description:
Discover, Compare, and Stay Connected Worldwide with MobiMatter!

Elevate your mobile telecom roaming experience with MobiMatter - your ultimate one-stop shop for all your roaming needs!

MobiMatter empowers you to effortlessly explore, compare, and purchase the finest cellular offers from leading global telcos.

Features:

- Discover and purchase eSIM roaming offers from top operators worldwide.
- Stay connected during your travels with convenient travel data packages.
- No contract or long term commitment for travel data deals.
- Embrace the benefits of eSIM technology for hassle-free and cost-effective international roaming.
- Explore, compare, and purchase mobile plans from a variety of operators, and get an email immediately with your eSIM QR code.
- Top-up your eSIM on the go from our eSIM App.
- Check your data usage on our eSIM App.
- Refer your friends & earn MobiMatter cashback through our Referral Program giving up to 50% referral rewards


Unlock the Potential of eSIM:
Own an unlocked eSIM compatible device? MobiMatter brings you an extensive collection of offers bundled with eSIMs from renowned operators across the globe. We offer eSIM offers from 30+ eSIM providers such as Airalo, 3, eSIMGo, Ubigi, O2, DTAC and many more. 
 
Instantly download and activate the eSIM of your choice as a secondary mobile data SIM while traveling.
Keep your primary line active and secure in your phone, ensuring you never miss important calls and messages.
Access our store and purchase eSIMs with generous data allowances and extended validity in Europe, Asia, Africa, Middle East, USA, and over 200 countries worldwide.

Our international eSIM data plans helps you avoid high roaming charges & saves the hassle of buying tourist sim card for each destination or looking for the nearest Wi-Fi when traveling.

Enjoy the flexibility of regional eSIMs, the convenience of a global plan, and the peace of mind with one-year validity. 
Discover the best eSIM options and cheap deals for unmatched connectivity with MobiMatter - the premier one-stop shop for mobile telecom services. Compare and purchase the best mobile offers by telecom operators worldwide.

Access our eSIM App and purchase eSIMs with generous data allowances and extended validity in Europe, Asia, Africa, Middle East, USA & over 200 countries worldwide, with flexible validity periods from one day to a full year.

Our eSIM Europe, eSIM Asia, eSIM USA and Global eSIM Packages offer multi-country data connectivity suited for tourists, visitors and digital nomads.

Explore the best travel eSIM deals at https://mobimatter.com/ 

For any eSIM related queries, connect with us here: https://mobimatter.com/troubleshoot or contact us at support@mobimatter.com
releaseNotes: Thanks for using MobiMatter! In this update, we've squashed some bugs that might have been bugging you and made the app run even smoother. Enjoy a more stable and responsive experience. Thanks for your continued support!
reviews: I used to try various apps but this one is perfect! Easy to use and find the cheapest option! | Easy to order, instant delivery, the eSIM works. Super handy tool for travels if you don‚Äôt want to hassle with physical SIMs or finding the best local offer.

title: TomTom GO: Navigation, Maps
description:
Join +10 million drivers using TomTom GO Navigation‚Äôs reliable sat nav to escape traffic & save time.

Experience a reliable GPS navigation app for cars and trucks with up-to-date maps and live traffic updates on your device. Select the subscription that suits you and begin your free trial now!

‚ñ∫ AVOID TRAFFIC & SPEED CAMERAS
‚ó¶ Live Traffic Updates: Seamlessly navigate around traffic congestion and roadblocks in real-time.
‚ó¶ Speed Alerts & Warnings: Stay informed and drive confidently with alerts for fixed and mobile speed cameras.*
‚ó¶ Apple CarPlay Compatibility: Access directions and real-time updates on a larger screen with immersive surround sound.

‚ñ∫ ENHANCED FEATURES FOR A SAFER DRIVE
‚ó¶ Ad-Free: Stay focused on the road with minimal distractions and data privacy.
‚ó¶ Lane Guidance: Never miss a turn with precise lane suggestions for seamless navigation.
‚ó¶ TomTom Routebar‚Ñ¢: A sidebar provides a route overview with alerts and notifications, ensuring a smooth journey.
‚ó¶ Offline Maps: Conserve mobile data and battery life with up-to-date GPS navigation, with no internet. 

‚ñ∫ TAILORED JOURNEYS FOR TRUCK DRIVERS
‚ó¶ Input your vehicle's dimensions for tailored guidance
‚ó¶  Effortlessly locate designated truck rest stops & relevant truck POIs
‚ó¶ Provide details of hazardous cargo to steer clear of restricted routes
‚ó¶ Set your preferred maximum speed to receive an adjusted estimated time of arrival. 

Experience our premium features with a free 7-day trial. Opt to continue your journey with one of our auto-renewing subscription plan:

‚ñ∫ CANCEL OR UPDATE ANYTIME
Car: 1 month: ¬£3.99 | 12 months: ¬£19.99 
Truck: 1 month: ¬£24.99 | 12 months: ¬£79.99

---------------------------------------

‚ñº Terms & Conditions: https://www.tomtom.com/en_gb/legal/
‚ñº Using TomTom GO Services: https://help.tomtom.com/hc/en-gb/sections/360004055020-Using-TomTom-Services
‚ñº Use Speed Camera Services: In accordance with local laws and regulations. Some jurisdictions prohibit this functionality. Check local laws before use. 
‚ñº Offer limited to one free trial per user.**
‚ñº Apple CarPlay is a registered trademark of Apple Inc.

title: Hory.app: Mountain Explorer
description:
Discover the world of mountains like never before with Hory.app!

With databases covering around 30 countries in Europe and over 200,000 mountains, Hory.app is your ultimate companion for mountain enthusiasts. Whether you're a seasoned mountaineer or just starting your journey, our app has something for everyone.

Explore the Mountains:
Our continuously updated database ensures you have access to the most comprehensive mountain information. Find your favorite mountains, discover hidden gems, and plan your next adventure with ease.

GPS Mountain Logging:
Log your mountain visits effortlessly using GPS when you're within a 50-meter radius of a mountain. Keep a record of your accomplishments and share your journey with fellow adventurers.

Share Your Memories:
Capture the beauty of the mountains and create lasting memories. Share your photos, rate mountains, and leave comments to inspire others.

Ad-Free Experience:
Enjoy an ad-free experience while exploring the mountains. We believe in a distraction-free adventure.

Web Integration:
Register on our website (https://hory.app) to sync your data and never lose your valuable information. It also unlocks additional features in the mobile app for free!

Premium Features:
Upgrade to our yearly premium subscription on the website to unlock a world of possibilities. Participate in challenges, access in-depth statistics, connect with the mountain community through social features, create a blog to share your stories, and compete with other users in rankings.

Join the Hory.app community and embark on your mountain adventure today!

- Fixes photo synchronization

- Web links still open the app but redirect it to the website
- Improve parking button popup by adding a compass and more

title: bergfex: ski, snow & weather
description:
bergfex/Ski - ultimate wintersport app

The bergfex/Ski app offers you detailed information for all skiing resorts in Austria, Switzerland, Italy, France, Germany, Slovenia, Poland, Czech, Slovakia and Croatia. Up-to-date snow reports, weather, webcams, ski maps, accommodations and much more.

‚Ä¢ GPS-Tracking (track all your ski descents)
‚Ä¢ Favourites - all your 'best-of' ski resorts at a glance 
‚Ä¢ daily up-to-date snow heights and open slopes
‚Ä¢ 9 days weather forecasts for the alp region
‚Ä¢ Weather forecast maps (precipitation/temperature)
‚Ä¢ more than 5.000 webcams, more than 500 video streaming cams
‚Ä¢ detailed snow forecast maps
‚Ä¢ high resolution maps of ski resorts
‚Ä¢ Ski ticket prices
‚Ä¢ detailed information for every ski resort
‚Ä¢ ski rental
‚Ä¢ accommodations/hotels
‚Ä¢ avalanche risk service

bergfex/Ski PRO Features
‚Ä¢ no advertising in PRO-Version
‚Ä¢ unlimited-widget (multiple widgets for skiresorts possible) 
‚Ä¢ snow forecast with 6 hours interval
‚Ä¢ fallen snow analysis for the last 7 days 
‚Ä¢ Webcam archive
‚Ä¢ skiing instructor video clips (also offline) for carving, powder skiing, snowboard, etc.
‚Ä¢ Weather reports in text form for Austria (ZAMG) and Germany (DWD)
‚Ä¢ more than 1.000 weather stations

bergfex/Ski uses HealthKit to export your bergfex/Ski activities into the Health app.

Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

Terms and Conditions: https://www.bergfex.at/agb/
Privacy Policy: https://www.bergfex.at/datenschutz/

title: myAudi
description:
The myAudi app connects your Audi to your life and gives you innovative functions & services for greater convenience as you drive.

The fourth generation of the myAudi app is now even easier to use and provides even more convenience every day. The new version marks the start of a continuous update process that will gradually revolutionise the myAudi app with an intuitive and user-centred interface.
The vehicle dashboard is the start of this process. It has been significantly simplified on the basis of customer feedback and visualises information such as the vehicle status in the form of cards. The new quick action drawer has the most important vehicle functions, which are always just one swipe away.

Get real-time information about your vehicle at any time and keep a constant eye on your fuel tank level, driving range, service appointments, warnings and much more. Plan journeys in the app from the comfort of your own home and send destinations and routes directly to your vehicle. You can also remotely adjust climate control and open/close vehicle doors. (The availability of services may vary, depending on the model and equipment of your Audi)


OVERVIEW OF FUNCTIONS AND BENEFITS:

myAudi connect services
¬≠	Keep track of important vehicle data and access information about your fuel tank level, driving range or oil level, right from your mobile device
¬≠	Program the climate control to suit you, even before you get into the vehicle
¬≠	Open and close your vehicle remotely

Audi e-tron
¬≠	Use the myAudi app to plan and manage the charging process conveniently
¬≠	Access specific information, such as electric range, charging status and remaining charging time

Navigation
¬≠	Send destinations and routes from your mobile device to your vehicle
¬≠	Plan your routes, including the walking route to the vehicle
¬≠	Access contacts, addresses and your calendar from your vehicle

Service
¬≠	Keep an eye on service appointments, upcoming maintenance, and all other information about additional work on your vehicle
¬≠	Use the app to access your digital owner's manual 
¬≠	Find your nearest Audi Service Partner
¬≠	Manage costs and journeys with the digital cost and mileage tracker


You must register on myAudi to use the myAudi connect services. The availability of services may vary, depending on the model and equipment of your Audi. The myAudi app is provided by the importer for the applicable market. See the app legal notice for details about the importer.
Some functions depend on third-party providers and may not be available without restrictions at all times or in every country. We recommend a flat-rate high-speed data package to use our services ‚Äì the applicable costs depend on your contract with the network operator. If you do not have a fast enough data connection, you may not get the full benefit of the features. Please also note any data volume restrictions imposed by your mobile service provider.
If you have questions, please contact us at kundenbetreuung@audi.de.
Running GPS continuously in the background can reduce the battery life.
releaseNotes:
- With our new Lock Screen Widgets, you can have information, e.g. the remaining range, displayed directly on the lock screen.
- Consistently fast and reliable: Our latest update brings the myAudi app back up to speed.
