title: TheFork - Restaurant bookings
description:
TheFork is Europe‚Äôs leading restaurant booking platform, proudly bringing people together through unique and affordable culinary experiences since 2007. What are you waiting for? Activate your location and we‚Äôll activate your taste buds! You set the tone, we set the table.

TheFork continues to be savoured across the biggest foodie hotspots in France, Spain, Italy, the UK, the Netherlands, Belgium, Switzerland, Portugal, Denmark, Sweden and Australia. But wait, what exactly do we bring to the table? Here are 6 reasons to download TheFork app right now.

1. Things that tickle our taste buds: fast, free and easy online booking
We know that normal life means having a lot on your plate, so to make things a bit easier for you, we've simplified restaurant booking. With a few simple taps on our mobile app, you‚Äôll be one step closer to having that ‚Äòmmm‚Äô moment of pure belly satisfaction, in the most seamless way possible.

2. Frugal on prices, never on flavours
Our amazing restaurant partners love their diners as much as we love ours and offer exclusive discounts on reservations throughout the year (automatically applied and subject to conditions at the time of booking). That way restaurants get to open their doors to all types of diners, making dining out accessible to everyone.

3. Community insights = better bites
Tuck into the wisdom of our gourmet community! With over 20 million trusted reviews from only customers who have actually tried the restaurant‚Äîyour palette is in good hands!

4. We don‚Äôt skimp on choice
Reserved? Not us. That‚Äôs just a label for a table. So whether you‚Äôre looking for the perfect spot for bottomless brunching, taco crunching or al-fresco munching, our foodies are spoiled for choice with our diverse collection of over 60,000 restaurants and 40,000 photos, menus and community reviews that will satisfy just about any culinary mood and occasion. After all, variety is the spice of life! Browse, scroll and add to favourites, so you can find more of what you love. Now that‚Äôs food for thought.

5. INSIDER: sit back and relax while we level up your dining-out game
Our foodie experts are always hard at work to stay on top of our INSIDER collection featuring the best restaurants. With our feed of critically acclaimed insights and selections, no chances are taken on promoting the dining out spots that are turning heads for the best ambiance, ratings, service and food.

6. We take loyalty VERY seriously
To reward our awesome foodie community, every booking with TheFork accumulates unique Yums points, which can be redeemed in the form of a tasty discount at one of our many partner restaurants down the line. Here‚Äôs how it works:

1 reservation = 100 Yums (Y)

Once you've accumulated enough you can enjoy amazing offers which converts to: 
1000 Yums = ¬£20 loyalty discount!
2000 Yums = ¬£50 loyalty discount!

Keep an eye out for Double Yums and other ways to earn more Yums as you book.

We love hearing from our TheFork foodie community! Reach out at contact@thefork.com.

>In the UK, follow us on:
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheFork.uk/
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thefork_uk/?hl=en
releaseNotes: We constantly update TheFork app to provide you a flawless in-app experience and help you find the right restaurant for your moment. Any updates of our app contains performance and reliability improvements. Thanks for choosing and using TheFork!

title: FunEasyLearn - Learn Languages
description:
Join millions of learners worldwide that read, listen, write and speak a language with FunEasyLearn. It‚Äôs free, effective, and can be used offline. FunEasyLearn believes that everyone should have a chance to learn any language from their own mother tongue. That‚Äôs why we are continuously adding new languages for achieving this goal.

FunEasyLearn offers ample and complete courses divided into topics, subtopics, and difficulty levels. Each verb, noun, adjective, greeting, or useful phrase is related to everyday life. That‚Äôs why the app works well for both personal needs and travel purposes.

Why this app:
- 34 language courses.
- Contents: Alphabet + ALL Reading Rules + ALL Words (continuously updated) + 5,000 Phrases.
- Developed with native translators and professional voice actors.
- Colorful and engaging: great app for parents & kids to spend time together.
- No boring lessons, just fun.

Learn a language from your mother tongue. 

You can learn 34 languages: English, American English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Romanian, Russian, Arabic, Bulgarian, Catalan, Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, Slovak, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian.

The above-listed languages can be learned from 61 mother tongues.

Change the way you learn languages forever. Use innovative strategies for learning and memorizing words and phrases while playing games. Feel the great satisfaction of finally speaking a foreign language. 

Track your progress, earn flowers & bees, and enjoy your learning. Use flowers as a payment for a FREE subscription.

Our artists crafted beautiful images just to make your learning enjoyable and effortless.

Join the biggest community of successful learners - kids, teenagers, pupils, students, mums, dads, grannies, tourists, and many-many others.

--------------------------------------------

While everything you learn in Learn Languages is free as you pay with the flowers earned in the app, we do offer a FunEasyLearn Premium Subscription to unlock all the courses. If you choose to purchase the FunEasyLearn Subscription, the payment will be charged to your iTunes account. The subscription renews automatically unless the auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. You can also turn off the auto-renewal at any time just by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after the purchase.

The FunEasyLearn Subscription price varies in different countries. If you choose not to purchase the FunEasyLearn Subscription, use it for free by paying with flowers.

Privacy Policy: https://www.funeasylearn.com/privacy
Terms of Use: https://www.funeasylearn.com/terms
releaseNotes:
Updated Onboarding
Enjoy our new, more engaging, and fun, onboarding and personalize your language learning flow right from the start. 

Review Alphabet
Now you will be able to review groups of (at least three) letters you've learned and enjoy new reviewing games while doing so. 

Hands-free Learning Mode
Now you can learn without having to interact with the phone.
Choose the levels, topics & subtopics you want to learn, set the order of languages, the pause length, and other settings, and learn while jogging, shopping, cooking, or running other errands, anytime & anywhere you go!

Smart Writing Trainer
Now you can learn how to write all the letters of the alphabet in 32 languages.
Watch the tutorial, repeat the stroke order, and associate every letter with a new word. Learn how to write and pronounce all the letters even easier than you did at school!

Advanced Search
Find any word or sentence you need in no time. Search in both your native language and in the course language. Sort & filter all the contents according to different criteria: topic, subtopic, part of speech, speaker, hidden/unhidden, level of forgetting, etc.

Smart Review Manager
Review everything you've learned according to different criteria: time, level of learning, level of forgetting, mistakes, etc.

New native languages, contents, levels, and features are added constantly. We improve consistently, on a monthly basis.

Your bee coach has already prepared traps for all the bugs. It fixes them instantly.

For more FunEasyLearn news follow us on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram @funeasylearn.

title: flydubai
description:
Our world is now even closer to you with flydubai mobile app. The new flydubai app lets you manage your travel plans quickly and easily on the fly. Here‚Äôs what you can look forward to:

SEARCH AND BOOK ON THE MOVE
Choose from more than 90 flydubai destinations, pay online or choose to pay later, check in online, download your boarding pass and save it to your mobile wallet to save time at the airport. You can also book with any of our codeshare and interline partners. All that and more is at your fingertips.

LOG IN FOR A MORE PERSONAL ONLINE EXPERIENCE
Are you a member of our rewards programme? Just log in to your account and start booking to earn and redeem your points. All your profile details will also be saved for a more personalized and seamless experience the next time you want to book through the app. 
Not a member yet? You can sign up through the app today.

MANAGE YOUR TRIP 
Check in to a flight, add passengers to a booking, change travel dates, cancel or upgrade a booking, add optional extras like baggage allowance or simply check a flight status. It‚Äôs all there.

ENABLE APP NOTIFICATIONS 
Turn the app notifications on so you can enjoy real-time updates about any saved flights in your profile and to learn more about any relevant flydubai promotions based on your location.
releaseNotes: Welcome to the updated version of flydubai Mobile App. With this release, we've made some bug fixes and performance enhancements across the app.
